522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="RedirectingToAFile"></a>Redirecting
3144   to
3088   a
383   file
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
150   You
511   can
8   redirect
1041   or
21   pipe
28   i/o
1307   in
30   much
6605   the
90   way
675   you
55   might
126   under
10   <tt>cmd.exe</tt>.
30   Here&rsquo;s
3088   a
63   simple
43   example
3   redirecting
30   stdout
640   from
6605   the
97   word
16   count
2059   of
6605   the
1   famous
1   &ldquo;Hello,
1   world&rdquo;
5   program.
2   <tt>cat</tt>
234   just
30   copies
640   from
439   any
294   files
675   you
30   tell
879   it
14   or,
588   by
38   default,
640   from
36   stdin
3144   to
44   stdout.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">74
3   E%
52   cd
88   hello
1   75
483   D%
91   ls
14   hello.c
8   hello.exe
1   76
483   D%
24   cat
14   hello.c
20   #include
5   &lt;stdio.h&gt;
230   main
1   ()
34   {
1   printf("Hello,
1   world.\n");
49   }
1   77
483   D%
16   wc
14   hello.c
1   &gt;hello.wc
1   78
483   D%
24   cat
1   &lt;hello.wc
44   5
20   8
6   72
14   hello.c
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
1   <tt>wc</tt>
21   tells
5   us
1061   that
1   <tt>hello.c</tt>
289   has
44   5
11   lines,
50   containing
20   8
25   words,
1   totaling
6   72
55   characters.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
468   If
6605   the
383   file
675   you
60   write
3144   to
920   with
8   <tt>&gt;</tt>
4   exists,
102   it&rsquo;s
281   first
5   truncated
3144   to
29   zero
38   length
1   (discarding
6605   the
26   old
1   contents);
790   if
6605   the
383   file
37   doesn&rsquo;t
10   exist,
102   it&rsquo;s
8   created.
11   With
3   <tt>&lt;</tt>,
102   it&rsquo;s
590   an
106   error
790   if
6605   the
383   file
37   doesn&rsquo;t
25   exist.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="AppendingToAFile"></a>Appending
3144   to
3088   a
383   file
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
10   Data
511   can
924   be
8   appended
3144   to
3088   a
383   file
920   with
6605   the
4   <tt>&gt;&gt;</tt>
1   operator:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">79
483   D%
296   echo
1   that^'s
364   all
2   folks
1   &gt;&gt;hello.wc
9   80
483   D%
24   cat
1   hello.wc
44   5
20   8
6   72
14   hello.c
49   that's
364   all
2   folks
2   81
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
106   When
675   you
11   append
920   with
1   <tt>&gt;&gt;</tt>,
790   if
6605   the
383   file
4   exists,
111   data
1837   is
63   written
50   onto
6605   the
2   end;
790   if
879   it
37   doesn&rsquo;t
10   exist,
102   it&rsquo;s
8   created.
53   (The
110   single
20   quote
172   character
289   has
94   special
54   meaning
3144   to
6605   the
1129   shell
883   on
6605   the
428   command
3   line;
6605   the
94   special
54   meaning
1837   is
29   turned
91   off
588   by
6605   the
13   shell&rsquo;s
121   escape
15   character,
1   <tt>^</tt>.)
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="noclobber"></a>noclobber
3144   to
4   prevent
6   accidentally
5   overwriting
3088   a
383   file
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
7   Not
5   everyone
1837   is
1   comfortable
920   with
1   letting
6605   the
1129   shell
1   glibly
1   toss
7   away
590   an
31   existing
383   file
790   if
675   you
84   type
8   <tt>&gt;</tt>
268   when
675   you
7   meant
4   <tt>&gt;&gt;</tt>
1041   or
5   lose
879   it
7   somewhere
790   if
675   you
1   mistype
590   an
31   existing
320   filename
920   with
1   <tt>&gt;&gt;</tt>.
983   The
2   noclobber
243   variable
30   lets
675   you
30   tell
6605   the
1129   shell
675   you
84   want
320   this
3144   to
924   be
1   caught,
113   so
675   you
511   can
7   decide
790   if
320   this
363   was
31   really
81   what
675   you
1   meant.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
468   If
675   you
436   set
1   noclobber,
675   you
299   have
3144   to
84   type
1   <tt>&gt;!</tt>
3144   to
8   redirect
3144   to
590   an
31   existing
1   file:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">81
483   D%
436   set
2   noclobber
527   =
214   1
1   82
483   D%
296   echo
5   trash
320   this
383   file
49   &gt;
14   hello.c
20   csh:
13   Couldn't
42   open
1   'hello.c'
857   as
3088   a
6   redirected
37   standard
19   output.
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
1   Come
3144   to
10   think
2059   of
22   it,
1   let&rsquo;s
471   not
7   overwrite
1061   that
96   file.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
1   Similarly
790   if
675   you
84   want
3144   to
11   append
3144   to
32   something
1061   that
37   doesn&rsquo;t
55   already
1   exist:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">83
483   D%
296   echo
8   appended
111   data
13   &gt;&gt;
4   newdata
20   csh:
13   Couldn't
42   open
1   'newdata'
857   as
3088   a
6   redirected
37   standard
19   output.
1   84
483   D%
296   echo
8   appended
111   data
3   &gt;&gt;!
4   newdata
1   85
483   D%
24   cat
4   newdata
8   appended
111   data
1   86
483   D%
27   rm
4   newdata
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="ProtectionAttributes"></a>Protection
7   attributes
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
468   If
3088   a
383   file
289   has
439   any
2059   of
6605   the
94   special
3   protection
1   attributes,
2   hidden,
22   read-only
1041   or
6   system,
67   set,
675   you
29   cannot
7   overwrite
879   it
588   by
3   redirecting
28   i/o
3144   to
61   it.
8   Even
268   when
675   you
84   type
1   <tt>!</tt>,
675   you
66   still
1   can&rsquo;t.
1   Before
675   you
511   can
8   redirect
3144   to
22   it,
675   you
64   must
6   clear
364   all
94   these
6   attribute
4   bits.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">87
483   D%
91   ls
27   -l
37   zork
2   -SHAR
16   Feb
15   23
4   13:16
120   0
37   zork
1   88
483   D%
296   echo
257   new
37   zork
111   data
6   &gt;!
37   zork
20   csh:
13   Couldn't
42   open
2   'zork'
857   as
3088   a
6   redirected
37   standard
19   output.
1   89
483   D%
9   chmod
10   -R
37   zork
4   90
483   D%
296   echo
257   new
37   zork
111   data
6   &gt;!
37   zork
20   csh:
13   Couldn't
42   open
2   'zork'
857   as
3088   a
6   redirected
37   standard
19   output.
1   91
483   D%
9   chmod
1   -SH
37   zork
1   92
483   D%
91   ls
27   -l
37   zork
7   ---A-
16   Feb
15   23
4   13:16
120   0
37   zork
1   93
483   D%
296   echo
257   new
37   zork
111   data
49   &gt;
37   zork
1   94
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="StdoutAndStderr"></a>stdout
2223   and
17   stderr
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1   Redirecting
56   both
30   stdout
2223   and
17   stderr
13   together
1837   is

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Pipes"></a>Pipes
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
2   Pipes
650   are
3088   a
90   way
2059   of
2   connecting
3088   a
29   series
2059   of
13   activities

113   so
1061   that
6605   the
64   output
2059   of
271   one
1837   is
125   read
857   as

3144   to
6605   the
5   next.
45   Each
2059   of
6605   the
13   activities
20   runs
2   asynchronously
2223   and
1   concurrently
920   with
6605   the
5   others.
10   Data
1837   is
73   passed
231   completely
1307   in
17   memory
2223   and
1837   is
44   very
6   fast.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
25   syntax
1837   is
10   similar
3144   to
28   i/o
25   redirection
1307   in

6605   the

1604   <p>

4   leftmost

2059   of

21   evaluated

588   by
6605   the

213   current
16   thread.
983   The
2   successive
37   right

21   evaluated

107   child

84   (This
1837   is
113   so
1061   that

3088   a
428   command

6605   the

3088   a

45   Each
33   part

924   be
590   an
11   arbitrarily
16   complex
11   statement,
4   perhaps
115   even

1307   in
3088   a

1679   </p>
1604   <p>
2   Pipes
650   are
30   much
12   faster

207   more

920   with

3144   to
17   improved
8   buffering
2223   and
1   scheduling
2   technology.
261   A

6   faster.

522   <h4>

522   <h4>

1604   <p>

111   data

7   especially

23   you&rsquo;re
56   writing
3088   a

6   low-level
1   ReadFiles
3144   to
6605   the
841   Windows
16   kernel

2   depended

9   stop

6605   the
412   end
2059   of
3088   a

7   pipes

2   line-oriented

6605   the
6   keyboard.
468   If

197   characters

3   read,

63   simple

111   For
320   this
5   reason,

1   realistic

60   write
3088   a
159   script
105   where
3088   a
107   child
70   process
1837   is
9   supposed
3144   to
12   inherit
36   stdin
3   pointed
178   into
6605   the
159   script
96   file.
106   In
3088   a
159   script
39   file,
320   this
1837   is
471   not
1   reliable:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
2   class="codesample">:
53   :
15   csh
296   echo
88   hello
44   exit
53   :
53   :
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
383   file
4   descriptor
6605   the
107   child
70   process
20   inherits
380   will
6   likely
471   not
924   be
2   pointing
277   at
6605   the
1   &ldquo;echo
1   hello&rdquo;
268   when
879   it
3   exits,
6605   the
21   parent
380   will
6   likely
471   not
38   find
879   it
3   pointed
234   just
8   past
6605   the
1   &ldquo;exit&rdquo;.
181   This
84   type
2059   of
159   script
131   should
924   be
63   written
2   as:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
2   class="codesample">:
53   :
15   csh
3   &lt;&lt;eof
296   echo
88   hello
44   exit
7   eof
53   :
53   :
1652   </div>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="RecallingEarlierCommands"></a>Recalling
2223   and
92   running
9   earlier
62   commands
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
112   history
27   mechanism
30   lets
675   you
7   recall
2223   and
1   rerun
9   earlier
71   commands.
103   To
43   see
81   what
102   it&rsquo;s
1   remembered,
270   use
6605   the
2   <tt>history</tt>
428   command
1041   or
122   its
12   usual
164   alias
1   <tt>h</tt>,
201   which
55   might
32   show
675   you
32   something
90   like
6605   the
3   following:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">127
483   D%
112   history
19   12
3   116
11   (this
1837   is
6605   the
25   inline
7   data)
3   117
7   eof
3   118
412   end
2   119
24   cat
16   &lt;&lt;
9   ***
2   120
983   The
6   ^$home
319   directory
1837   is
5   $home.
2   121
7   Today's
37   date
1837   is
6   `date`.
2   122
9   ***
3   123
24   cat
16   &lt;&lt;
1   ^***
3   124
983   The
6   ^$home
319   directory
1837   is
5   $home.
3   125
7   Today's
37   date
1837   is
6   `date`.
4   126
9   ***
4   127
112   history
19   12
2   128
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
112   history
190   list
14   won&rsquo;t
924   be
11   quite
81   what
675   you
2   typed:
5   it&rsquo;ll
924   be
23   broken
178   into
48   separate
80   words
4   wherever
271   one
2059   of
6605   the
94   special
4   tokens,
3   <tt>&amp;</tt>,
1   <tt>|</tt>,
4   <tt>;</tt>,
3   <tt>&lt;</tt>,
1   <tt>&gt;</tt>,
2   <tt>(</tt>,
1   <tt>)</tt>,
2   <tt>&amp;&amp;</tt>,
3   <tt>||</tt>,
4   <tt>&gt;&gt;</tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>&lt;&lt;</tt>,
3   occurs.
15   Only
25   inline
111   data
9   escapes
78   being
23   broken
157   up
178   into
80   words
320   this
4   way.
45   Each
428   command
193   may
924   be
7   thought
2059   of
857   as
590   an
10   array
2059   of
25   words,
13   indexed
640   from
16   0.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
103   To
1   reuse
6605   the
106   text
1041   or
2   maybe
234   just
3088   a
84   few
80   words
640   from
3088   a
32   previous
29   command,
675   you
84   type
590   an
7   exclamation
39   point
12   <tt>!</tt>
42   followed
588   by
3088   a
84   few
197   characters
3144   to
8   identify
81   what
675   you
84   want
3144   to
1   reuse.
150   You
511   can
176   do
320   this
19   anywhere
2223   and
34   whatever
675   you
10   select
1837   is
234   just
3   stuffed
51   back
883   on
6605   the
428   command
372   line
3144   to
924   be
18   interpreted
857   as
34   whatever
6605   the
7   context
1   suggests.
111   For
2   convenience,
6605   the
7   exclamation
39   point
1837   is
471   not
35   treated
857   as
3088   a
112   history
30   reference
790   if
102   it&rsquo;s
42   followed
588   by
68   white
67   space
11   (a
7   space,
28   tab
1041   or
1   newline)
1041   or
588   by
2   <tt>=</tt>,
7   <tt>~</tt>
1041   or
2   <tt>(</tt>.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="RetrievingAWholeCommandLine"></a>Retrieving
3088   a
50   whole
428   command
372   line
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
29   There
35   several
14   ways
2059   of
2   picking
157   up
3088   a
50   whole
428   command
75   line.
150   You
55   already
22   know
91   how
3144   to
176   do
879   it
6   interactively
920   with
7   arrow
17   keys
2223   and
428   command
10   completion.
150   You
511   can
190   also
270   use
3088   a
10   shorthand
11   notation
1061   that
511   can
924   be
207   more
19   convenient
790   if
675   you
84   want
3144   to
176   do
32   something
3088   a
49   bit
207   more
2   complex.
983   The
6   simplest
10   shorthand
1837   is
2   <tt>!!</tt>,
201   which
1   picks
157   up
6605   the
106   text
2059   of
6605   the
34   immediately
32   preceding
4   command:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">128
483   D%
296   echo
4   !!
296   echo
112   history
19   12
112   history
19   12
2   129
483   D%
4   !!
296   echo
112   history
19   12
112   history
19   12
2   130
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
1129   shell
281   first
1   echoes
252   your
428   command
18   showing
6605   the
2   effects
2059   of
6605   the
34   substitutions
2223   and
189   then
20   runs
61   it.
983   The
176   other
12   quick
14   ways
2059   of
5   referring
3144   to
3088   a
50   whole
428   command
372   line
640   from
112   history
650   are
588   by
6605   the
428   command
15   number,
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">130
483   D%
1   !104
91   ls
27   -l
4   ``whereis
2   ls``

7   Jul
8   22
2   08:00

4   D:\Program
14   Files\Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell

1   64\Bin\ls.exe
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
10   relative
3144   to
6605   the
34   immediately
32   preceding
29   command,
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">131
483   D%
296   echo
271   one
271   one
2   132
483   D%
296   echo
94   two

16   three
16   three
2   134
483   D%
1   !-1
296   echo
94   two
94   two
2   135
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
1041   or
588   by
1   mentioning
101   some
2059   of
6605   the
106   text
3144   to
43   look
2   for.
261   A
2   question
12   mark
61   after
6605   the
7   exclamation
39   point

22   you&rsquo;ll
25   accept
6605   the
65   match
19   anywhere
883   on
6605   the
3   line;
19   otherwise
879   it
289   has

924   be

6605   the
2   start.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">135
483   D%
1   !h
112   history
19   12
3   124
983   The
6   ^$home
319   directory
1837   is
5   $home.
3   125
7   Today's

6   `date`.
4   126
9   ***
4   127

3   `whereis
1   ls`
1   131

2   132
296   echo
94   two
2   133
296   echo
16   three
2   134
296   echo
94   two
2   135
112   history
19   12
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
261   A
76   search
129   string
11   ends
277   at
6605   the
281   first
97   word
6   boundary.
181   This
1837   is
113   so
102   it&rsquo;s
19   convenient
3144   to
84   type
23   additional
106   text
84   following
63   without
25   having

924   be

33   part
2059   of
6605   the
76   search
35   string.
111   For
25   example:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">136

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="RetrievingIndividualWords"></a>Retrieving
28   individual
80   words
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
103   To
6   pick
91   off
28   individual
80   words
2059   of
6605   the
34   immediately
32   preceding
29   command,
15   there&rsquo;s
101   some
19   convenient
1   shorthand.
2   <tt>!*</tt>
19   gets
364   all
6605   the
77   argument
4   words:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">137
483   D%
296   echo
410   now
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
410   now
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
1   138

2   !*
3144   to
22   begin

410   now

6605   the

2   139

2   139

6605   the

2   140

1652   </div>
1604   <p>
23   Notice
1061   that
3088   a
112   history
39   substitution
511   can
924   be
1   smashed
37   right
157   up
27   against
176   other
44   literal
19   text.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
106   In
6605   the
11   chapter
883   on
224   editing,
23   additional
4   facilities
1113   for
8   selecting
28   individual
80   words
1041   or
21   doing
3088   a
12   search/replace
380   will
924   be
3   introduced.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="HistoryShortForm"></a>History
3   short-form
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1   Recognizing
91   how
3   frequently
271   one
161   would
90   like
3144   to
53   make
3088   a
63   simple
78   change
3144   to
6605   the
34   immediately
32   preceding
428   command
3144   to
15   correct
3088   a
1   typo,
6605   the
112   history
27   mechanism
15   provides
3088   a
15   short
32   form
1113   for
234   just
1061   that
1   purpose.
10   <tt>%</tt>
49   typed
857   as
6605   the
281   first
172   character
883   on
6605   the
428   command
372   line
8   indicates
1061   that
3088   a
12   search/replace
8   pair
5   follows:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">141
483   D%
296   echo
88   hello
43   world
88   hello
43   world
1   142
483   D%
1   %world%friends%
296   echo
88   hello
8   friends
88   hello
8   friends
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
2   Typing
2   <tt>%%</tt>
33   matches
6605   the
45   beginning
2059   of
6605   the
4   line:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">143
483   D%
1   %%echo
60   %
296   echo
296   echo
88   hello
8   friends
296   echo
88   hello
8   friends
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
12   It&rsquo;s
190   also
44   possible
3144   to
20   refer
3144   to
6605   the
76   search
129   string
1307   in
6605   the
6   replacement
129   string
588   by
191   using
590   an
2   ampersand.
84   (This
43   example
190   also
2   illustrates
1061   that
6605   the
16   trailing
10   <tt>%</tt>
14   isn&rsquo;t
24   required
42   unless
675   you
84   want
3144   to
18   explicitly
12   mark
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
6605   the
1   replacement.)
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">144
483   D%
1   %friends%family,
29   &amp;
2223   and
5   neighbors
296   echo
296   echo
88   hello
4   family,
8   friends
2223   and
5   neighbors
296   echo
88   hello
4   family,
8   friends
2223   and
5   neighbors
1   145
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
3   Obviously,
1061   that
2   raises
6605   the
1   question:
91   how
176   do
675   you
20   put
3088   a
44   literal
5   ampersand
1307   in
6605   the
1   replacement?
1   Simple.
13   Just
20   quote
879   it
920   with
3   <tt>^</tt>,
6605   the
1129   shell
121   escape
37   character.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">145
483   D%
1   %and%^&amp;
296   echo
88   hello
4   family,
8   friends
29   &amp;
5   neighbors
88   hello
4   family,
8   friends
29   &amp;
5   neighbors
1   146
483   D%
34   _

446   <h3>
1   Variables<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="08-History.htm">Previous</a>

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
2   href="#EnvironmentVariables">Environment
48   variables</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#SetVariables">Set
48   variables</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#LocalVariables">Local
48   variables</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#VariableSubstitutions">Variable
6   substitutions</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#nonovar">nonovar</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#HowVariablesAreStored">How
111   variables
650   are
1   stored</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#Arrays">Arrays</a><br/>

1   href="#nullwords">nullwords</a><br/>

55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
23   As
920   with
439   any
7   conventional
5   programming
224   language,
6605   the
1129   shell
15   provides
3088   a
2   facility
1113   for
2   storing
45   values
1307   in
12   variables.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
2   name="EnvironmentVariables"></a>Environment
111   variables
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
16   Some
2059   of
6605   the
111   variables
650   are
33   part
2059   of
6605   the
4   environment,
73   passed
15   along
3144   to
439   any
107   child
20   process.
10   Many
2059   of
6605   the
76   environment
111   variables
380   will
299   have
382   been
33   created
234   just
320   this
8   way,
95   e.g.,
436   set
3144   to
3088   a
105   value
73   passed
15   along
268   when
675   you
87   start
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
640   from
3088   a
16   shortcut
883   on
252   your
6   desktop.
103   To
190   list
47   those
10   currently
13   defined,
270   use
6605   the
99   setenv
47   command.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">146
483   D%
99   setenv
4   COMSPEC
1   C:\WINDOWS\system32\cmd.exe
4   HOME
11   d:\Nicki
6   INCLUDE
1   d:\Nicki\Include
1   LIB
1   d:\Nicki\lib
12   PATH
1   .;d:\Program
14   Files\Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
174   2012
1   x64\Bin;
5   d:\Program
14   Files\Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
174   2012
1   x64\Samples;C:\WINDOWS\system32;
1   C:\WINDOWS
6   PROMPT1
4   $@
2   $CDISK%
2   PROMPT2
4   $@
2   $CDISK?
9   SHELL
5   d:\Program
14   Files\Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
174   2012
2   x64\Bin\csh.exe
7   TABS
61   3
1   TMP
1   e:\tmp
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
7   Variable
88   names
650   are
1   case-preserving
241   but
5   case-insensitive
883   on
12   Windows.
20   They
511   can
924   be
2059   of
19   arbitrary
2   length.
261   A
152   name
64   must
87   start
920   with
590   an
4   upper-
1041   or
2   lower-case
11   alphabetic
172   character
1041   or
1   underscore<tt>_</tt>
1041   or
1   at-sign
1   <tt>@</tt>;
10   remaining
197   characters
193   may
439   any
2059   of
94   these
1041   or
27   decimal
5   digits.
10   Many
2059   of
6605   the
90   environmental
111   variables
299   have
19   specific
3   meanings.
111   For
101   example,
6605   the
7   <tt>PATH</tt>
243   variable
21   tells
105   where
3144   to
43   look
1113   for
40   executable
39   files,
38   etc.
1   Details
6   describing
6605   the
54   meaning
2059   of
197   each
243   variable
650   are
91   given
1307   in
6605   the
35   language
30   reference
7   section.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
13   <tt>setenv</tt>
428   command
511   can
190   also
924   be
281   used
3144   to
38   create
3088   a
257   new
90   environmental
243   variable
1041   or
1   alter
1041   or
26   display
6605   the
105   value
2059   of
590   an
31   existing
1   one:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">147
483   D%
99   setenv
37   zork
527   =
320   this
1837   is
6605   the
37   zork
243   variable
1   148
483   D%
99   setenv
37   zork
37   zork
320   this
1837   is
6605   the
37   zork
243   variable
1   149
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
468   If
6605   the
190   list
2059   of
80   words
78   being
3   assigned
3144   to
6605   the
243   variable
11   includes
439   any
94   special
4   tokens,
102   it&rsquo;s
12   often
33   useful
3144   to
270   use
6605   the
2   parenthesized
3   variant
2059   of
1   <tt>setenv</tt>.
106   In
320   this
101   example,
6605   the
8   <tt>&gt;</tt>
161   would
299   have
382   been
13   confused
857   as
590   an
28   i/o
25   redirection
790   if
879   it
1   weren&rsquo;t
97   inside
1   parenthesis.
23   Notice
1061   that
6605   the
6   parenthesis
650   are
4   stripped
91   off
98   before
6605   the
4   assignment
1837   is
7   made.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">149
483   D%
99   setenv
6   greatest
527   =
1   (At
3   Berkeley,
104   they
5   say
8   4.3
49   &gt;
1   V)
2   150
483   D%
99   setenv
6   greatest
6   greatest
10   At
3   Berkeley,
104   they
5   say
8   4.3
49   &gt;
5   V
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
8   Even
13   though
6605   the
94   special
54   meaning
1837   is
1   lost,
106   text
97   inside
6605   the
6   parenthesis
1837   is
66   still
23   broken
27   down
178   into
25   words,
857   as
26   shown
1307   in
320   this
25   example:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">151
483   D%
99   setenv
3   pdirs
527   =
1   (.;d:\Nicki\bin;d:\Nicki\LastRTM;d:\Nicki;)
1   152
483   D%
99   setenv
3   pdirs
3   pdirs
14   .
30   ;
2   d:\Nicki\bin
30   ;
2   d:\Nicki\LastRTM
30   ;
11   d:\Nicki
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
8   (To
23   avoid
25   having
6605   the
106   text
23   broken
157   up
178   into
25   words,
270   use
110   single
1041   or
25   double
52   quotes
45   around
6605   the
129   string
1   instead.)
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="SetVariables"></a>Set
111   variables
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
21   Set
111   variables
176   do
471   not
51   get
73   passed
3144   to
3088   a
107   child
70   process
241   but
650   are
30   shared
6   among
364   all
20   threads.
103   To
51   get
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
47   those
10   currently
13   defined,
270   use
6605   the
10   <tt>set</tt>
4   command:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">153
483   D%
436   set
1   CDISK
5   D
18   argv
3   cdhome
120   0
1   cdisk
15   d
53   :
53   :
89   path
14   .
2   d:\Nicki\bin
2   d:\Nicki\LastRTM
11   d:\Nicki
5   precision
17   6
53   :
53   :
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
16   Some
2059   of
6605   the
436   set
111   variables
650   are
4   linked
3144   to
6605   the
90   environmental
9   variables:
675   you
78   change
4   one,
2223   and
6605   the
176   other
45   changes
2   too.
111   For
101   example,
89   path
35   contains
6605   the
122   same
34   information
857   as
12   PATH
5   but,
64   because
102   it&rsquo;s
382   been
15   parsed
178   into
28   individual
25   words,
102   it&rsquo;s
12   often
3088   a
49   bit
207   more
1   useful.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
11   On
231   Windows,
320   this
1   linkage
511   can
1   pose
3088   a
49   bit
2059   of
3088   a
6   problem.
12   Since
6605   the
22   convention
1837   is
1061   that
90   environmental
111   variables
650   are
9   supposed
3144   to
924   be
2   case-insensitive,
87   there
3   clearly
1837   is
3088   a
4   conflict
1   between,
1113   for
101   example,
6605   the
12   PATH
90   environmental
2223   and
89   path
436   set
12   variables.
983   The
1930   C
1129   shell

6605   the

675   you

436   set
111   variables
1061   that
4   differ

90   environmental
111   variables
199   only
588   by
3   case)

6605   the
13   <tt>setenv</tt>
2223   and
2   <tt>unsetenv</tt>
2223   and
3   <tt>$<var>var</var></tt>
2223   and

1679   </p>
1604   <p>
10   Many

6605   the
436   set
111   variables

18   predefined

1129   shell

1   handled,

106   In

111   For
101   example,

412   end
1   194
483   D%
296   echo
4   $x
120   0
102   2
35   4
17   6
20   8
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="nullwords"></a>nullwords
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
106   When
675   you
10   index
590   an
1   array,
790   if
6605   the
14   element
675   you
94   specify
37   doesn&rsquo;t
10   exist,
26   that&rsquo;s
56   normally
66   considered
590   an
19   error.
111   For
101   example,
2   <tt>x</tt>
35   contains
44   5
1   words;
35   trying
3144   to
30   reference
3088   a
2   sixth
1   fails:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">195
483   D%
90   calc
1   x[5]
20   csh:
2   Illegal
3   subscript
1307   in
243   variable
30   reference
1   'x[5]'.
8   (To
13   suppress
320   this
8   error,
436   set
2   nullwords
527   =
2   1.)
1652   </div>
983   The
6   <tt>nullwords</tt>
243   variable
1837   is
281   used
3144   to
30   tell
6605   the
1129   shell
1061   that
13   you&rsquo;d
90   like
3144   to
16   ignore
3   subscripting
18   errors
268   when
675   you
47   try
3144   to
13   evaluate
3088   a
243   variable
7   reference.
6   <tt>nullwords</tt>
289   has
227   no
13   effect
53   over
3   subscripting
18   errors
268   when
675   you
47   try
3144   to
436   set
6605   the
105   value
2059   of
3088   a
13   non-existent
2   element.
14   Here
650   are
101   some
4   examples:
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">196
483   D%
436   set
2   nullwords
527   =
214   1
1   197
483   D%
296   echo
106   --
1   "---&gt;$x[999]&lt;---"
1   ---&gt;&lt;---
1   198
483   D%
90   calc
1   x[999]
527   =
1   "does
471   not
1   work"
20   csh:
2   Illegal
3   subscript
1307   in
243   variable
30   reference
1   'x[999]'.
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
270   use
2059   of
6605   the
4   <tt>--</tt>
192   option
2223   and
2059   of
25   double
52   quotes
363   was
1   important:
4   <tt>--</tt>
2   told
296   echo
1061   that
879   it
60   had
2   reached
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
439   any
26   options,
19   allowing
879   it
3144   to
31   print
32   something
1061   that
2   began
920   with
3088   a
27   minus
2   sign.
983   The
52   quotes
132   were
14   used,
1307   in
6605   the
281   first
13   case,
3144   to
28   turn
91   off
2   recognition
2059   of
25   redirection
197   characters
8   <tt>&gt;</tt>
2223   and
3   <tt>&lt;</tt>
241   but
66   still
51   get
6605   the
243   variable
14   substitution.
983   The
33   second
8   time,
879   it
363   was
3144   to
53   make
6605   the
13   string,
1   <tt>does
471   not
1   work</tt>
3088   a
110   single
25   word.
11   (If
675   you
47   try
2   leaving
91   off
6605   the
52   quotes
1041   or
471   not
191   using
1   <tt>--</tt>,
22   you&rsquo;ll
43   see
1061   that
6605   the
106   error
26   messages
650   are
81   what
13   you&rsquo;d
1   expect.)
1679   </p>

222   id="userguidecontent">
446   <h3>
1   Wildcarding<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="09-Variables.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="11-Editing.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="#HomeDirectoryExpansion">Home
319   directory
1   expansion</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#WildcardCharacters">Wildcard
10   characters</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#Ranges">Ranges</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#Alternation">Alternation</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#IndefiniteDirectories">Indefinite
2   directories</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#MatchFailures">Match
1   failures</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#XcopyProblem">Caution:
6605   the
6   copy,
3   xcopy,
15   rename
2223   and
13   del
2   commands</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
3   notion
2059   of
51   wildcarding
1837   is
8   pretty
1   simple:
6605   the
55   user
24   gives
234   just
3088   a
84   few
197   characters
6   describing
6605   the
320   filename
1   he&rsquo;s
25   looking
1113   for
2223   and
110   system
3   fills
1307   in
6605   the
4   rest.
11   With
2   &ldquo;vanilla&rdquo;
231   Windows,
51   wildcarding
1837   is
6605   the
1   responsibility
2059   of
197   each
9   application,
15   based
883   on
6605   the
230   command-line
74   arguments
102   it&rsquo;s
10   given.
2   Typically,
6605   the
27   application
1   designer
1   fulfills
320   this
588   by
1   linking
1307   in
3088   a
7   library
15   routine
201   which
135   does
3088   a
2   simple-minded
1   half-hearted
8   wildcarding.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
1043   Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
135   does
6605   the
51   wildcarding
98   before
9   invoking
6605   the
13   application.
983   The
13   shell&rsquo;s
51   wildcarding
11   includes
4   five
1   components:
40   home
319   directory
3   expansion,
51   wildcarding
19   characters,
3   ranges,
3   alternation
2223   and
4   indefinite
55   directories.
261   A
5   powerful
9   recursive
65   match
8   algorithm
1837   is
1   employed
3144   to
2   guarantee
3088   a
9   sensible
48   result
227   no
7   matter
91   how
16   complex
6605   the
19   pattern.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="HomeDirectoryExpansion"></a>Home
319   directory
17   expansion
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
2   tilde
15   character,
1   <tt>~</tt>,
1837   is
34   recognized
857   as
10   shorthand
1113   for
6605   the
40   home
92   directory.
106   In
6605   the
6   simplest
10   form,
40   we
511   can
270   use
879   it
234   just
588   by
3   itself:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">199
129   D?
296   echo
5   $home
11   d:\Nicki
1   200
483   D%
52   cd
5   ~
1   201
483   D%
52   cd
11   d:\Nicki
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
3   There&rsquo;s
190   also
10   shorthand
1113   for
12   children
1041   or
1   siblings
2059   of
6605   the
40   home
8   directory:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">202
483   D%
52   cd
6   ~\samples
1   203
483   D%
52   cd
1   d:\Nicki\Samples
1   204
483   D%
52   cd
1   ~Jeff
1   205
483   D%
52   cd
1   d:\Jeff
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="WildcardCharacters"></a>Wildcard
197   characters
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
45   wildcard
19   characters,
16   <tt>*</tt>
2223   and
1   <tt>?</tt>,
17   provide
10   shorthand
1113   for
3   &ldquo;match
439   any
1   string&rdquo;
2223   and
3   &ldquo;match
439   any
110   single
1   character,&rdquo;
8   respectively.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
4   Suppose
6605   the
40   home
319   directory
24   contained
6605   the
84   following
1   contents:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">206
483   D%
52   cd
5   ~
1   207
483   D%
91   ls
1   <b>bcs
1   mandel
1   sh</b>
2   ex.rc
1   release.csh
1   <b>bix
1   mba
1   testcode</b>
1   icon.ico
2   ring.ico
1   <b>channel.one
2   online
1   util</b>
17   login.csh
1   snapshot.csh
1   <b>dial
1   postscpt
1   word</b>
5   mail
26   startup.csh
1   <b>excel
1   regressn</b>
2   backup.csh
1   Ozzie.jpg
2   vi.ini
1   <b>games
1   resume</b>
4   brite.csh
1   popup.txt
1   <b>icon
1   samples</b>
1   class.txt
1   prime.c
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
84   following
43   example
10   shows
6605   the
270   use
2059   of
3   <tt>?</tt>
3144   to
65   match
439   any
110   single
37   character.
1   Wildcard
27   results
650   are
80   always
26   shown
2   alphabetically
1307   in
32   lower
43   case.
29   No
3   distinction
1837   is
56   made
64   between
103   directories
2223   and
52   files.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">208
483   D%
296   echo
1   ????
1   dial
5   icon
5   mail
2   util
97   word
1   209
483   D%
296   echo
1   b??
2   bcs
3   bix
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
16   <tt>*</tt>
511   can
65   match
29   zero
1041   or
207   more
19   arbitrary
197   characters
42   except
3   <tt>:</tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>\</tt>;
1307   in
2   contrast
3144   to
2   Windows-style
9   wildcarding,
16   <tt>*</tt>
511   can
65   match
1   <tt>.</tt>.
468   If
87   there
650   are
37   ordinary
197   characters
1307   in
6605   the
4   pattern,
104   they
64   must
190   also
924   be
14   matched.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">210
483   D%
296   echo
2   *mp*e*
45   samples
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
13   Because
6605   the
51   wildcarding
1837   is
58   done
98   before
6605   the
428   command
1837   is
21   invoked
4   (without
6605   the
428   command
115   even
78   being
1   aware),
51   wildcarding
511   can
115   even
924   be
58   done
883   on
3088   a
52   cd
4   command:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">211
483   D%
52   cd
3   !$
52   cd
2   *mp*e*
1   212
483   D%
52   cd
9   d:\Nicki\samples
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
15   Wildcarding
1837   is
35   most
1   emphatically
471   not
3   restricted
3144   to
33   matches
199   only
27   against
3088   a
110   single
319   directory
4   level.
30   Here&rsquo;s
590   an
43   example
1061   that
18   wildcards
17   across
364   all
6605   the
1   subdirectories,
25   looking
1113   for
3   <tt>.c</tt>
294   files
1061   that
22   begin
920   with
1   <tt>a</tt>.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">213
483   D%
52   cd
10   ..
1   214
483   D%
296   echo
5   *\a*.c
4   samples\args.c
5   sh\allocate.c
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
15   Wildcarding
511   can
115   even
924   be
58   done
27   against
2   driveletters.
111   For
25   example:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">215
483   D%
296   echo
1   *:\*\q*
1   i:\mail\quotes.doc
1   i:\tmp\query.out
1   j:\nicki\quantity.disc
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
106   When
51   wildcarding
27   against
1   driveletters,
6605   the
1129   shell
1   restricts
6605   the
436   set
2059   of
55   drives
879   it
380   will
76   search
27   down
3144   to
234   just
47   those
152   specified
588   by
6605   the
5   <tt>DRIVEMASK</tt>
76   environment
47   variable.
468   If
675   you
30   don&rsquo;t
94   specify
3088   a
3   <tt>DRIVEMASK</tt>,
6605   the
117   default
1837   is
364   all
55   drives
42   except
6605   the
3   floppies
3   <tt>a:</tt>
2223   and
1   <tt>b:</tt>.
983   The
76   search
1837   is
3   restricted
113   so
675   you
30   don&rsquo;t
5   waste
96   time
35   trying
3144   to
44   access
4   slow
4   removable
16   media
1061   that
193   may
471   not
115   even
924   be
2   ready.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Ranges"></a>Ranges
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
3   Ranges
5   describe
3088   a
436   set
2059   of
19   characters,
439   any
271   one
2059   of
201   which
380   will
924   be
14   matched.
12   It&rsquo;s
152   specified
857   as
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
4   acceptable
197   characters
97   inside
4   <tt>[<var>...</var>]</tt>
3   brackets.
983   The
22   range
1   <tt>[be]</tt>
99   means
93   either
3   <tt>b</tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>e</tt>;
1   <tt>[b-e]</tt>
1837   is
10   shorthand
1113   for
439   any
172   character
1307   in
6605   the
24   sequence
3   <tt>b</tt>
109   through
1   <tt>e</tt>.
2   Within
6605   the
2   brackets,
439   any
165   number
2059   of
1   hyphenated
39   sequences
2223   and
110   single
197   characters
511   can
9   pasted
271   one
61   after
6605   the
176   other
1307   in
439   any
3   order.
111   For
101   example,
1   <tt>[a-cu-zgkmp]</tt>
1837   is
3088   a
6   perfectly
13   legal
9   range.
14   Here
650   are
3088   a
8   couple
3   examples.
23   Notice
1061   that
13   ranges
511   can
190   also
924   be
281   used
920   with
2   driveletters.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">216
483   D%
296   echo
1   [be]*
2   backup.csh
2   bcs
3   bix
4   brite.csh
2   ex.rc
1   excel
1   217
483   D%
1   echo[d-g]:\[s-t]*
1   d:\taxes
2   d:\tmp
1   e:\spool
1   e:\startup.cmd
1   e:\temp
1   e:\toolkit.sys
1   f:\swap
1   f:\tmp
1   f:\toys
1   g:\skip
1   g:\temp
2   g:\tmp
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
21   An
4   exclusion
22   range
1837   is
63   written
857   as
3088   a
436   set
2059   of
197   characters
97   inside
6605   the
1   brackets
1061   that
29   starts
920   with
3088   a
4   circumflex.
3   It&rsquo;ll
65   match
439   any
110   single
172   character
471   not
1307   in
6605   the
9   range.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">218
483   D%
296   echo
1   [^a-t]*
2   util
2   vi.ini
97   word
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Alternation"></a>Alternation
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1   Alternation,
152   specified
920   with
2   <tt>{<var>...</var>}</tt>
1   braces,
1837   is
3088   a
10   shorthand
90   way
2059   of
14   specifying
1061   that
364   all
6605   the
7   combinations
2059   of
1   frontparts
2223   and
1   backparts
131   should
924   be
2   generated.
29   There
14   isn&rsquo;t
439   any
2   requirement
1061   that
6605   the
52   filenames
5   constructed
38   actually
25   exist.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">219
483   D%
296   echo
1   {zork,gadzooks}.csh
1   zork.csh
1   gadzooks.csh
1   220
483   D%
296   echo
1   {a,b}{c,d}{e,f}
1   ace
1   acf
1   ade
1   adf
1   bce
1   bcf
1   bde
1   bdf
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
1   Alternation
511   can
924   be
3   combined
11   arbitrarily
920   with
6605   the
176   other
45   wildcard
1   constructs:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">221
483   D%
296   echo
1   {[bc],*r}*i*
3   bix
4   brite.csh
4   brite.csh
2   ring.ico
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="IndefiniteDirectories"></a>Indefinite
103   directories
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
1   ellipsis,
2   <tt>...</tt>,
1837   is
590   an
4   indefinite
1   definite
319   directory
4   wildcard.
3   It&rsquo;ll
65   match
29   zero
1041   or
207   more
19   arbitrary
319   directory
13   levels
106   --
34   whatever
879   it
16   takes
3144   to
53   make
6605   the
16   rest
2059   of
6605   the
45   wildcard
19   match.
103   To
924   be
34   recognized
857   as
3088   a
5   wildcard,
6605   the
7   context
64   must
14   indicate
102   it&rsquo;s
31   really
3088   a
6   filename,
11   i.e.,
879   it
64   must
924   be
15   preceded
588   by
1   <tt>\</tt>,
1   <tt>/</tt>,
7   <tt>~</tt>
1041   or
3   <tt>:</tt>
1041   or
42   followed
588   by
6   <tt>\</tt>
1041   or
3   <tt>/</tt>.
111   For
101   example,
3144   to
38   find
364   all
6605   the
1   <tt>.inf</tt>
294   files
19   anywhere
883   on
6605   the
4   <tt>C:</tt>
12   drive,
271   one
55   might
3   type:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">222
483   D%
91   ls
1   d:\...\xm*
1   d:\Nicki\book\XmlConcepts.doc
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
23   As
920   with
364   all
6605   the
45   wildcard
1   constructs,
6605   the
4   indefinite
319   directory
12   construct
511   can
924   be
281   used
231   completely
3   arbitrarily.
159   It
511   can
115   even
924   be
281   used
35   several
8   times
1307   in
6605   the
122   same
4   wildcard.
58   But
176   do
8   notice
790   if
675   you
176   do
7   that,
87   there
1837   is
3088   a
9   possibility
2059   of
9   getting
6605   the
122   same
383   file
23   listed
207   more
171   than
1   once:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">223
483   D%
91   ls
1   f:\...\a*\...\s*
2   f:\u\Andrew\Accounts\Secret
2   f:\u\Andrew\Accounts\Secret
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
181   This
511   can
9   happen
790   if
15   there&rsquo;s
207   more
171   than
271   one
44   possible
90   way
3144   to
65   match
6605   the
122   same
5   pathname.
106   In
320   this
101   example,
6605   the
1   <tt>a*</tt>
33   part
76   could
16   matched
93   either
1   <tt>Andrew</tt>
1041   or
2   <tt>Accounts</tt>
920   with
6605   the
281   first
3   <tt>...</tt>
26   matching
93   either
1   <tt>u\Andrew</tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>u</tt>
2223   and
6605   the
33   second
3   <tt>...</tt>
26   matching
93   either
2   <tt>Accounts</tt>
1041   or
234   just
29   zero
1   levels.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="MatchFailures"></a>Match
5   failures
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
106   When
675   you
94   specify
3088   a
24   sequence
2059   of
45   wildcard
16   patterns
2223   and
12   none
2059   of
72   them
3   match,
102   it&rsquo;s
56   normally
35   treated
857   as
590   an
19   error.
106   In
320   this
101   example,
6605   the
281   first
428   command
39   causes
590   an
106   error
64   because
15   there&rsquo;s
227   no
383   file
1041   or
319   directory
152   name
920   with
3088   a
1   &ldquo;z&rdquo;
1307   in
61   it.
983   The
33   second
428   command
3   executes
63   without
106   error
2   because,
94   out
2059   of
6605   the
24   sequence
2059   of
2   patterns,
15   there&rsquo;s
277   at
24   least
271   one
19   match.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">224
483   D%
296   echo
6   *z*
20   csh:
15   Wildcarding
17   failed
3144   to
15   produce
439   any
20   matches.
103   To
13   suppress
320   this
8   error,
436   set
11   nonomatch
527   =
214   1
4   (pass
4   through)
1041   or
102   2
4   (discard).
1   225
483   D%
296   echo
6   *z*
1   sa*
45   samples
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
106   In
320   this
4   context,
6605   the
6   fact
1061   that
3   alternation
96   caused
32   something
3144   to
924   be
14   generated
1837   is
471   not
6605   the
122   same
857   as
3088   a
19   match.
106   In
6605   the
71   next
101   example,
1   <tt>{zork,gadzooks,*z*}.csh</tt>
1837   is
6605   the
122   same
857   as
1   <tt>zork.csh</tt>
1   <tt>gadzooks.csh</tt>
1   <tt>*z*.csh</tt>;
199   only
6605   the
77   last
14   element
1   involves
439   any
3   matching,
2223   and
879   it
3   fails.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">226
483   D%
296   echo
1   {zork,gadzooks,*z*}.csh
20   csh:
15   Wildcarding
17   failed
3144   to
15   produce
439   any
20   matches.
103   To
13   suppress
320   this
8   error,
436   set
11   nonomatch
527   =
214   1
4   (pass
4   through)
1041   or
102   2
4   (discard).
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
3   <tt>nonomatch</tt>
243   variable
30   lets
675   you
41   control
91   how
3088   a
45   wildcard
8   failure
1837   is
2   treated.
159   It
49   works
234   just
6605   the
90   way
8   nonovar
49   works
268   when
675   you
30   reference
3144   to
3088   a
13   non-existent
47   variable.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">227
483   D%
436   set
11   nonomatch
527   =
214   1
1   228
483   D%
296   echo
6   *z*
6   *z*
1   229
483   D%
1   !s:s/1/2/
436   set
11   nonomatch
527   =
102   2
1   230
483   D%
4   !e
296   echo
6   *z*
1   231
483   D%
1   !s:s/2/0/
436   set
11   nonomatch
527   =
120   0
2   232
483   D%
4   !e
296   echo
6   *z*
20   csh:
15   Wildcarding
17   failed
3144   to
15   produce
439   any
20   matches.
103   To
13   suppress
320   this
8   error,
436   set
11   nonomatch
527   =
214   1
4   (pass
4   through)
1041   or
102   2
4   (discard).
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="XcopyProblem"></a>Caution:
6605   the
6   copy,
3   xcopy,
15   rename
2223   and
13   del
62   commands
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1043   Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
3   expands
94   out
18   wildcards
98   before
879   it
4   invokes
6605   the
27   application
675   you
32   name.
181   This
1837   is
471   not
81   what
6605   the
5   <tt>copy</tt>,
5   <tt>xcopy</tt>,
1   <tt>rename</tt>,
2223   and
10   <tt>del</tt>
62   commands
1   expect!
4   Suppose
87   there
650   are
94   two
39   files,
1   <tt>file.a</tt>
2223   and
2   <tt>file.b</tt>
883   on
252   your
20   diskette
1   <tt>a:</tt>,
1061   that
675   you
11   wanted
3144   to
60   copy
3144   to
252   your
213   current
26   drive.
35   Under
5   <tt>cmd.exe</tt>,
879   it
161   would
924   be
3   natural
3144   to
3   type:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
2   class="codesample">[D:\NICKI]
4   xcopy.exe
1   a:*.*
4   Source
294   files
650   are
78   being
2   read...
2   A:FILE.A
1   A:FILE.B
102   2
2   file(s)
5   copied.
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
20   destination
1837   is
1   implicit.
7   <tt>xcopy</tt>
3   understands
6605   the
51   wildcarding
3144   to
19   mean
2   &ldquo;copy
26   everything
883   on
112   drive
3   <tt>a:</tt>
3144   to
6605   the
213   current
83   disk
2223   and
2   directory.&rdquo;
39   That
1837   is
471   not
81   what
161   would
9   happen
126   under
6605   the
1930   C
2   shell!
13   Because
6605   the
45   wildcard
161   would
924   be
11   expanded
4   first,
879   it
161   would
5   act
46   instead
857   as
790   if
675   you
60   had
2   typed:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
2   class="codesample">[D:\NICKI]
4   xcopy.exe
1   a:file.a
1   a:file.b
4   Source
294   files
650   are
78   being
2   read...
2   A:FILE.A
214   1
2   file(s)
5   copied.
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
9   Do
675   you
43   see
81   what
1   happens?
468   If
51   wildcarding
1837   is
58   done
4   first,
6605   the
7   <tt>xcopy</tt>
428   command
7   sees
234   just
6605   the
94   two
52   filenames
2223   and
3   figures
675   you
19   mean
3144   to
60   copy
271   one
37   right
53   over
6605   the
4   other.
2   <tt>file.b</tt>
1837   is
1   lost!
111   For
320   this
5   reason,
6605   the
17   normal
26   <tt>startup.csh</tt>
383   file
35   contains
101   some
2   carefully
5   constructed
31   aliases
2223   and
25   procedures
3144   to
9   intercept
6605   the
5   <tt>copy</tt>,
5   <tt>xcopy</tt>,
10   <tt>rename</tt>
2223   and
10   <tt>del</tt>
2   commands:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
2   class="codesample">proc
2   safecopy(files)
17   cmd
19   /c
60   copy
9   $files;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
22   s;
15   unlocal
31   s
412   end
164   alias
60   copy
10   (local
22   s;
284   @
31   s
527   =
4   nowild;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
18   1;
2   safecopy)
110   proc
2   safexcopy(files)
4   xcopy.exe
9   $files;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
22   s;
15   unlocal
31   s
412   end
164   alias
4   xcopy
10   (local
22   s;
284   @
31   s
527   =
4   nowild;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
18   1;
2   safexcopy)
110   proc
2   saferename(files)
17   cmd
19   /c
15   rename
9   $files;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
22   s;
15   unlocal
31   s
412   end
164   alias
15   rename
10   (local
22   s;
284   @
31   s
527   =
4   nowild;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
18   1;
2   saferename)
164   alias
3   ren
15   rename
110   proc
2   safedel(files)
17   cmd
19   /c
13   del
9   $files;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
22   s;
15   unlocal
31   s
412   end
164   alias
13   del
10   (local
22   s;
284   @
31   s
527   =
4   nowild;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
18   1;
2   safedel)
164   alias
4   erase
13   del
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
90   way
320   this
49   works
588   by
5   saving
6605   the
213   current
105   value
2059   of
1   <tt>nowild</tt>
12   (which
21   tells
57   whether
51   wildcarding
1837   is
131   should
924   be
1   done),
9   turning
91   off
9   wildcarding,
9   invoking
6605   the
5   <tt>copy</tt>,
5   <tt>xcopy</tt>,
10   <tt>rename</tt>
1041   or
10   <tt>del</tt>
29   command,
189   then
5   restoring
6605   the
51   wildcarding
5   state.
2   <tt>s</tt>
1837   is
3088   a
6   temporary
243   variable
1061   that
19   gets
7   discarded
61   after
122   its
382   been
31   used.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
1   Be
10   sure
3144   to
80   always
14   invoke
5   <tt>copy</tt>,
5   <tt>xcopy</tt>,
10   <tt>rename</tt>
2223   and
10   <tt>del</tt>
17   via
94   these
6   aliases.
468   If
675   you
8   encounter
176   other
16   applications
1061   that
31   really
64   must
176   do
32   their
51   own
9   wildcarding,
270   use
320   this
122   same
1   technique
920   with
21   them.
1679   </p>

446   <h3>
1   Editing<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="10-Wildcarding.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="12-Quoting.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="#WordSelections">Word
1   selections</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#SearchReplace">Search/replace</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#PathnameEditing">Pathname
20   editing</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#SpecializedOperations">Specialized
1   operations</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#HistoryEdits">History
1   edits</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
3   Often,
6605   the
106   text
15   returned
588   by
3088   a
3314   <a
1   href="08-History.htm">history</a>,
3314   <a
1   href="09-Variables.htm#VariableSubstitutions">variable</a>
1041   or
3314   <a
1   href="07-IORedirection.htm#CommandSubstitution">command
3   substitution</a>
14   isn&rsquo;t
11   quite
81   what
675   you
7   want.
111   For
101   example,
675   you
193   may
84   want
3144   to
10   select
199   only
28   certain
25   words,
176   do
3088   a
3   search/replace,
1041   or
3   manipulate
3088   a
320   filename
26   that&rsquo;s
382   been
3   returned.
983   The
57   editing
4   facilities
17   provide
94   these
1   capabilities.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
12   examples
1307   in
320   this
11   chapter
32   show
3088   a
1   sampling
2059   of
25   various
7   combinations
2059   of
57   editing
62   commands
2223   and
9   types
2059   of
4   substitutions.
29   There
44   simply
14   isn&rsquo;t
1   room
3144   to
32   show
364   all
6605   the
2   possibilities
9   nor
1837   is
87   there
31   really
3088   a
44   need
2   to:
920   with
94   two
6   exceptions
1   (<tt>:%</tt>and
1   <tt>:p</tt>),
439   any
57   editing
428   command
511   can
924   be
8   applied
27   against
439   any
39   substitution
84   type
1041   or
27   against
6605   the
48   result
2059   of
55   another
57   editing
47   command.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="WordSelections"></a>Word
1   selections
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="38-SubstitutionModifiers.htm">Editing
1   modifiers</a>
22   begin
920   with
3088   a
1   colon,
1   <tt>:</tt>,
42   followed
588   by
590   an
57   editing
47   command.
150   You
511   can
10   select
80   words
93   either
588   by
165   number
1041   or
1   symbolically:
4   first,
4   last,
6   all,
38   etc.
14   Here
650   are
12   examples
2059   of
6605   the
1   <tt>:*</tt>,
2   <tt>:$</tt>
2223   and
2   <tt>:^</tt>
10   modifiers
3144   to
10   select
6   all,
4   last,
2223   and
281   first
77   argument
25   words,
8   respectively.
23   Notice
1061   that
439   any
165   number
2059   of
57   editing
10   modifiers
193   may
1   strung
6   together.
111   For
101   example,
1   <tt>:*:^</tt>
99   means
6605   the
281   first
77   argument
97   word
1   (word
17   1)
2059   of
6605   the
24   sequence
3   formed
2059   of
364   all
6605   the
253   original
77   argument
25   words,
11   i.e.,
97   word
23   2.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">233
483   D%
296   echo
12   Finally,
410   now
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
12   Finally,
410   now
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
1   234
483   D%
296   echo
1   !!:$
96   time
1   235

1652   </div>
1604   <p>
159   It
1837   is
190   also
44   possible
3144   to
10   select
80   words
588   by
9   indexing
109   through
6605   the
10   array
19   associated
920   with
3088   a
91   given
14   substitution.
983   The
80   words
650   are
6   counted
640   from
5   zero.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">236

296   echo

6605   the

1604   <p>

2059   of
80   words
511   can
190   also
924   be
152   specified
920   with
3088   a
5   hyphen
64   between
6605   the
45   beginning
2223   and
9   ending
97   word
1   indices.
106   In
320   this
4   context,
6605   the
27   minus
11   sign
8   indicates
3088   a
7   range,
471   not
1   subtraction.
1679   </p>

1837   is
3088   a

3088   a

1113   for
8   selecting
6605   the

97   word
1061   that
2   triggered
6605   the
2   match:

1   class="codesample">239

1652   </div>
1604   <p>
45   Each
2059   of
6605   the
16   three
3   symbolic

2223   and

924   be
281   used
19   anywhere
3088   a
27   decimal
97   word

924   be
3   acceptable.

25   example:

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="SearchReplace"></a>Search/replace
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
261   A
12   search/replace
18   operation
20   looks
1113   for
2223   and
1   replaces
3088   a
63   simple
172   character
35   string.
1   (For
47   those
1   familiar
920   with
28   such
4   things,
879   it
135   does
471   not
270   use
37   regular
1   expressions.)
468   If
6605   the
76   search
129   string
14   isn&rsquo;t
34   given,
6605   the
271   one
281   used
77   last
96   time
1837   is
281   used
6   again.
468   If
6605   the
12   replace
129   string
35   contains
590   an
1   ampersand,
3   <tt>&amp;</tt>,
1061   that
14   isn&rsquo;t
8   escaped
920   with
6605   the
2   circumflex,
102   it&rsquo;s
11   expanded
178   into
6605   the
76   search
35   string.
14   Here
650   are
3088   a
84   few
3   examples.
23   Notice
1061   that
5   putting
3088   a
2   <tt>g</tt>
277   at
6605   the
87   start
2059   of
590   an
18   operation
19   makes
879   it
1   &ldquo;global.&rdquo;
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">241

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="PathnameEditing"></a>Pathname
57   editing
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
11   Another
436   set
2059   of
44   operators
42   allows
52   filenames
3144   to
924   be
8   easily
1   manipulated.
23   As
920   with
6605   the
12   search/replace
3   operator,
3314   <a
1   href="39-PathnameEditing.htm">pathname
4   editing</a>
1837   is
56   normally
8   applied
3144   to
199   only
6605   the
281   first
18   operand
1   word;
790   if
675   you
84   want
6605   the
18   operation
1   performed
883   on
364   all
6605   the
25   words,
675   you
64   must
53   make
879   it
1   global.
106   In
320   this
101   example,
6605   the
4   <tt>:h</tt>
1   (head)
40   operator
1837   is
14   used,
201   which
32   returns
6605   the
152   name
2059   of
6605   the
319   directory
50   containing
6605   the
91   given
96   file.
1679   </p>

1   class="codesample">244

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="SpecializedOperations"></a>Specialized
23   operations
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1   Specialized
23   operations
650   are
10   provided
1113   for
5   scanning
3088   a
172   character
129   string
2223   and
11   breaking
879   it
157   up
178   into
80   words
2223   and
2   applying
52   quotes
45   around
197   each
25   word.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
2   <tt>:x</tt>
40   operator
1113   for
11   breaking
157   up
3088   a
129   string
178   into
25   words,
2   single-quoting
197   each
8   word,
1837   is
14   particularly
33   useful
1113   for
13   parsing
106   text
125   read
920   with
6605   the
2   getline
1   pseudo-variable,
201   which
80   always
32   returns
6605   the
372   line
125   read
857   as
3088   a
110   single
172   character
1   string:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">249

527   =

49   typed

111   data
527   =
1   $data:x
1   252
483   D%

2   $#data
2   $data
21   10

22   I
49   typed
106   --

49   &lt;
106   --
1307   in

1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
2   <tt>:q</tt>
40   operator
4   pastes
110   single
20   quote
2   marks
45   around
23   every
97   word
1307   in
6605   the
18   operand
39   list.
23   As
8   we&rsquo;ll
43   see
1307   in
6605   the

4   prevents

6   further
5   wildcard,

1041   or

11   done.
1679   </p>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="HistoryEdits"></a>History
2   edits
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
111   For
3314   <a
3   href="34-HistoryRecall.htm">history
1   substitutions</a>,
6605   the
2   <tt>:p</tt>
40   operator
511   can
924   be
281   used
3144   to
58   cause
6605   the
48   result
2059   of
6605   the
112   history
39   substitution
3144   to
924   be
6   echoed
2223   and
6   entered
178   into
6605   the
112   history
190   list
241   but
1113   for
6605   the
428   command
471   not
3144   to
924   be
5   executed.
181   This
1837   is
5   helpful
268   when
23   you&rsquo;re
35   trying
3088   a
1   complicated
29   edit
2223   and
471   not
10   sure
790   if
6605   the
48   result
1837   is
17   going
3144   to
924   be
81   what
675   you
7   want.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">255
483   D%
1   !?Fin:p
296   echo
6   Finally
4   256
483   D%
4   !!
296   echo
6   Finally
6   Finally
1   257
483   D%
34   _

446   <h3>
2   Quoting<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="11-Editing.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="13-Expressions.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="#DoubleQuotes">Double
2   quotes</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#SingleQuotes">Single
2   quotes</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#ShellEscapeCharacter">Shell
121   escape
2   character</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#QuotingJustPartOfAWord">Quoting
234   just
33   part
2059   of
3088   a
1   word</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#Wildcarding">Wildcarding
920   with
94   special
10   characters</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
1129   shell
289   has
35   several
3314   <a
2   href="36-Quoting.htm">quoting
1   mechanisms</a>
1113   for
2   marking
3088   a
9   section
2059   of
3088   a
428   command
1113   for
94   special
3   processing.
15   One
2059   of
7   them,
428   command
7   substitution,
201   which
55   uses
6605   the
1   <tt>`<var>...</var>`</tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>``<var>...</var>``</tt>
2   syntax,
1837   is
3   discussed
1307   in
6605   the
11   chapter
883   on
3314   <a
1   href="07-IORedirection.htm#CommandSubstitution">i/o
1   redirection</a>.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
176   other
9   quoting
4   mechanisms
1   focus
207   more
44   simply
883   on
6605   the
33   problem
2059   of
4   overriding
6605   the
94   special
1   meanings
1061   that
28   certain
197   characters
4   have.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="DoubleQuotes"></a>Double
52   quotes
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
2   Double
52   quotes
650   are
2059   of
270   use
268   when
675   you
84   want
3144   to
28   pass
3088   a
172   character
129   string
50   containing
3088   a
67   space
1041   or
176   other
97   word
10   separator
3144   to
590   an
13   application.
10   Normally,
790   if
675   you
26   called
3088   a
1930   C
1   program,
879   it
161   would
43   see
94   these
80   words
857   as
48   separate
7   <tt>argv</tt>
8   entries
46   instead
2059   of
3088   a
110   single
172   character
2   string;
25   double
52   quotes
4   prevents
320   this
1   breakup
178   into
27   words.
12   We
511   can
3   demonstrate
320   this
191   using
6605   the
63   simple
2   <tt>myecho</tt>
18   program
1307   in
6605   the
4   <tt>Samples</tt>
319   directory
201   which
35   prints
94   out
6605   the
7   <tt>argv</tt>
190   list
879   it
1   receives
920   with
110   single
52   quotes
45   around
197   each
1   entry:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">257
483   D%
52   cd
6   ~\samples
1   258
483   D%
15   myecho
88   hello
43   world
7   'myecho'
3   'hello'
3   'world'
8   arg
38   length
527   =
4   19
197   characters
1   259
483   D%
15   myecho
9   "hello
7   world"
7   'myecho'
1   'hello
1   world'
8   arg
38   length
527   =
4   19
197   characters
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
2   Double
52   quotes
190   also
28   turn
91   off
6605   the
94   special
54   meaning
2059   of
6605   the
25   various
45   wildcard
197   characters
2223   and
6605   the
110   single
1   quote:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">260
483   D%
296   echo
2   "*
22   isn't
3088   a
45   wildcard
172   character
97   inside
1   quotes"
41   *
22   isn't
3088   a
45   wildcard
172   character
97   inside
52   quotes
1   261
483   D%
296   echo
3   "~"
5   ~
1   262
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
1   Command,
112   history
2223   and
243   variable
34   substitutions
97   inside
25   double
52   quotes
650   are
66   still
3   done:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">262
483   D%
296   echo
1   "***
983   The
40   home
319   directory
1837   is
5   $home
1   ***"
9   ***
983   The
40   home
319   directory
1837   is
11   d:\Nicki
9   ***
1   263
483   D%
296   echo
2   "`echo
1   ~`"
11   d:\Nicki
1   264
483   D%
296   echo
1   "myecho.c
1837   is
1   `wc
27   -l
49   &lt;
1   myecho.c`
111   lines
1   long"
6   myecho.c
1837   is
5   24
111   lines
53   long
1   265
483   D%
296   echo
1   "!?samples"
296   echo
4   "cd
2   ~\samples"
52   cd
6   ~\samples
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="SingleQuotes"></a>Single
52   quotes
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
11   Single
52   quotes
650   are
3088   a
20   little
207   more
2   brute
6   force
90   way
3144   to
28   turn
91   off
94   special
3   meanings.
1   Wildcards,
111   variables
2223   and
428   command
34   substitutions
650   are
364   all
35   treated
857   as
37   ordinary
19   text.
15   Only
112   history
35   references
650   are
34   recognized
97   inside
110   single
17   quotes.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">266
483   D%
296   echo
2   '*'
41   *
1   267
483   D%
296   echo
2   '$cwd'
1   $cwd
1   268
483   D%
296   echo
1   '`echo
1   hello`'
7   `echo
3   hello`
1   269
483   D%
296   echo
1   '!?samples'
296   echo
1   'echo
4   "cd
1   ~\samples"'
296   echo
4   "cd
2   ~\samples"
1   270
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
159   It
1837   is
471   not
14   necessary
3144   to
20   quote
590   an
33   entire
25   word.
12   It&rsquo;s
44   possible
10   (and
12   often
1   useful)
3144   to
1   selectively
20   quote
234   just
857   as
30   much
857   as
3   desired.
983   The
9   quoting
197   characters
650   are
9   processed
94   out
234   just
98   before
9   invoking
6605   the
47   command.
1   Example:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">270
483   D%
296   echo
2   'no'w
1837   is
1   "t"h'e'
7   `echo
1   time`
410   now
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="ShellEscapeCharacter"></a>Shell
121   escape
172   character
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
1129   shell
121   escape
172   character
1837   is
56   normally
6605   the
2   circumflex,
1   <tt>^</tt>.
159   It
289   has
94   two
1   uses:
32   preceding
439   any
2059   of
6605   the
94   special
19   characters,
879   it
20   turns
91   off
1061   that
94   special
5   meaning.
106   When
42   followed
588   by
590   an
11   alphabetic
172   character
1041   or
18   hex
1041   or
15   octal
15   number,
879   it
511   can
924   be
281   used
3144   to
2   enter
72   binary
111   data
1041   or
197   characters
1061   that
3   couldn&rsquo;t
8   easily
924   be
13   typed.
103   To
51   get
3088   a
44   literal
121   escape
15   character,
84   type
94   two
9   escapes
1307   in
3088   a
5   row.
30   These
19   specific
121   escape
39   sequences
299   have
94   special
2   meaning:
1679   </p>
10   <table
1   cellpadding="0"
1   border="0"
1   width="75%">
851   <tr>
776   <td
1   valign="top"
2   style="width:80px">
2   <tt>^a</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
7   Audible
6   Alert
6   (Bell)
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
993   <td>
2   <tt>^r</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
11   Carriage
13   Return
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
993   <td>
2   <tt>^b</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
5   BackSpace
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
993   <td>
2   <tt>^t</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
30   Tab
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
993   <td>
2   <tt>^f</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
7   Form
9   Feed
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
993   <td>
2   <tt>^v</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
7   Vertical
30   Tab
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
993   <td>
2   <tt>^n</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
15   NewLine
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
993   <td>
5   <tt>^^</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
11   Single
15   escapesym
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>
1604   <p>
10   At
6605   the
44   very
412   end
2059   of
3088   a
31   line,
6605   the
121   escape
289   has
3088   a
94   special
2   meaning:
6605   the
71   next
372   line
1837   is
3088   a
8   continuation
75   line.
8   Inside
3088   a
17   quoted
13   string,
6605   the
1   <tt>^</tt>-newline
16   combination
380   will
924   be
12   replaced
920   with
3088   a
63   simple
1   newline;
19   anywhere
4   else,
6605   the
16   combination
1837   is
234   just
29   turned
178   into
3088   a
13   space.
983   The
176   other
94   special
97   case
1837   is
268   when
879   it
34   immediately
1   follows<tt>[</tt>.
12   Since
1   <tt>[^<var>...</var>]</tt>
1837   is
3088   a
45   wildcard
4   exclusion
7   range,
6605   the
12   <tt>^</tt>
1307   in
320   this
97   case
1837   is
35   treated
857   as
3088   a
44   literal
172   character
113   so
675   you
14   won&rsquo;t
299   have
3144   to
84   type
94   two
2059   of
72   them
1307   in
3088   a
5   row.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
12   Escape
197   characters
102   work
115   even
97   inside
110   single
1041   or
25   double
17   quotes.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">271
483   D%
296   echo
410   now
34   ^
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
410   now
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
1   272
483   D%
296   echo
2   "now
34   ^
1837   is
6605   the
1   time"
410   now
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
1   273
483   D%
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="QuotingJustPartOfAWord"></a>Quoting
234   just
33   part
2059   of
3088   a
9   Word
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
12   It&rsquo;s
44   possible
3144   to
2   combine
6605   the
9   quoting
4   mechanisms
1041   or
270   use
72   them
883   on
234   just
6605   the
33   part
2059   of
3088   a
129   string
675   you
84   want
1   quoted.
111   For
101   example,
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">273
483   D%
296   echo
1   '$cwd='$cwd
1   $cwd=d:\Nicki
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
30   Here&rsquo;s
55   another
101   example,
7   searching
109   through
3088   a
29   series
2059   of
10   <tt>.csh</tt>
39   files,
25   looking
1113   for
47   those
1061   that
650   are
8   self-loading
5   procedures.
111   For
101   example,
40   we
511   can
2   spot
1061   that
5   whereis.csh
1837   is
8   self-loading
64   because
879   it
35   contains
3088   a
372   line
90   like
5   this:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">whereis
43   $argv
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
103   To
43   look
1113   for
30   occurrences
2059   of
320   this
4   sort,
40   we
55   might
23   loop
109   through
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
10   <tt>.csh</tt>
39   files,
1   <tt>grep</tt>&rsquo;ing
197   each
1113   for
6605   the
320   filename
3   (minus
6605   the
319   directory
2223   and
10   <tt>.csh</tt>
1   extension)
42   followed
588   by
68   white
67   space
42   followed
588   by
1   <tt>$argv</tt>:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">274
483   D%
33   foreach
109   i
1   (~\samples\*.csh)
1   275
129   D?
21   grep
1   $i:b'[
1   ^t]*$argv'
26   $i
1   276
129   D?
412   end
15   bits
43   $argv
2   bumpdate
43   $argv
2   caldate
43   $argv
16   calendar
43   $argv
53   :
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
23   Notice
91   how
6605   the
1   <tt>$i:b</tt>
33   part
1837   is
7   outside
6605   the
52   quotes
113   so
1061   that
6605   the
320   filename
511   can
924   be
6   substituted
1307   in
2223   and
6   edited
3144   to
2   strip
91   off
6605   the
319   directory
2223   and
7   extension.
1   Conversely,
6605   the
1   <tt>[&nbsp;^t]*</tt>
2223   and
3   <tt>$argv</tt>
2   portions
650   are
97   inside
6605   the
52   quotes
3144   to
23   avoid
25   having
72   them
13   confused
857   as
3088   a
45   wildcard
1041   or
243   variable
7   substitution,
8   respectively.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Wildcarding"></a>Wildcarding
920   with
94   special
197   characters
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
468   If
13   you&rsquo;d
90   like
3144   to
45   wildcard
52   filenames
1061   that
299   have
44   literal
2   <tt>$</tt>,
1   <tt>[</tt>,
20   quote
1041   or
176   other
94   special
19   characters,
22   you&rsquo;ll
299   have
3144   to
20   quote
1041   or
121   escape
6605   the
94   special
197   characters
3144   to
28   turn
91   off
32   their
94   special
3   meanings.
111   For
101   example,
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">277
483   D%
91   ls
2   g:\tmp
2   $abc
1   [hello
320   this
152   name
289   has
42   spaces
1   278
483   D%
91   ls
1   '$'*
2   $abc
1   279
483   D%
91   ls
1   *^
41   *
320   this
152   name
289   has
42   spaces
1652   </div>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="WordsVersusExpressions"></a>Words
14   versus
25   expressions
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
3   Sometimes
3088   a
172   character
90   like
16   <tt>*</tt>
99   means
45   wildcard
2223   and
8   sometimes
879   it
99   means
1   multiply.
983   The
54   meaning
2059   of
81   what
675   you
84   type
1837   is
4   determined
588   by
6605   the
5   context.
983   The
1129   shell
19   makes
3088   a
3   distinction
64   between
25   words,
281   used
857   as
74   arguments
3144   to
3088   a
428   command
14   versus
590   an
63   expression
5   context.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
106   In
5   general,
25   expressions
650   are
6   expected
4   wherever
6605   the
7   context
161   would
2   seem
3144   to
1   suggest
1061   that
879   it
161   would
924   be
207   more
3   natural
3144   to
10   think
2059   of
2   calculating
3088   a
105   value
857   as
1   opposed
3144   to
191   using
51   wildcarding
3144   to
15   produce
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
7   filenames.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="LikeC"></a>Like
1930   C
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
13   shell&rsquo;s
63   expression
6   grammar
1837   is
15   based
883   on
1061   that
2059   of
6605   the
1930   C
35   language
2223   and
15   provides
6605   the
31   full
22   range
2059   of
3   arithmetic,
1   logical,
1   bit,
9   indexing
2223   and
1   relation-testing
2223   and
4   assignment
5   operators.
106   In
5   addition,
87   there
650   are
383   file
110   system
14   tests
2223   and
46   pattern
26   matching
129   string
1   compares.
103   To
270   use
6605   the
1129   shell
857   as
63   simple
1   calculator,
270   use
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="22-Variables.htm"><tt>calc</tt></a>
30   statement.
181   This
43   example
10   shows
3088   a
25   call
3144   to
6605   the
2   square
23   root
3   routine,
271   one
2059   of
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="49-BuiltinProcedures.htm">builtin
2   procedures</a>.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">280
483   D%
90   calc
1   sqrt(2*pi)
1   2.506628
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
201   which
25   writes
122   its
48   result
3144   to
44   stdout.
468   If
675   you
84   want
3144   to
176   do
6605   the
5   calculation
1   silently,
270   use
6605   the
6   <tt>@</tt>
1   variant:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">281
483   D%
284   @
20   r
527   =
19   12
1   282
483   D%
284   @
9   area
527   =
2   pi
41   *
1   r**2
2   283
483   D%
90   calc
9   area
1   452.389345
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
106   In
7   addition
3144   to
6605   the
7   <tt>calc</tt>
2223   and
6   <tt>@</tt>
10   statements,
176   other
12   examples
105   where
590   an
63   expression
1837   is
6   expected
26   include
3088   a
243   variable
10   index
97   inside
4   <tt>[<var>...</var>]</tt>
2   brackets,
1307   in
3088   a
72   procedure
77   argument
190   list
13   and,
857   as
8   we&rsquo;ll
3   see,
3088   a
165   number
2059   of
6605   the
2   structured
5   programming
9   constructs
28   such
857   as
6605   the
1113   for
30   statement.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Parsing"></a>Parsing
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
113   All
62   commands
650   are
281   first
23   broken
27   down
178   into
27   words.
261   A
97   word
1837   is
41   anything
29   separated
588   by
3088   a
67   space
1041   or
3088   a
28   tab
1041   or
271   one
2059   of
6605   the
84   following
94   special
2   strings:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
3   class="codesample">&amp;
498   |
30   ;
49   &gt;
49   &lt;
84   (
210   )
32   &amp;&amp;
18   ||
13   &gt;&gt;
16   &lt;&lt;
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
11   After
3088   a
428   command
372   line
289   has
55   already
382   been
23   broken
157   up
178   into
25   words,
790   if
6605   the
7   context
1837   is
590   an
11   expression,
102   it&rsquo;s
6   further
23   broken
157   up
178   into
1   tokens.
261   A
1   token
1837   is
3088   a
243   variable
1041   or
72   procedure
12   name,
3088   a
172   character
1041   or
25   numeric
1   literal,
1041   or
271   one
2059   of
6605   the
63   expression
5   operators.
3   Spacing
64   between
2   tokens
1837   is
2   more-or-less
2   arbitrary:
1113   for
101   example,
15   there&rsquo;s
5   certainly
227   no
44   need
3144   to
20   put
42   spaces
45   around
590   an
3   arithmetic
40   operator
3144   to
48   separate
879   it
640   from
3088   a
243   variable
152   name
1   beside
61   it.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
1   Tokens
650   are
29   separated
588   by
439   any
2059   of
94   these
197   characters
1041   or
172   character
1   pairs:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
3   class="codesample">&amp;
498   |
34   ^
117   +
91   -
41   *
23   /
60   %

1604   <p>

1604   <p>

1679   </p>
1604   <p>

483   D%
90   calc
1   {echo
1   hello}
88   hello
214   1
1   324
483   D%
90   calc

1   \nonexistent}
20   csh:
13   Couldn't
78   change
6605   the
213   current
319   directory
3144   to
1   '\nonexistent'.
120   0
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="OpEqual"></a>The
2   <i>Op</i>=
44   operators
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
12   Finally,
6605   the
25   various
2   <tt><var>op</var>=</tt>
44   operators
6   apply
6605   the
2   <tt><var>op</var></tt>
3144   to
6605   the
20   left
2223   and
37   right
1   operands,
189   then
2   assign
6605   the
48   result
3144   to
6605   the
20   left
8   operand.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">325

90   calc

527   =
102   2

1   326

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="TypeConversions"></a>Type
15   conversions
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
1129   shell
80   always
18   tries
3144   to
13   evaluate
25   expressions
1   &ldquo;sensibly&rdquo;
588   by
21   doing
439   any
84   type
15   conversions
1061   that
55   might
2   seem
2   necessary.
468   If
590   an
33   integer
5   calculation
27   results
1307   in
590   an
1   overflow,
6605   the
1129   shell
3   shifts
37   automatically
3144   to
30   floating
6   point.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">328
483   D%
90   calc
1   2**30
1   1073741824
1   329
483   D%
90   calc
1   2**200
1   1.606938e+060
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
468   If
3088   a
172   character
129   string
363   was
91   given
241   but
590   an
33   integer
1837   is
5   needed,
6605   the
1129   shell
18   tries
3144   to
176   do
1061   that
5   conversion
8   also.
13   Because
94   these
15   conversions
9   happen
1   automatically,
63   without
439   any
1   fanfare,
6605   the
84   following
4   literals
364   all
24   compare
1   equal:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
2   class="codesample">27
1   27.0
1   033
2   0x1B
11   "
2   27
11   "
12   '
1   0x1b
12   '
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
1   (Null
56   strings
2223   and
56   strings
12   consisting
199   only
2059   of
68   white
67   space
650   are
66   considered
11   equal
3144   to
5   zero.
181   This
1837   is
14   particularly
19   convenient
1113   for
94   local
22   variables,
201   which
650   are
2   initially
436   set
3144   to
48   null
1   strings.)
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
1129   shell
135   does
4   automatic
15   conversions
3144   to
3088   a
172   character
129   string
59   format
268   when
6605   the
48   result
1837   is
78   being
6   printed.
2   Numeric
27   results
650   are
80   always
26   shown
1307   in
4   decimal.
106   In
320   this
101   example,
3088   a
7   procedure,
6605   the
19   builtin
2   square
23   root
3   routine,
1837   is
21   invoked
857   as
3088   a
6   command;
6605   the
105   value
879   it
32   returns
1837   is
9   converted
640   from
30   floating
39   point
3144   to
172   character
129   string
2223   and
6   printed.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">330
483   D%
2   sqrt
102   2
1   1.414213
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
1129   shell
190   also
3   converts
3144   to
3088   a
172   character
129   string
268   when
675   you
30   reference
590   an
10   array
241   but
270   use
879   it
857   as
790   if
879   it
132   were
10   not.
1679   </p>
