446   <h3>
2   Aliases<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="13-Expressions.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="15-ProgrammingConstructs.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="#Wildcards">Wildcards
2223   and
94   special
197   characters
1307   in
590   an
1   alias</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#Arguments">Arguments
3144   to
7   aliases</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#Implementation">Implementation
1   details</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
17   Aliases
650   are
3088   a
12   quick
10   shorthand
1   technique.
468   If
675   you
84   type
590   an
164   alias
277   at
6605   the
45   beginning
2059   of
3088   a
29   command,
102   it&rsquo;s
12   replaced
588   by
34   whatever
6605   the
164   alias
1837   is
43   defined
2   as.
2   They&rsquo;re
12   intended
3144   to
924   be
281   used
1113   for
6   relatively
63   simple
1   abbreviations:
790   if
439   any
74   arguments
650   are
5   needed,
675   you
299   have
3144   to
924   be
29   able
3144   to
84   type
72   them
50   onto
6605   the
9   end.
106   In
207   more
16   complex
3   situations,
3314   <a
1   href="15.3-Procedures.htm">procedures</a>
650   are
10   usually
3088   a
25   better
1   choice.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
103   To
190   list
6605   the
31   aliases
10   currently
13   defined,
270   use
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="21-Aliases.htm"><tt>alias</tt></a>
47   command.
16   Some
31   aliases
650   are
3314   <a
1   href="52-PredefinedAliases.htm">predefined</a>
1113   for
3   you.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">335
483   D%
164   alias
4   cdd
52   cd
8   +c
60   copy
94   local
31   s
30   ;
284   @
31   s
527   =
30   nowild
30   ;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
214   1
30   ;
1   safecopy
37   date
6   dt
13   del
94   local
31   s
30   ;
284   @
31   s
527   =
30   nowild
30   ;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
214   1
30   ;
1   safedel
16   dir
17   cmd
19   /c
16   dir
4   erase
13   del
11   h
112   history
40   label
3   hlabel
2   ll
91   ls
17   -L
2   md
9   mkdir
8   mi
207   more
30   -i
207   more
4   hmore
2   rd
6   rmdir
3   ren
15   rename
15   rename
94   local
31   s
30   ;
284   @
31   s
527   =
30   nowild
30   ;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
214   1
30   ;
1   saferename
2   ro
12   rotd
87   start
26   env
26   -N
84   type
24   cat
14   vol
3   vl
4   xcopy
94   local
31   s
30   ;
284   @
31   s
527   =
30   nowild
30   ;
284   @
30   nowild
527   =
214   1
30   ;
1   safexcopy
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
16   Some
31   aliases
650   are
281   used
3144   to
9   intercept
35   references
3144   to
4   <tt>cmd.exe</tt>&rsquo;s
19   builtin
71   commands.
111   For
101   example,
320   this
1837   is
91   how
6   <tt>dir</tt>
1837   is
12   run.
11   Other
31   aliases
45   give
63   simple
3   alternate
88   names
3144   to
3088   a
29   command,
95   e.g.,
10   <tt>rename</tt>
1113   for
1   <tt>mv</tt>.
2   Still
7   others
650   are
281   used
3144   to
7   customize
3088   a
428   command
920   with
3088   a
33   useful
43   option.
111   For
101   example,
2   <tt>mi</tt>
20   runs
7   <tt>more</tt>
241   but
29   starts
879   it
34   immediately
1307   in
12   interactive
23   mode,
201   which
99   means
6605   the
204   screen
1837   is
4   cleared
1   first;
1307   in
3088   a
43   console
12   window,
320   this
3   tends
3144   to
146   run
6   faster.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
103   To
38   find
94   out
91   how
439   any
20   particular
164   alias
1837   is
13   defined,
270   use
6605   the
164   alias
428   command
920   with
199   only
6605   the
152   name
23   you&rsquo;re
2   interested
1307   in
857   as
590   an
8   operand.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">336
483   D%
164   alias
8   mi
8   mi
207   more
30   -i
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
103   To
38   create
3088   a
257   new
11   alias,
84   type
6605   the
164   alias
428   command
42   followed
588   by
6605   the
152   name
2059   of
164   alias
78   being
33   created
2223   and
97   word
190   list
879   it
131   should
924   be
11   expanded
1   into:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">337
483   D%
164   alias
88   hello
296   echo
88   hello
43   world
1   338
483   D%
88   hello
88   hello
43   world
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
468   If
675   you
21   define
590   an
164   alias
1061   that
7   refers
3144   to
9   itself,
93   either
11   directly
1041   or
17   via
176   other
5   aliases,
6605   the
1129   shell
2   traps
6605   the
30   reference
46   rather
171   than
19   allowing
879   it
3144   to
7   expand
63   without
1   limit:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">339
483   D%
164   alias
88   hello
7   (echo
1   infinite;
88   hello
1   again)
1   340
483   D%
88   hello
20   csh:
261   A
23   loop
1307   in
6605   the
164   alias
9   definitions
363   was
18   encountered
2223   and
1   trapped.
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
181   This
2   raises
6605   the
2   question
91   how
675   you
55   might
21   define
590   an
11   alias,
1   say,
3   <tt>ls</tt>,
1061   that
3   intercepts
35   references
3144   to
6605   the
9   <tt>ls</tt>
69   utility
63   without
9   getting
178   into
3088   a
6   loop.
983   The
2   answer
1837   is
1061   that
6605   the
1129   shell
2   considers
879   it
3088   a
94   special
97   case
790   if
6605   the
281   first
97   word
1307   in
6605   the
17   expansion
2059   of
6605   the
164   alias
1837   is
6605   the
122   same
857   as
122   its
32   name.
30   Here&rsquo;s
590   an
164   alias
1061   that
39   causes
9   <tt>ls</tt>
3144   to
80   always
26   display
364   all
8   files:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">341
483   D%
164   alias
91   ls
91   ls
3   +a
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
11   Other
14   ways
45   around
6605   the
33   problem
161   would
924   be
3144   to
270   use
6605   the
31   full
1   <tt>ls.exe</tt>
152   name
97   inside
6605   the
164   alias
1041   or
20   put
52   quotes
45   around
6605   the
4   <tt>ls</tt>.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Wildcards"></a>Wildcards
2223   and
94   special
197   characters
1307   in
590   an
164   alias
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1   Recall
1061   that
439   any
3314   <a
1   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">wildcards</a>
1041   or
3314   <a
1   href="36-Quoting.htm#EscapeCharacter">escape
2   characters</a>
1307   in
3088   a
428   command
650   are
80   always
9   processed
98   before
6605   the
428   command
17   itself
1837   is
12   run.
4   Suppose
675   you
11   wanted
3144   to
21   define
590   an
164   alias
3144   to
190   list
364   all
252   your
7   <tt>.exe</tt>
294   files
1307   in
6605   the
213   current
92   directory.
1   Watch
81   what
7   happens
790   if
4   we&rsquo;re
471   not
1   careful:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">342
483   D%
52   cd
5   d:\Program
14   Files\Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
174   2012
1   x64\Samples
1   343
483   D%
164   alias
8   lexe
91   ls
2   *.exe
1   344
483   D%
8   lexe
5   args.exe
5   dumpenv.exe
6   rcode.exe
3   blksize.exe
6   myecho.exe
3   winerror.exe
1   345
483   D%
52   cd
1   ..\bin
1   346
483   D%
8   lexe
6   ls:
1   'args.exe'
135   does
471   not
25   exist.
6   ls:
1   'blksize.exe'
135   does
471   not
25   exist.
6   ls:
1   'dumpenv.exe'
135   does
471   not
25   exist.
6   ls:
1   'myecho.exe'
135   does
471   not
25   exist.
6   ls:
1   'rcode.exe'
135   does
471   not
25   exist.
6   ls:
1   'winerror.exe'
135   does
471   not
25   exist.
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
6   What
1   happened?
2   Why
2   didn&rsquo;t
1   <tt>lexe</tt>
45   give
5   us
6605   the
294   files
1307   in
19   our
257   new
213   current
1   directory?
983   The
2   answer
1837   is
6   clear
790   if
40   we
190   list
6605   the
164   alias
1   definition:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">347
483   D%
164   alias
8   lexe
8   lexe
91   ls
5   args.exe
3   blksize.exe
5   dumpenv.exe
6   myecho.exe
6   rcode.exe
3   winerror.exe
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
1   <tt>*.exe</tt>
45   wildcard
9   got
11   expanded
98   before
6605   the
164   alias
15   definition
363   was
5   processed.
468   If
40   we
84   want
3144   to
5   defer
13   processing
2059   of
6605   the
45   wildcard
42   until
10   later,
268   when
6605   the
164   alias
1837   is
14   used,
40   we
44   need
3144   to
121   escape
6605   the
16   <tt>*</tt>
1   character:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">348
483   D%
164   alias
8   lexe
91   ls
1   ^*.exe
1   349
483   D%
164   alias
8   lexe
8   lexe
91   ls
2   *.exe
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
12   It&rsquo;s
234   just
3088   a
20   little
2   trickier
790   if
40   we
84   want
3144   to
28   turn
91   off
6605   the
94   special
54   meaning
471   not
199   only
268   when
4   defining
6605   the
164   alias
241   but
190   also
268   when
40   we
270   use
61   it.
14   That&rsquo;s
58   done
588   by
4   embedding
590   an
10   extra
5   <tt>^^</tt>
24   sequence
178   into
81   what
40   we
6   type,
3   knowing
1   that&rsquo;ll
28   turn
178   into
3088   a
110   single
121   escape
172   character
1307   in
6605   the
6   definition.
30   Here&rsquo;s
590   an
25   example:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">350
483   D%
164   alias
88   hello
296   echo
4   How
650   are
2   you^^^?
1   351
483   D%
164   alias
88   hello
88   hello
4   How
650   are
2   you^?
1   352
483   D%
88   hello
4   How
650   are
3   you?
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Arguments"></a>Arguments
3144   to
31   aliases
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
10   Normally,
439   any
80   words
883   on
6605   the
372   line
84   following
6605   the
30   reference
3144   to
6605   the
164   alias
380   will
44   simply
924   be
1   tacked
50   onto
6605   the
6   expansion.
111   For
25   example:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">353
483   D%
164   alias
88   hello
296   echo
88   hello
43   world
1   354
483   D%
88   hello
91   how
650   are
675   you
88   hello
43   world
91   how
650   are
675   you
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
58   But
1   suppose
13   you&rsquo;d
90   like
3144   to
26   paste
6605   the
74   arguments
178   into
6605   the
7   middle
2059   of
6605   the
1   expansion?
983   The
90   way
3144   to
176   do
1061   that
1837   is
920   with
3088   a
44   very
94   special
1   adaptation
2059   of
6605   the
3314   <a
3   href="08-History.htm">history
1   mechanism</a>.
468   If
6605   the
17   expansion
35   contains
439   any
3314   <a
3   href="34-HistoryRecall.htm">history
1   references</a>,
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
4   treats
320   this
857   as
3088   a
94   special
43   case.
159   It
5   temporarily
4   adds
6605   the
253   original
106   text
2059   of
1061   that
428   command
3144   to
6605   the
112   history
39   list.
8   Note
1061   that
199   only
6605   the
428   command
17   itself
11   &ndash;
31   starting
920   with
6605   the
164   alias
152   name
2223   and
9   ending
234   just
98   before
439   any
3   semicolon,
9   closing
6   parenthesis
1041   or
21   pipe
4   symbol
4   terminating
6605   the
428   command
11   &ndash;
471   not
6605   the
50   whole
372   line
1837   is
41   added.
39   Any
112   history
35   references
1307   in
6605   the
15   definition
2059   of
6605   the
164   alias
650   are
9   processed
2223   and
6605   the
48   result
25   taken
857   as
6605   the
11   final
428   command
19   text.
983   The
6   temporary
112   history
20   entry
1837   is
189   then
7   discarded
15   along
920   with
6605   the
253   original
129   string
2059   of
77   argument
27   words.
30   Here&rsquo;s
590   an
25   example:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">355
483   D%
164   alias
88   hello
296   echo
5   hi
1   ^!^^,
91   how
650   are
2   you^^^?
1   356
483   D%
164   alias
88   hello
88   hello
296   echo
5   hi
1   !^
91   how
650   are
2   you^?
1   357
483   D%
296   echo
1   x;
88   hello
1   Frank;
296   echo
9   y
38   x
5   hi
2   Frank,
91   how
650   are
3   you?
9   y
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
23   Notice
6605   the
270   use
2059   of
6605   the
121   escape
197   characters
3144   to
8   embed
6605   the
112   history
8   reference,
2   <tt>!^</tt>
2223   and
6605   the
44   literal
3   <tt>?</tt>
178   into
6605   the
164   alias
6   definition.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
159   It
1837   is
471   not
14   necessary
1113   for
6605   the
164   alias
3144   to
270   use
364   all
6605   the
77   argument
27   words.
39   Any
1061   that
879   it
37   doesn&rsquo;t
30   reference
191   using
6605   the
112   history
27   mechanism
650   are
234   just
6   discarded.
23   Notice
1061   that
320   this
164   alias
1   grabbed
199   only
6605   the
281   first
77   argument
97   word
640   from
5   history.
4   Suppose
87   there
132   were
176   other
80   words
883   on
6605   the
4   line:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">358
483   D%
5   hi
1   Frank
2223   and
1   Bob
5   hi
2   Frank,
91   how
650   are
3   you?
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
5   See
91   how
6605   the
16   rest
132   were
234   just
1   discarded?
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Implementation"></a>Implementation
6   details
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
164   alias
27   mechanism
1837   is
38   actually
33   part
2059   of
6605   the
13   parsing
27   mechanism
46   rather
171   than
3088   a
7   run-time
7   feature
2059   of
6605   the
1930   C
55   shell.
6   What
1061   that
99   means
1837   is
1061   that
6605   the
164   alias
17   expansion
1837   is
58   done
3314   <a
1   href="45-OrderOfEvaluation.htm">when
6605   the
94   statement
1837   is
281   first
1   read</a>,
471   not
268   when
102   it&rsquo;s
5   executed.
30   Here&rsquo;s
590   an
43   example
105   where
40   we
16   attempt
3144   to
78   change
6605   the
15   definition
2059   of
590   an
164   alias
97   inside
3088   a
6   loop.
23   Notice
1061   that
879   it
37   doesn&rsquo;t
299   have
439   any
13   effect
42   until
40   we
44   exit
6605   the
6   loop.
14   That&rsquo;s
64   because
6605   the
50   whole
23   loop
1837   is
78   being
15   compiled
857   as
3088   a
35   block
98   before
439   any
33   part
2059   of
879   it
1837   is
5   executed.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">359
483   D%
164   alias
19   foo
296   echo
320   this
1837   is
4   life
1   360
483   D%
33   foreach
109   i
1   (hello
3   world)
1   361
129   D?
164   alias
19   foo
296   echo
26   $i
1   362
129   D?
19   foo
1   363
129   D?
412   end
320   this
1837   is
4   life
320   this
1837   is
4   life
1   364
483   D%
19   foo
43   world
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
139   Also,
268   when
590   an
164   alias
39   substitution
1837   is
8   done,
6605   the
17   expansion
1837   is
25   taken
857   as
6605   the
29   series
2059   of
80   words
6605   the
164   alias
363   was
43   defined
1   as;
102   it&rsquo;s
471   not
1   reparsed
178   into
80   words
364   all
53   over
6   again.
12   Here's
590   an
43   example
191   using
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="Samples/myecho.htm"><tt>myecho</tt></a>
45   sample
9   application,
201   which
44   simply
5   dumps
6605   the
7   <tt>argv</tt>
428   command
372   line
77   argument
80   words
102   it's
91   given
920   with
52   quotes
45   around
1   each.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">365
483   D%
164   alias
36   test
15   myecho
1   "this
1837   is
3088   a
1   test"
2   366
483   D%
164   alias
36   test
36   test
15   myecho
320   this
1837   is
3088   a
36   test
1   367
483   D%
36   test
7   'myecho'
1   'this
1837   is
3088   a
1   test'
8   arg
38   length
527   =
8   22
197   characters
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
23   Notice
1061   that
675   you
10   can&rsquo;t
31   really
43   see
1061   that
6605   the
36   test
164   alias
1837   is
43   defined
857   as
234   just
94   two
25   words,
2   <tt>myecho</tt>
2223   and
2   <tt>this
1837   is
3088   a
1   test</tt>
268   when
675   you
190   list
879   it
1   (it&rsquo;s
234   just
90   like
24   listing
3088   a
243   variable
436   set
3144   to
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
80   words
101   some
2059   of
201   which
38   contain
1   spaces),
241   but
26   that&rsquo;s
81   what
879   it
4   is.
30   These
97   word
1   boundaries
650   are
2   maintained
115   even
790   if
6605   the
164   alias
35   contains
112   history
2   references.

446   <h3>
13   Programming
1   constructs<br/>

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="#SerialExecution">Serial
2   execution</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#StatementsAndStatementLists">Statements
2223   and
94   statement
1   lists</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#Parenthesis">Parenthesis</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#ControlStructures">Control
1   structures</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
181   This
11   chapter
2   outlines
6605   the
25   various
8   structures
10   provided
1113   for
3314   <a
1   href="25-StatementRelationships.htm">connecting
73   statements
1   together</a>:
6   describing
8   serial
1   relationships,
5   conditional
3   execution,
9   iteration
2223   and
91   how
25   procedures
650   are
43   defined
2223   and
31   used.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="SerialExecution"></a>Serial
21   execution
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
23   As
6   we&rsquo;ve
6   seen
1   already,
62   commands
49   typed
883   on
2   successive
111   lines
650   are
13   executed
1   serially,
271   one
61   after
6605   the
4   other.
5   Writing
35   several
62   commands
883   on
271   one
372   line
920   with
3314   <a
1   href="25-StatementRelationships.htm">semicolons</a>
64   between
72   them
135   does
6605   the
122   same
3   thing.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">368
483   D%
296   echo
5   hello;
296   echo
43   world
88   hello
43   world
1   369
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
1   semicolon
1837   is
471   not
73   passed
3144   to
6605   the
27   application
675   you
1   invoke.
468   If
675   you
31   really
176   do
84   want
3144   to
28   pass
3088   a
3   semicolon,
675   you
299   have
3144   to
121   escape
879   it
1041   or
20   put
879   it
97   inside
17   quotes.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
261   A
17   non-zero
159   return
66   code
1837   is
471   not
56   normally
66   considered
590   an
2   error:
15   regardless
2059   of
6605   the
159   return
66   code
640   from
439   any
20   particular
29   command,
8   serial
21   execution
4   continues.
12   We
511   can
3   demonstrate
320   this
920   with
6605   the
2   <tt>rcode</tt>
69   utility
1307   in
6605   the
4   <tt>Samples</tt>
319   directory
201   which
2   prints,
189   then
13   exits
920   with
6605   the
159   return
66   code
105   value
675   you
28   pass
879   it
883   on
6605   the
428   command
75   line.
181   This
43   example
190   also
10   shows
91   how
675   you
511   can
2   retrieve
6605   the
159   return
66   code
2059   of
6605   the
77   last
107   child
70   process
588   by
5   referring
3144   to
6605   the
19   builtin
3   <tt>status</tt>
47   variable.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">369
483   D%
52   cd
6   ~\samples
1   370
483   D%
30   rcode
18   1;
30   rcode
102   2
214   1
102   2
1   371
483   D%
90   calc
60   status
102   2
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
12   It&rsquo;s
190   also
44   possible
3144   to
5   describe
3088   a
5   conditional
8   serial
1   relationship.
468   If
73   statements
650   are
7   joined
588   by
2   <tt>&amp;&amp;</tt>,
6605   the
33   second
271   one
1837   is
13   executed
199   only
790   if
6605   the
159   return
66   code
640   from
6605   the
281   first
271   one
1837   is
18   0,
11   i.e.,
790   if
6605   the
281   first
94   statement
1   succeeds.
468   If
73   statements
650   are
7   joined
588   by
3   <tt>||</tt>,
6605   the
33   second
1837   is
13   executed
199   only
790   if
6605   the
281   first
271   one
3   fails,
11   i.e.,
32   returns
3088   a
17   non-zero
159   return
21   code.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">372
483   D%
30   rcode
120   0
18   ||
30   rcode
214   1
120   0
1   373
483   D%
30   rcode
214   1
18   ||
30   rcode
102   2
214   1
102   2
1   374
483   D%
30   rcode
120   0
32   &amp;&amp;
30   rcode
214   1
120   0
214   1
1   375
483   D%
30   rcode
214   1
32   &amp;&amp;
30   rcode
102   2
214   1
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="StatementsAndStatementLists"></a>Statements
2223   and
94   statement
28   lists
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
46   href="26-IORedirection.htm">I/O
2   redirection</a>
2223   and
3314   <a
1   href="25-StatementRelationships.htm">statement
1   connections</a>
650   are
34   recognized
10   according
3144   to
3088   a
2   precedence.
13   Just
857   as
1307   in
9   expressions,
105   where
16   <tt>*</tt>
1837   is
58   done
98   before
1   <tt>+</tt>,
73   statements
650   are
15   parsed
113   so
1061   that
101   some
11   things
650   are
58   done
98   before
5   others.
18   I/O
25   redirection
14   comes
98   before
4   piping
201   which
14   comes
98   before
5   conditional
21   execution
201   which
14   comes
98   before
2   serializing
920   with
2   semicolons.
111   For
25   example:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">376
483   D%
296   echo
5   hello;
296   echo
43   world
498   |
16   wc
88   hello
214   1
214   1
28   7
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
1129   shell
19   makes
3088   a
94   special
3   distinction
64   between
28   individual
10   statements,
227   no
7   matter
91   how
4   complex,
2223   and
28   lists
2059   of
73   statements
49   typed
883   on
48   separate
111   lines
1041   or
29   separated
588   by
2   semicolons.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
30   Here&rsquo;s
590   an
43   example
191   using
6605   the
96   time
29   command,
201   which
20   runs
3088   a
94   statement
2223   and
35   prints
94   out
6605   the
8   hours,
6   minutes
2223   and
23   seconds
879   it
2   took.
96   time
9   expects
3088   a
110   single
94   statement
857   as
3088   a
1   operand;
790   if
675   you
84   type
3088   a
3   semicolon,
6605   the
96   time
428   command
1   (together
920   with
122   its
1   operand)
3   becomes
234   just
271   one
94   statement
1307   in
6605   the
39   list.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">377
483   D%
96   time
296   echo
88   hello
43   world
498   |
16   wc
214   1
102   2
1   13_
1   0:00:00.50
1   378
483   D%
96   time
296   echo
5   hello;
296   echo
43   world
88   hello
2   0:00:00.00
43   world
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Parenthesis"></a>Parenthesis
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
29   There
650   are
94   two
14   ways
3144   to
26   group
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
73   statements
13   together
3144   to
53   make
72   them
5   act
90   like
3088   a
110   single
30   statement.
983   The
6   simplest
90   way
1837   is
920   with
2   parenthesis,
201   which
102   work
6605   the
90   way
104   they
161   would
1307   in
590   an
1   expression:
115   even
790   if
6605   the
40   operator
97   inside
6605   the
8   parentheses
650   are
2059   of
32   lower
1   precedence,
21   they&rsquo;re
58   done
4   first.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">379
483   D%
7   (echo
5   hello;
296   echo
3   world)
498   |
16   wc
102   2
102   2
5   14
1   380
483   D%
96   time
7   (echo
5   hello;
296   echo
3   world)
88   hello
43   world
2   0:00:00.00
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
261   A
2   parenthesized
26   group
19   gets
122   its
51   own
60   copy
2059   of
6605   the
213   current
319   directory
2223   and
24   disk.
181   This
19   makes
879   it
19   convenient
3144   to
78   change
103   directories
97   inside
6605   the
26   group
2223   and
19   go
176   do
32   something
63   without
25   having
3144   to
78   change
51   back
2   afterward.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">381
483   D%
52   cd
9   d:\Nicki\samples
1   382
483   D%
1   (cd
1   ..;
1   cd)
11   d:\Nicki
1   383
483   D%
52   cd
9   d:\Nicki\samples
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
16   actual
4   implementation
55   uses
6605   the
319   directory
24   stack
1   mechanism:
277   at
20   entry
3144   to
6605   the
3   group,
6605   the
213   current
319   directory
1837   is
1   pushed
50   onto
6605   the
319   directory
24   stack
2223   and
277   at
3   exit,
6605   the
14   top
20   entry
1837   is
1   popped.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">384
483   D%
7   dirs
9   d:\Nicki\samples
1   385
483   D%
1   (dirs
210   )
9   d:\Nicki\samples
9   d:\Nicki\samples
1   386
483   D%
7   dirs
9   d:\Nicki\samples
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="ControlStructures"></a>Control
8   structures
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
207   more
2   general
90   way
2059   of
2   connecting
73   statements
13   together
1837   is
920   with
41   control
3   structures,
3   discussed
1307   in
6605   the
71   next
35   several
1   chapters.
12   Control
1   structions
17   provide
14   ways
2059   of
6   describing
3314   <a
1   href="18-ConditionTesting.htm">conditional</a>
1041   or
3314   <a
1   href="19-Iteration.htm">iterative</a>
21   execution
2223   and
1113   for
21   adding
257   new
6   vocabulary
3144   to
6605   the
35   language
191   using
3314   <a
2   href="20-Procedures.htm">procedures</a>.
150   You
511   can
270   use
3088   a
41   control
10   structure
19   anywhere
3088   a
94   statement
1837   is
6   allowed.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
35   language
1837   is
231   completely
1   recursive:
41   control
8   structures
511   can
924   be
13   nested
97   inside
41   control
3   structures,
38   etc.
261   A
94   statement
511   can
924   be
11   arbitrarily
2   complex.
30   Here&rsquo;s
590   an
43   example
1   timing
3088   a
94   statement
1061   that
20   turns
94   out
3144   to
924   be
3088   a
3314   <a
1   href="19-Iteration.htm"><tt>for</tt></a>
23   loop
4   piped
3144   to
3088   a
3314   <a
2   href="Utilities/wc.htm"><tt>wc</tt></a>
2223   and
97   inside
6605   the
8   <tt>for</tt>
23   loop
57   ...
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">387
483   D%
96   time
1113   for
109   i
527   =
214   1
3144   to
61   3
176   do
1   388
129   D?
96   time
296   echo
88   hello
43   world
498   |
16   wc
1   389
129   D?
412   end
498   |
16   wc
17   6
19   12
4   126
1   0:00:01.03

446   <h3>
790   if
2223   and
2   switch<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="15-ProgrammingConstructs.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="15.2-Iteration.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="#ifStatement">if
11   statement</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#switchStatement">switch
11   statement</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
11   <tt>if</tt>
2223   and
9   <tt>switch</tt>
73   statements
17   provide
5   condition
1   testing.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="ifStatement"></a>if
94   statement
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
11   <tt>if</tt>
94   statement
14   comes
1307   in
94   two
2   forms.
983   The
15   short
32   form
1837   is
19   convenient
790   if
6605   the
7   choice
1837   is
199   only
64   between
7   executing
2223   and
471   not
7   executing
3088   a
110   single
11   statement,
201   which
19   appears
883   on
6605   the
122   same
75   line.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">390
483   D%
790   if
4   (5
69   ==
102   2
117   +
7   3)
296   echo
2   yes
2   yes
1   391
483   D%
790   if
4   (5
69   ==
5   10)
296   echo
31   really
1   392
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
68   longer
32   form
15   provides
6605   the
207   more
6   traditional
1   if-then-else
7   structure.
1   Indentation
1837   is
3088   a
7   matter
2059   of
2   choice,
102   it&rsquo;s
281   used
1307   in
94   these
12   examples
4   merely
3144   to
4   improve
6   readability.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">392
483   D%
790   if
4   (5
69   ==
5   10)
189   then
1   393
129   D?
296   echo
44   5
69   ==
21   10
1   394
129   D?
56   else
1   395
129   D?
296   echo
44   5
1837   is
471   not
21   10
1   396
129   D?
412   end
44   5
1837   is
471   not
21   10
1   397
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="switchStatement"></a>switch
94   statement
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
9   <tt>switch</tt>
94   statement
49   works
588   by
7   attempting
3144   to
46   pattern
65   match
6605   the
18   switch
105   value
27   against
3088   a
29   series
2059   of
5   alternative
6   cases.
983   The
9   <tt>switch</tt>
2223   and
8   <tt>case</tt>
45   values
511   can
364   all
924   be
19   arbitrary
13   expressions.
468   If
439   any
46   pattern
65   match
1   succeeds,
21   execution
9   begins
920   with
6605   the
71   next
94   statement
84   following
2223   and
2   continues,
3   skipping
53   over
439   any
1   interspersed
8   <tt>case</tt>
3   clauses
42   until
93   either
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
6605   the
9   <tt>switch</tt>
35   block
1041   or
3088   a
10   <tt>break</tt>
94   statement
1837   is
1   reached.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">397
483   D%
18   switch
1   ("hello
1   world")
1   398
129   D?
97   case
1   5:
1   399
129   D?
296   echo
11   hit
44   5
1   400
129   D?
97   case
1   "h*":
1   401
129   D?
296   echo
11   hit
1   "h*"
1   402
129   D?
97   case
1   "x*":
1   403
129   D?
296   echo
11   hit
1   "x*"
1   404
129   D?
38   break
1   405
129   D?
97   case
1   43.2:
1   406
129   D?
296   echo
11   hit
1   43.2
1   407
129   D?
9   default:
1   408
129   D?
296   echo
21   did
471   not
11   hit
1   409
129   D?
412   end
11   hit
1   h*
11   hit
1   x*
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
10   <tt>break</tt>
94   statement
281   used
20   here
39   causes
21   execution
3144   to
1   &ldquo;break
94   out
1   of&rdquo;
6605   the
3   innermost
41   control
7   structure.
468   If
23   you&rsquo;re
13   nested
35   several
1   layers
1   deep
178   into
41   control
8   structures
2223   and
84   want
3144   to
38   break
94   out
2059   of
3088   a
6   higher
22   level
10   structure
675   you
511   can
40   label
6605   the
6   higher
22   level
10   structure
2223   and
94   specify
1061   that
152   name
883   on
6605   the
10   <tt>break</tt>
30   statement.
1679   </p>

446   <h3>
9   foreach,
73   for,
95   while
2223   and
2   repeat<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="15.1-ConditionTesting.htm">Previous</a>
498   |

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="#foreachStatement">foreach
11   statement</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#forStatement">for
11   statement</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#whileStatement">while
11   statement</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#repeatStatement">repeat
11   statement</a><br/>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
4   <tt>foreach</tt>,
8   <tt>for</tt>
2223   and
5   <tt>repeat</tt>
73   statements
17   provide
1113   for
4   iteration.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="foreachStatement"></a>foreach
94   statement
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
3   <tt>foreach</tt>
94   statement
1837   is
5   designed
1113   for
3   iterating
53   over
3088   a
29   series
2059   of
27   words.
106   In
320   this
101   example,
9   <tt>i</tt>
1837   is
3   iterated
53   over
6605   the
190   list
2059   of
364   all
6605   the
294   files
1307   in
6605   the
4   <tt>Samples</tt>
92   directory.
45   Each
4   one,
1307   in
2   turn,
1837   is
2   tested
3144   to
43   see
790   if
102   it&rsquo;s
40   executable
9   (i.e.,
289   has
3088   a
4   <tt>.csh</tt>,
2   <tt>.cmd</tt>,
1   <tt>.bat</tt>,
7   <tt>.exe</tt>
1041   or
4   <tt>.com</tt>
18   extension
1041   or
1837   is
3088   a
11   valid
72   binary
2   executable.)
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">410
483   D%
52   cd
6   ~\samples
1   411
483   D%
91   ls
5   args.c
4   dumpenv.c
8   finance.csh
6   myecho.exe
5   readme
5   args.exe
5   dumpenv.exe
7   makecpgm.csh
4   rcode.c
5   bits.csh
5   factor.csh
6   myecho.c
6   rcode.exe
1   412
483   D%
33   foreach
109   i
2   (*)
1   413
129   D?
790   if
1   (-x
5   $i)
296   echo
26   $i
1837   is
40   executable
1   414
129   D?
412   end
5   args.exe
1837   is
40   executable
5   bits.csh
1837   is
40   executable
5   dumpenv.exe
1837   is
40   executable
5   factor.csh
1837   is
40   executable
8   finance.csh
1837   is
40   executable
7   makecpgm.csh
1837   is
40   executable
6   myecho.exe
1837   is
40   executable
6   rcode.exe
1837   is
40   executable
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="forStatement"></a>for
94   statement
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
8   <tt>for</tt>
94   statement
15   provides
207   more
6   traditional
9   iteration
53   over
1   numerical
7   values.
468   If
675   you
94   specify
3088   a
22   range
32   (e.g.,
2   <tt>1
3144   to
1   3</tt>)
241   but
30   don&rsquo;t
94   specify
6605   the
1   increment,
214   1
1837   is
5   assumed.
4   Although
320   this
43   example
10   shows
9   iteration
53   over
33   integer
5   values,
30   floating
39   point
45   values
650   are
4   equally
3   acceptable.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">415
483   D%
1113   for
109   i
527   =
214   1
3144   to
61   3
176   do
1   416
129   D?
296   echo
26   $i
1   417
129   D?
412   end
214   1
102   2
61   3
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
150   You
511   can
190   also
4   iterate
53   over
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
13   ranges
1041   or
28   individual
7   values.
983   The
1   <tt>to</tt>
2223   and
1   <tt>by</tt>
3   clauses
193   may
924   be
152   specified
1307   in
93   either
3   order.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">418
483   D%
1113   for
109   i
527   =
32   1,
2   4,
231   7,
2   12,
2   -4
3144   to
17   6
588   by
61   3
176   do
1   419
129   D?
296   echo
26   $i
1   420
129   D?
412   end
214   1
35   4
28   7
19   12
2   -4
4   -1
102   2
44   5
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="whileStatement"></a>while
94   statement
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
5   <tt>while</tt>
94   statement
49   works
1307   in
6605   the
6   traditional
1   manner,
3   iterating
113   so
53   long
857   as
6605   the
95   while
5   condition
1837   is
4   true.
181   This
43   example
4   keeps
3   popping
157   up
109   through
6605   the
25   various
13   levels
2059   of
21   parent
103   directories
42   until
879   it
2   reaches
6605   the
4   root.
2   <tt>fullpath</tt>
1837   is
271   one
2059   of
6605   the
19   builtin
1   procedures;
879   it
159   return
6605   the
6   fully-qualified
37   pathname
2059   of
122   its
12   argument.
23   Notice
1061   that
2   <tt>fullpath</tt>
1837   is
21   invoked
1307   in
16   three
58   different
3   ways:
883   on
372   line
1   421,
857   as
790   if
879   it
132   were
3088   a
29   command,
883   on
2   422
1307   in
207   more
7   conventional
72   procedure
25   syntax
2223   and
883   on
1   423,
105   where
102   it&rsquo;s
6   substituted
1307   in
857   as
790   if
879   it
132   were
3088   a
47   variable.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">421
483   D%
13   fullpath
14   .
9   d:\Nicki\samples
2   422
483   D%
95   while
1   (fullpath(".")
10   !~
1   "[a-zA-Z]:\")
1   423
129   D?
296   echo
1   $fullpath(".")
1   424
129   D?
52   cd
10   ..
1   425
129   D?
412   end
9   d:\Nicki\samples
11   d:\Nicki
1   426
483   D%
52   cd
4   d:\
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="repeatStatement"></a>repeat
94   statement
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
5   <tt>repeat</tt>
94   statement
289   has
94   two
2   forms.
106   In
6605   the
15   short
10   form,
3088   a
25   numeric
1   constant
7   (not
590   an
1   expression)
9   specifies
6605   the
165   number
2059   of
8   times
3144   to
16   execute
6605   the
94   statement
84   following
883   on
6605   the
122   same
75   line.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">427
483   D%
10   repeat
35   4
296   echo
176   do
320   this
25   again
176   do
320   this
25   again
176   do
320   this
25   again
176   do
320   this
25   again
176   do
320   this
25   again
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
106   In
6605   the
53   long
10   form,
5   <tt>repeat</tt>
15   provides
6605   the
207   more
7   conventional
10   repeat
4   structure,
3   iterating
42   until
101   some
44   exit
5   condition
1   satisfied.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">428
483   D%
90   calc
109   i
527   =
214   1
214   1
1   429
483   D%
10   repeat
1   430
129   D?
90   calc
2   i++
1   431
129   D?
42   until
11   (i
2   >
2   5)
214   1
102   2
61   3
35   4
44   5
1652   </div>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Procedures"></a>Procedures
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1   Procedures,
857   as
1307   in
439   any
2   high-level
224   language,
650   are
3088   a
19   convenient
90   way
3144   to
220   package
13   together
3088   a
29   series
2059   of
73   statements
857   as
3088   a
207   more
19   convenient
3   operation.
10   Once
18   you&rsquo;ve
43   defined
3088   a
7   procedure,
675   you
511   can
14   invoke
879   it
44   simply
857   as
790   if
879   it
132   were
3088   a
257   new
47   command.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">432
483   D%
110   proc
1   hello()
1   433
129   D?
296   echo
88   hello
43   world
1   434
129   D?
412   end
1   435
483   D%
88   hello
88   hello
43   world
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
4   <tt>proc</tt>
94   statement
511   can
190   also
924   be
281   used
3144   to
10   ask
81   what
25   procedures
650   are
55   already
43   defined
1041   or
81   what
74   arguments
3088   a
20   particular
72   procedure
1   takes:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">436
483   D%
110   proc
88   hello
88   hello
84   (
210   )
2   437
483   D%
110   proc
498   |
8   mi
1   abs
84   (
38   x
210   )
1   acos
84   (
38   x
210   )
1   asin
84   (
38   x
210   )
53   :
53   :
1   samepath
84   (
32   a,
89   b
210   )
2   sin
84   (
38   x
210   )
1   sinh
84   (
38   x
210   )
3   ---
207   more
3   ---
1   (Press
5   H
1113   for
1   Help)
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
150   You
511   can
18   explicitly
16   discard
3088   a
15   definition
920   with
1   <tt>unproc</tt>;
19   otherwise
6605   the
1129   shell
1   remembers
439   any
72   procedure
675   you
30   tell
879   it
42   until
675   you
44   exit
6605   the
1129   shell
1041   or
45   give
879   it
3088   a
257   new
6   definition.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">438
483   D%
9   unproc
88   hello
1   439
483   D%
88   hello
20   csh:
13   Couldn't
38   find
590   an
40   executable
383   file
10   named
1   'hello'.
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
106   When
675   you
45   give
6605   the
1129   shell
3088   a
72   procedure
3   definition,
6605   the
1129   shell
1   compiles
879   it
178   into
590   an
30   internal
32   form
113   so
1061   that
6605   the
71   next
96   time
675   you
20   refer
3144   to
22   it,
5   it&rsquo;ll
3   save
6605   the
1   reparsing
96   time
2223   and
146   run
30   much
6   faster.
23   As
590   an
101   example,
9   unproc
6605   the
9   whereis
72   procedure
3144   to
53   make
6605   the
1129   shell
1   reload
6605   the
15   definition
640   from
6605   the
10   <tt>.csh</tt>
383   file
2223   and
43   see
81   what
1061   that
135   does
3144   to
6605   the
21   execution
1   time:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">440
483   D%
9   unproc
9   whereis
1   441
483   D%
96   time
9   whereis
2   frizzle
3   d:\Nicki\bin\Frizzle.exe
1   0:00:02.15
1   442
483   D%
4   !!
96   time
9   whereis
2   frizzle
3   d:\Nicki\bin\Frizzle.exe
1   0:00:01.28
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
1   namespace
1113   for
25   procedures
1837   is
30   shared
6   among
364   all
6605   the
3   threads:
790   if
271   one
79   thread
13   creates
3088   a
257   new
7   procedure,
879   it
3   becomes
1   usable
34   immediately
588   by
364   all
6605   the
176   other
20   threads.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="ArgumentsToAProcedure"></a>Arguments
3144   to
3088   a
72   procedure
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
150   You
511   can
60   write
3088   a
72   procedure
113   so
879   it
9   expects
4   arguments,
234   just
857   as
675   you
161   would
1307   in
439   any
176   other
14   high
22   level
4   language.
3   Argument
88   names
650   are
7   somewhat
90   like
94   local
9   variables:
32   their
20   initial
45   values
650   are
436   set
277   at
20   entry
3144   to
3088   a
7   procedure,
3   hiding
439   any
32   previous
1   definition;
104   they
19   go
7   away
857   as
4   soon
675   you
44   exit
6605   the
72   procedure
21   code.
30   Here&rsquo;s
3088   a
63   simple
43   example
201   which
3   compares
6605   the
19   timestamps
883   on
94   two
52   files.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">443
483   D%
110   proc
1   comparedates(a,
17   b)
1   444
129   D?
790   if
2   (`newer
10   $a
1   $b`)
189   then
1   445
129   D?
296   echo
10   $a
1837   is
16   newer
171   than
7   $b
1   446
129   D?
56   else
1   447
129   D?
790   if
1   (samepath(a,
1   b))
189   then
1   448
129   D?
296   echo
10   $a
2223   and
7   $b
650   are
6605   the
122   same
1   file!
1   449
129   D?
56   else
1   450
129   D?
296   echo
10   $a
1837   is
24   older
171   than
7   $b
2   451
129   D?
412   end
1   452
129   D?
412   end
1   453

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Recursion"></a>Recursion
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
261   A
72   procedure
511   can
25   call
176   other
25   procedures
1041   or
115   even
18   itself.
106   When
3088   a
72   procedure
8   calls
9   itself,
102   it&rsquo;s
26   called
3   recursion.
1   Typical
55   uses
2059   of
2   recursion
650   are
1307   in
11   cases
105   where
6605   the
33   problem
17   itself
1837   is
4   recursive,
1041   or
1   self-replicating.
111   For
101   example,
3   here&rsquo;s
3088   a
72   procedure
3144   to
5   walk
27   down

319   directory
3   trees

2223   and

3144   to

10   related
2223   and

1   non-hidden
294   files
1307   in

1061   that
650   are
471   not
1307   in
1   B.
11   (If
675   you
436   set
2   nonohidden
527   =
32   1,

24   compare
17   hidden
294   files
1   also.)
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">478

1604   <p>
23   Notice
1061   that
9   <tt>i</tt>
2223   and

2   declared

12   variables.
468   If

30   shared

2059   of
3   recursion.

1061   that

30   Here&rsquo;s

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="CallingAProcedure"></a>Calling
3088   a
72   procedure
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
23   As
675   you

299   have
1   spotted,
87   there
650   are
94   two
14   ways
3144   to
14   invoke
3088   a
9   procedure.
2   Sometimes,
6605   the
74   arguments
650   are
97   inside
2   parentheses,
29   separated
588   by
6   commas,
2223   and
8   sometimes
21   they&rsquo;re
10   not.
1   What&rsquo;s
6605   the
1   difference?
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
13   difference
1837   is
57   whether
6605   the
7   context
1837   is
590   an
63   expression
1041   or
3088   a
47   command.
23   As
3   discussed
268   when
40   we
281   first
27   introduced
9   expressions,
6605   the
1129   shell
80   always
9   begins
3144   to
7   parse
73   statements
588   by
281   first
11   breaking
72   them
157   up
178   into
27   words.
14   That&rsquo;s
6   fine
1113   for
17   normal
228   commands,
95   e.g.,
92   running
590   an
13   external
11   utility.
7   And
879   it
49   works
190   also
268   when
675   you
84   want
3144   to
270   use
3088   a
72   procedure
857   as
790   if
879   it
132   were
3088   a
29   command,
234   just
19   typing
6605   the
152   name
2059   of
6605   the
72   procedure
42   followed
588   by
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
74   arguments
29   separated
588   by
3   spaces,
95   e.g.,
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">497
483   D%
110   proc
2   power(a,
17   b)
1   498
129   D?
159   return
2   a**b
1   499
129   D?
412   end
5   500
483   D%
5   power
102   2
61   3
20   8
1   501
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
58   But
320   this
5   style
2059   of
13   parsing
4   wouldn&rsquo;t
924   be
44   very
10   suitable
1307   in
47   those
1   instances
105   where
6605   the
39   point
1837   is
3144   to
176   do
101   some
3   kind
2059   of
5   calculation
1041   or
63   expression
4   evaluation.
8   So
268   when
6605   the
1129   shell
10   encounters
32   something
1061   that
56   normally
16   takes
590   an
11   expression,

6605   the
7   <tt>calc</tt>
2   keyword,
1041   or

6605   the

1307   in

3144   to
3088   a
58   different
5   style
2059   of
1   parsing,
6   further
11   breaking

6605   the
80   words

1061   that

1   misunderstood

3088   a

84   type

364   all
6605   the
7   operators,
113   so
40   we

84   type

3088   a
7   <tt>$</tt>

113   so

113   All
2059   of

1837   is
113   so
1061   that
6605   the

1   FORTRAN,
1   Pascal,
38   etc.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
106   When
40   we
25   call
3088   a
72   procedure

12   We

3144   to

29   able

28   pass

16   complex

3144   to

16   take

32   returns

1061   that

3088   a

1679   </p>
1604   <p>
8   So
15   there&rsquo;s
3088   a
3   real
2   problem:

25   call

6605   the

6605   the

6   why

19   common
2   high-level

8   commas

1   class="codesample">501

1   5.5

1   77.500000

1604   <p>

4   operator.
49   &gt;
1307   in
2   power(
2   "(",
2   "2,",
2   "3",
2   ")"
210   )
43   defined
277   at
372   line
1   503
49   &lt;
26   called
640   from
372   line
2   508
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
23   As
675   you
511   can
3   see,
6605   the
63   expression
1   <tt>a**b</tt>
17   failed
3144   to
13   evaluate
88   properly
64   because
1   <tt>a</tt>
363   was
436   set
3144   to
6605   the
281   first
77   argument
8   word,
2   <tt>(</tt>,
2223   and
3   <tt>b</tt>
363   was
436   set
3144   to
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
364   all
6605   the
16   rest
2059   of
6605   the
27   words.
2   Neither
363   was
3088   a
16   number.
468   If
675   you
84   want
3144   to
25   call
3088   a
72   procedure
2223   and
5   substitute
6605   the
105   value
51   back
50   onto
6605   the
428   command
372   line
115   even
268   when
6605   the
7   context
1837   is
471   not
590   an
11   expression,
879   it
511   can
924   be
8   done,
3   however.
15   One
90   way
1837   is
920   with
428   command
2   substitution:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">509
483   D%
296   echo
1   `power
102   2
1   3`
3088   a
1837   is
102   2
89   b
1837   is
61   3
20   8
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
181   This
1837   is
3088   a
49   bit
2   expensive,
2   though,
64   because
6605   the
1129   shell
380   will
299   have
3144   to
38   create
3088   a
257   new
79   thread
3144   to
146   run
6605   the
5   power
72   procedure
2223   and
436   set
157   up
3088   a
21   pipe
3144   to
125   read
6605   the
7   result.
7   And
857   as
675   you
3   see,
790   if
6605   the
72   procedure
190   also
25   writes
3144   to
6   stdout,
22   you&rsquo;ll
6   pick
157   up
1061   that
106   text
6   also,
16   probably
1   unintentionally.
1   Another,
25   better
8   way,
1837   is
3144   to
270   use
3088   a
7   dollar
11   sign
3144   to
54   introduce
6605   the
39   substitution
234   just
857   as
790   if
879   it
363   was
3088   a
243   variable
2   substitution:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">510
483   D%
296   echo
2   $power(2,
7   3)
3088   a
1837   is
102   2
89   b
1837   is
61   3
20   8
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
23   Notice
1061   that
268   when
270   use
6605   the
7   dollar
1   sign-style
72   procedure
8   reference,
6605   the
16   rest
2059   of
6605   the
25   syntax
1837   is
857   as
790   if
6605   the
72   procedure
60   had
382   been
26   called
640   from
20   within
590   an
15   expression.
983   The
74   arguments
176   do
44   need
3144   to
924   be
20   within
6   parenthesis
2223   and
104   they
176   do
44   need
3144   to
924   be
29   separated
588   by
2   commas.
983   The
7   reason
1837   is
234   just
6605   the
122   same
271   one
857   as
1113   for
6   why
3088   a
72   procedure
25   call
1307   in
590   an
63   expression
289   has
3144   to
924   be
58   done
320   this
3   way:
63   without
6605   the
2   parentheses,
1   there&rsquo;d
924   be
227   no
90   way
3144   to
30   tell
105   where
6605   the
74   arguments
1   ended.
261   A
3   nice
2   benefit
1837   is
1061   that
1307   in
6605   the
77   argument
10   list,
40   we
51   get
3144   to
270   use
6605   the
31   full
63   expression
1   grammar:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">511
483   D%
296   echo
2   $power(2,
1   3*sin(1/2))
3088   a
1837   is
102   2
89   b
1837   is
1   1.438277
1   2.709970
1652   </div>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Scripts"></a>Scripts
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
5   Scripts
650   are
3088   a
11   final
90   way
2059   of
1   bundling
157   up
3088   a
29   series
2059   of
73   statements
3144   to
924   be
26   called
157   up
2223   and
13   executed
857   as
3088   a
110   single
47   command.
103   To
38   create
3088   a
24   script,
38   create
3088   a
383   file
920   with
3088   a
10   <tt>.csh</tt>
1   extension:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">512
483   D%
24   cat
4   &gt;trythis.csh
296   echo
88   hello
640   from
13   trythis
6   ^Z
1   513
483   D%
13   trythis
88   hello
640   from
13   trythis
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
106   When
675   you
30   tell
6605   the
1129   shell
3144   to
146   run
3088   a
24   script,
879   it
281   first
13   creates
3088   a
257   new
79   thread
3144   to
146   run
61   it.
181   This
1837   is
3   partly
3088   a
1   holdover
640   from
253   original
283   UNIX
35   language
3   definition,
3   partly
3088   a
9   response
3144   to
3088   a
1   provision
1307   in
841   Windows
1113   for
6   threads,
241   but
471   not
3088   a
4   fork
27   mechanism
2223   and
3   partly
22   due
3144   to
3088   a
1   genuine
44   need
3144   to
2   inexpensively
48   separate
101   some
2059   of
6605   the
1   script&rsquo;s
76   environment
640   from
1061   that
2059   of
122   its
1   caller.
53   (The
71   next
11   chapter
289   has
3088   a
68   longer
4   discussion
2059   of
1   threads.)
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="ArgumentsToAScript"></a>Arguments
3144   to
3088   a
159   script
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
3   Arguments
3144   to
3088   a
1129   shell
159   script
650   are
73   passed
3144   to
879   it
857   as
6605   the
7   <tt>argv</tt>
47   variable.
7   <tt>argv</tt>
380   will
924   be
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
439   any
80   words
1061   that
4   appeared
883   on
6605   the
428   command
372   line
84   following
6605   the
152   name
2059   of
6605   the
1129   shell
19   script.
5   (You
511   can
44   access
6605   the
152   name
2059   of
6605   the
159   script
857   as
6605   the
1   <tt>scriptname</tt>
24   variable.)
150   You
511   can
44   access
7   <tt>argv</tt>
90   like
439   any
176   other
1   variable:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">514
483   D%
24   cat
1   &gt;tryargv.csh
296   echo
1   $#argv
43   $argv
6   ^Z
1   515
483   D%
1   tryargv
88   hello
91   how
650   are
675   you
35   4
88   hello
91   how
650   are
675   you
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
29   There
650   are
190   also
101   some
10   shorthand
2   forms
1113   for
9   getting
28   individual
80   words
2059   of
1   <tt>argv</tt>.
2   <tt>$0</tt>
109   through
1   <tt>$9</tt>
1837   is
6605   the
122   same
857   as
3   <tt>$argv[0]</tt>
109   through
1   <tt>$argv[9]</tt>.
4   (Remember
1061   that
42   unless
675   you
299   have
6   <tt>nullwords</tt>
67   set,
3   subscripting
18   errors
380   will
924   be
1   caught.)
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="ignorestatus"></a>ignorestatus
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
468   If
675   you
60   write
3088   a
159   script
920   with
2   serially
3   connected
73   statements
6605   the
199   only
4   thing
1061   that
161   would
58   cause
6605   the
1129   shell
3144   to
4   quit
98   before
879   it
19   gets
3144   to
6605   the
412   end
161   would
924   be
590   an
3   explicit
1   failure:
590   an
27   application
152   name
1061   that
3   couldn&rsquo;t
924   be
12   found,
3088   a
107   child
70   process
1061   that
6   terminated
920   with
3088   a
3   segment
1   fault,
1041   or
32   something
56   else
2059   of
590   an
4   equally
2   serious
1   nature.
1   Often
1307   in
3088   a
24   script,
26   that&rsquo;s
471   not
81   what
675   you
1   want:
18   you&rsquo;ve
63   written
6605   the
159   script
920   with
6605   the
1   expectation
1061   that
26   everything
380   will
102   work
12   (as
675   you
1   planned)
640   from
271   one
4   step
3144   to
6605   the
5   next.
468   If
32   something
1837   is
3   wrong,
13   you&rsquo;d
90   like
6605   the
159   script
3144   to
4   quit
857   as
4   soon
857   as
3   possible,
98   before
439   any
1   damage
1837   is
11   done.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
90   way
675   you
176   do
320   this
1837   is
588   by
35   setting
1   <tt>ignorestatus
527   =
1   0</tt>,
201   which
99   means
675   you
176   do
471   not
84   want
3144   to
16   ignore
6605   the
60   status
4   codes
8   coming
51   back
3144   to
320   this
79   thread
640   from
122   its
4   children.
30   Here&rsquo;s
590   an
43   example
1307   in
6605   the
230   main
2   thread:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">516
483   D%
436   set
3   ignorestatus
527   =
120   0
1   517
483   D%
30   rcode
21   10
21   10
20   csh:
983   The
107   child
70   process
92   running
2   'rcode'
4   exited
920   with
3088   a
17   non-zero
60   status
527   =
5   10.
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
106   In
6605   the
230   main
8   thread,
6605   the
1129   shell
380   will
8   keep
883   on
17   going
2223   and
52   prompt
1113   for
6605   the
71   next
428   command
64   because
6   interactively
26   that&rsquo;s
35   most
3   sensible.
983   The
1129   shell
33   knows
3144   to
176   do
320   this
64   because
2   <tt>ignoreerrors
527   =
1   1</tt>.
58   But
1307   in
3088   a
24   script,
18   errors
58   cause
6605   the
1129   shell
3144   to
1   quit:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">518
483   D%
24   cat
4   &gt;trythis.csh
90   calc
2   ignoreerrors
436   set
3   ignorestatus
527   =
120   0
30   rcode
21   10
296   echo
1   doesn^'t
31   print
6   ^Z
2   519
483   D%
13   trythis
120   0
21   10
1   csh(d:\Nicki\trythis.csh:line
1   3):
983   The
107   child
70   process
92   running
2   'rcode'
4   exited
920   with
3088   a
17   non-zero
60   status
527   =
5   10.
49   &gt;
1307   in
1   d:\Nicki\trythis.csh
49   &lt;
26   called
640   from
372   line
2   519
20   csh:
983   The
15   csh
159   script
383   file
1   'd:\Nicki\samples\trythis.csh'
4   exited
920   with
3088   a
17   non-zero
60   status
527   =
5   10.
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
23   Notice
1061   that
1307   in
320   this
97   case
40   we
9   got
94   two
1   messages,
271   one
640   from
6605   the
33   threads
7   executing
6605   the
159   script
2223   and
271   one
640   from
6605   the
230   main
8   thread,
25   reporting
81   what
6605   the
159   script
3   returned.
3   Let&rsquo;s
159   return
3144   to
6605   the
17   normal
44   mode
2059   of
9   ignoring
2   status:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">520
483   D%
436   set
3   ignorestatus
527   =
214   1
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="sourceStatement"></a>source
94   statement
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
12   examples
113   so
5   far
299   have
26   shown
91   how
3088   a
159   script
1837   is
56   normally
146   run
7   somewhat
4   isolated
1307   in
3088   a
48   separate
16   thread.
159   It
1837   is
190   also
44   possible
3144   to
146   run
3088   a
159   script
1307   in
252   your
213   current
79   thread
191   using
6605   the
1   <tt>source</tt>
30   statement.
150   You
55   might
84   want
3144   to
176   do
320   this
790   if
675   you
11   wanted
3144   to
6605   the
159   script
3144   to
78   change
252   your
213   current
1   thread&rsquo;s
4   private
111   variables
1041   or
122   its
213   current
103   directories
1041   or
24   disk.
30   Here&rsquo;s
590   an
43   example
3144   to
18   showing
91   how
3088   a
7   sourced
159   script
20   runs
1307   in
6605   the
122   same
2   thread:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">521
483   D%
24   cat
4   &gt;trythis.csh
296   echo
18   argv
527   =
2   $argv,
4   threadid
527   =
4   $threadid
6   ^Z
2   522
483   D%
296   echo
4   $threadid
17   6
2   523
483   D%
13   trythis
88   hello
43   world
18   argv
527   =
88   hello
2   world,
4   threadid
527   =
28   7
2   524
483   D%
51   source
13   trythis
88   hello
43   world
18   argv
527   =
88   hello
2   world,
4   threadid
527   =
17   6
2   526
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
23   Notice
91   how
6605   the
7   <tt>argv</tt>
77   argument
5   vector
1837   is
436   set
157   up
6605   the
122   same
1307   in
93   either
43   case.
139   Also,
8   notice
1061   that
6605   the
94   statement
165   number
3   skipped
588   by
11   one.
106   When
675   you
51   source
3088   a
24   script,
6605   the
13   effect
1837   is
4   precisely
857   as
790   if
675   you
49   typed
47   those
111   lines
1307   in
11   directly
3144   to
6605   the
55   shell.
983   The
111   lines
125   read
588   by
51   source
650   are
115   even
6   entered
178   into
6605   the
112   history
1   list:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">526
483   D%
11   h
44   5
2   522
296   echo
4   $threadid
2   523
13   trythis
88   hello
43   world

13   trythis
88   hello
43   world

18   argv
527   =
2   $argv,

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="CautionLabelsAndGotos"></a>Caution:&nbsp;
7   labels
2223   and
4   gotos
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
12   We
3   haven&rsquo;t
2   mentioned
7   labels
2223   and
4   gotos
6   yet
241   but
879   it
16   probably
14   isn&rsquo;t
3088   a
1   surprise
1061   that
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
42   allows
21   them.
1   Indeed:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">527
483   D%
24   cat
4   &gt;trythis.csh
14   goto
71   next
296   echo
320   this
135   does
471   not
31   print
3   next:
296   echo
320   this
35   prints
6   ^Z
1   528
483   D%
13   trythis
320   this
35   prints
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
468   If
675   you
84   want
3144   to
270   use
2   <tt>goto</tt>s
3144   to
1   labels,
675   you
131   should
924   be
3   aware
1061   that
15   forward
35   references
511   can
924   be
20   little
2   trickier
171   than
3088   a
207   more
7   conventional
15   compiled
4   language.
983   The
1930   C
1129   shell
42   allows
675   you
3144   to
6   redefine
3088   a
40   label
3   anytime
675   you
10   like.
58   But
790   if
675   you
84   type
3088   a
4   <tt>goto</tt>
1061   that
7   refers
3144   to
14   previously
43   defined
5   label,
6605   the
1129   shell
289   has
227   no
90   way
2059   of
3   knowing
1061   that
675   you
6   intend
879   it
3144   to
6   redefine
879   it
157   up
2   ahead.
150   You
511   can
8   keep
92   running
6605   the
77   last
43   example
53   over
2223   and
53   over
320   this
90   way
920   with
21   exactly
6605   the
122   same
1   result:
64   because
3088   a
257   new
79   thread
1837   is
150   started
197   each
96   time
920   with
227   no
7   prior
15   definition
2059   of
5   next,
6605   the
1129   shell
33   knows
879   it
64   must
924   be
3088   a
15   forward
7   reference.
58   But
1   imagine
91   how
2   repeatedly
6   sourcing
320   this
159   script
161   would
34   fail
1307   in
590   an
9   infinite
2   loop:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">%
51   source
13   trythis
320   this
35   prints
60   %
51   source
13   trythis
320   this
35   prints
320   this
35   prints
320   this
35   prints
320   this
35   prints
320   this
35   prints
53   :
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
1   (Beware
2059   of
38   actually
35   trying
5   this:
675   you
193   may
38   find
879   it
3   difficult
3144   to
17   interrupt
94   out
2059   of
1   it.)
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
7   reason
6   sourcing
6605   the
159   script
3088   a
33   second
96   time
20   turns
178   into
590   an
9   infinite
23   loop
1837   is
1061   that
6605   the
40   label
71   next
1837   is
55   already
43   defined
61   after
6605   the
281   first
12   run.
983   The
33   second
8   time,
268   when
6605   the
4   <tt>goto</tt>
1837   is
125   read
640   from
6605   the
24   script,
6605   the
112   history
190   list
161   would
43   look
32   something
90   like
5   this:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
3   class="codesample">source
13   trythis
14   goto
71   next
296   echo
135   does
471   not
31   print
3   next:
296   echo
320   this
35   prints
51   source
13   trythis
14   goto
71   next
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
6   What
14   particularly
19   gets
6605   the
1129   shell
178   into
3088   a
1   muddle
1837   is
6605   the
90   way
320   this
2   recurses
1   indefinitely:
197   each
96   time
109   through
6605   the
5   loop,
879   it
2   recurses
109   through
590   an
55   another
22   level
2059   of
1   sourcing.
1   Ultimately,
879   it
20   runs
94   out
2059   of
24   stack
67   space
2223   and
3   fails.
181   This
1837   is
471   not
3088   a
3   nice
90   way
3144   to
11   treat
6605   the
2   shell!
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
106   In
5   general,
102   it&rsquo;s
10   hard
3144   to
3   recommend
2   <tt>goto</tt>s
1307   in
439   any
5   programming
35   language
1   nowadays;
1307   in
3088   a
159   script
675   you
6   intend
3144   to
146   run
191   using
1   <tt>source</tt>,
104   they
511   can
924   be
14   particularly
1   nasty.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
1129   shell
135   does
37   automatically
1   age
7   labels
2223   and
2   throw
72   them
7   away
61   after
3088   a
95   while
115   even
790   if
104   they
3   haven&rsquo;t
382   been
1   redefined.
106   When
879   it
10   discards
3088   a
5   label,
879   it
190   also
10   discards
439   any
15   compiled
73   statements
102   it&rsquo;s
382   been
3   holding
50   onto
1061   that
76   could
299   have
382   been
13   executed
199   only
588   by
3088   a
4   <tt>goto</tt>
3144   to
1061   that
5   label.
983   The
1   cutoff
39   point
105   where
6605   the
1129   shell
9   begins
3144   to
16   discard
7   labels
1837   is
436   set
588   by
6605   the
1   <tt>gotowindow</tt>
47   variable.
3   Let&rsquo;s
410   now
4   clean
157   up
61   after
1   ourselves
2223   and
16   move
1   along:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">529
483   D%
27   rm
1   trythis.csh
1652   </div>

3314   <a
55   name="SeeAlso"></a>See
190   also
523   </h4>
1604   <p>

14   statements</a><br/>
3314   <a
58   href="45-OrderOfEvaluation.htm">Order
2059   of

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="#Interrupts">Interrupts</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#MaskingInterrupts">Masking
1   interrupts</a><br/>
3314   <a

55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Interrupts"></a>Interrupts
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
10   Normally,
268   when
675   you
84   type
2   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>C</kbd>,
675   you
17   interrupt
6605   the
17   foreground
3   activity.
58   But
81   what
790   if
675   you
132   were
1307   in
6605   the
1   midst
2059   of
3088   a
16   complex
159   script
2223   and
18   needed
3144   to
176   do
101   some
3   kind
2059   of
4   cleanup
98   before
675   you
1   exited?
6   What
790   if
675   you
11   wanted
3144   to
924   be
10   sure
675   you
60   had
3088   a
2   chance
3144   to
14   delete
439   any
6   temporary
294   files
675   you
55   might
299   have
1   littered
1   around?
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
9   solution
1837   is
6605   the
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
11   statement,
201   which
42   allows
675   you
3144   to
21   define
6605   the
5   action
3144   to
924   be
25   taken
268   when
590   an
17   interrupt
1837   is
2   received.
159   It
39   causes
2   whatever&rsquo;s
92   running
3144   to
924   be
4   interrupted
364   all
6605   the
90   way
51   back
157   up
3144   to
6605   the
35   block
1307   in
201   which
6605   the
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
15   routine
363   was
43   defined
2223   and
1113   for
6605   the
17   interrupt
15   routine
3144   to
924   be
146   run
1307   in
1061   that
213   current
16   thread.
2   Within
1061   that
17   interrupt
3   routine,
675   you
1   could,
1113   for
101   example,
14   remove
364   all
252   your
6   temporary
294   files
2223   and
14   goto
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
6605   the
159   script
1041   or
159   return
3088   a
94   special
105   value
640   from
3088   a
72   procedure
1041   or
34   whatever
56   else
55   might
924   be
4   appropriate.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">530
483   D%
8   onintr
296   echo
88   hello
1   531
483   D%
1113   for
109   i
527   =
214   1
3144   to
44   5
176   do
1   532
129   D?
296   echo
26   $i
1   533
129   D?
11   sleep
214   1
1   534
129   D?
412   end
214   1
11   ^C
88   hello
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
30   Here&rsquo;s
55   another
101   example,
5   returning
640   from
3088   a
9   procedure.
8   Note
91   how
6605   the
105   value
15   returned
10   (and
1   printed)
1837   is
6605   the
271   one
12   produced
588   by
6605   the
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
30   statement.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">535
483   D%
110   proc
1   foobar()
1   536
129   D?
8   onintr
159   return
44   5
1   537
129   D?
1113   for
109   i
527   =
214   1
3144   to
44   5
176   do
1   538
129   D?
296   echo
26   $i
1   539
129   D?
11   sleep
214   1
1   540
129   D?
412   end
1   541
129   D?
159   return
102   2
1   542
129   D?
412   end
1   543
483   D%
3   foobar
214   1
11   ^C
44   5
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
106   When
21   execution
4   leaves
6605   the
35   block
1307   in
201   which
590   an
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
1837   is
13   defined,
6605   the
32   previous
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
8   (if
2   any)
25   again
16   takes
2   effect.
8   Note
1061   that
3088   a
48   null
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
15   routine
135   does
471   not
19   mean
1061   that
8   interrupts
650   are
1   ignored,
4   merely
1061   that
61   after
13   processing
1   bubbles
51   back
157   up
3144   to
6605   the
22   level
105   where
1061   that
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
363   was
13   defined,
1061   that
879   it
380   will
23   continue
920   with
6605   the
71   next
30   statement.
23   Notice
1   how,
1307   in
320   this
101   example,
268   when
6605   the
5   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>C</kbd>
1837   is
4   received
268   when
2   obviously
21   execution
1837   is
2   stuck
1307   in
6605   the
9   infinite
23   loop
97   inside
2   bar,
1061   that
6605   the
2   <tt>onintr
14   goto
1   xx</tt>
39   causes
3088   a
2   branch
3144   to
4   xx
1307   in
6605   the
122   same
35   block
1307   in
201   which
6605   the
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
363   was
13   defined,
471   not
6605   the
1   <tt>xx</tt>
1307   in
6605   the
35   block
105   where
21   execution
363   was
17   going
18   on.
139   Also,
8   notice
1061   that
10   once
56   both
25   procedures
299   have
382   been
2   exited,
4   we&rsquo;re
51   back
3144   to
6605   the
122   same
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
15   routine
40   we
43   defined
3088   a
84   few
73   statements
1   earlier.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">544
483   D%
110   proc
3   foo()
1   545
129   D?
8   onintr
14   goto
4   xx
1   546
129   D?
16   bar
1   547
129   D?
2   xx:
296   echo
320   this
1837   is
19   foo
1   548
129   D?
412   end
1   549
483   D%
110   proc
1   bar()
1   550
129   D?
95   while
3   (1)
597   #
1   Deliberately
9   infinite
23   loop
1   551
129   D?
412   end
1   552
129   D?
2   xx:
296   echo
320   this
1837   is
16   bar
1   553
129   D?
412   end
1   554
483   D%
19   foo
11   ^C
320   this
1837   is
19   foo
2   555
483   D%
11   ^C
88   hello
2   555
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="MaskingInterrupts"></a>Masking
8   interrupts
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
106   In
11   cases
105   where
13   you&rsquo;d
90   like
3144   to
44   simply
28   turn
91   off
8   interrupts
1041   or
5   defer
13   processing
7   them,
270   use
6605   the
3   <tt>irqmask</tt>
47   variable.
32   By
38   default,
102   it&rsquo;s
436   set
3144   to
18   0,
54   meaning
8   interrupts
380   will
924   be
3   accepted
4   immediately.
13   Setting
879   it
3144   to
214   1
99   means
8   interrupts
380   will
924   be
3   deferred
42   until
6605   the
8   mask
1837   is
4   cleared
6   again.
13   Setting
879   it
3144   to
102   2
99   means
8   interrupts
380   will
924   be
2   totally
22   ignored.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
3   <tt>irqmask</tt>
1837   is
3088   a
5   per-thread
39   variable,
54   meaning
197   each
79   thread
511   can
2   independently
7   decide
91   how
879   it
380   will
3   respond
3144   to
2   interrupts.
45   Each
257   new
79   thread
80   always
29   starts
94   out
920   with
1   <tt>irqmask
527   =
2   0</tt>
1   (interrupts
1   enabled).
1679   </p>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="ForegroundActivities"></a>Foreground
13   activities
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1   Whenever
675   you
84   type
439   any
29   command,
6605   the
13   shell&rsquo;s
17   normal
8   behavior
1837   is
3144   to
87   start
157   up
1061   that
107   child
7   activity
2223   and
189   then
19   go
3144   to
11   sleep
6   waiting
1113   for
879   it
3144   to
5   complete.
181   This
1837   is
3088   a
17   foreground
3   activity.
468   If
675   you
87   start
32   something
2223   and
189   then
7   decide
675   you
84   want
3144   to
9   stop
22   it,
84   type
2   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>C</kbd>,
201   which
64   wakes
157   up
6605   the
1129   shell
2223   and
39   causes
879   it
3144   to
9   stop
6605   the
17   foreground
4   activities.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
468   If
6605   the
27   application
1837   is
17   going
3144   to
146   run
1307   in
122   its
51   own
48   separate
12   window,
26   that&rsquo;s
35   treated
4   specially.
111   For
101   example,
3   typing:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">555
483   D%
8   notepad
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
39   causes
1   <tt>notepad</tt>,
201   which
1837   is
3088   a
8   graphical
9   application,
3144   to
21   appear
1307   in
3088   a
257   new
29   window.
106   In
1061   that
13   case,
42   unless
6605   the
428   command
1837   is
1307   in
159   script
1041   or
33   part
2059   of
3088   a
207   more
16   complex
4   structure,
95   e.g.,
3088   a
8   pair
2059   of
73   statements
7   joined
588   by
4   <tt>;</tt>,
5   <tt>&amp;&amp;</tt>
1041   or
3   <tt>||</tt>,
15   there&rsquo;s
227   no
7   reason
1113   for
6605   the
1129   shell
3144   to
14   wait
1113   for
6605   the
1   child&rsquo;s
10   completion.
11   After
6   all,
790   if
675   you
84   want
3144   to
14   wait
42   until
102   it&rsquo;s
58   done
675   you
511   can
176   do
1061   that
1   yourself!
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
90   way
6605   the
1129   shell
3   figures
94   out
81   what
84   type
2059   of
27   application
23   you&rsquo;re
31   starting
1837   is
588   by
38   actually
4   examining
6605   the
40   executable
383   file
18   itself.
159   It
511   can
30   tell
6605   the
13   difference
64   between
43   console
2223   and
8   graphical
6   applications.
106   When
675   you
87   start
590   an
27   application
1061   that
5   needs
3088   a
257   new
12   window,
6605   the
1129   shell
14   comes
37   right
51   back
1113   for
6605   the
71   next
47   command.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
139   Also,
790   if
6605   the
107   child
1837   is
3088   a
8   graphical
27   application
2223   and
30   stdout
1041   or
17   stderr
1837   is
7   tied
3144   to
6605   the
43   console
66   window
105   where
6605   the
1930   C
13   shell&rsquo;s
8   running,
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
8   recognizes
1061   that
1061   that
24   handle
14   won&rsquo;t
924   be
7   inheritable
588   by
6605   the
107   child
2223   and
46   instead
380   will
38   create
3088   a
7   pipe.
3   It&rsquo;ll
45   give
6605   the
60   write
412   end
3144   to
6605   the
107   child
2223   and
38   create
3088   a
65   background
79   thread
1307   in
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
3144   to
125   read
41   anything
8   coming
51   back
53   over
6605   the
21   pipe
640   from
6605   the
107   child
2223   and
60   copy
879   it
3144   to
6605   the

29   window.
181   This
99   means
1061   that
920   with
6605   the
1930   C
980   shell,
675   you
511   can

1   printf&rsquo;s
1307   in
3088   a

1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="BackgroundActivities"></a>Background
13   activities
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
468   If
675   you

3144   to
146   run

30   don&rsquo;t
84   want
3144   to

1113   for
879   it
2   complete,

590   an
5   ampersand

6605   the
412   end
2059   of
6605   the

1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">556
483   D%
16   wc
14   hello.c
1   &gt;linecnt
29   &amp;
214   1
1   557
483   D%
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
181   This
13   creates
3088   a
107   child
70   process
3144   to
146   run
97   word
16   count
1307   in
6605   the
1   background,
920   with
122   its
64   output
1   directed
3144   to
3088   a
96   file.
983   The
21   <tt>1</tt>
63   message
99   means
1061   that
3088   a
257   new
65   background
18   job
1   (job
17   1)
289   has
382   been
8   spawned
3144   to
70   process
6605   the
428   command
95   while
675   you
23   continue
3144   to
43   work.
983   The
18   job
29   starts
857   as
3088   a
257   new
16   thread.
3   If,
857   as
1307   in
320   this

3088   a

70   process
1837   is

1061   that

38   create
879   it
920   with
3088   a
8   CreateProcess
25   call
3144   to
6605   the
841   Windows
16   kernel

7   exit.
45   Each
257   new
8   thread,
70   process
1041   or
204   screen
26   group
8   spawned
588   by
3088   a
65   background
18   job
380   will
12   inherit
122   its
2   parent&rsquo;s
18   job
16   number.
4   Every
96   time
3088   a
257   new
65   background
18   job
1837   is
2   created,
6605   the
18   job
165   number
1837   is
2   incremented.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
270   use
2059   of
28   i/o
25   redirection
1307   in
16   combination
920   with
3088   a
65   background
7   activity
1837   is
471   not
1   accidental.
468   If
102   it&rsquo;s
471   not
2   redirected,
879   it
8   goes
3144   to

1   terminal,
1   intermixing

6605   the

2059   of
439   any
17   foreground
4   activities.

1061   that

924   be
21   exactly

675   you
7   want.
111   For
101   example,
3   here&rsquo;s
3088   a

1   class="codesample">557

1   Sleepyhead.)

2   Up,

1604   <p>
983   The
5   ampersand
49   works
2   consistently
1113   for
11   things
1061   that

3088   a

1679   </p>

1   class="codesample">558

1604   <p>
261   A
257   new
18   job

1679   </p>
1604   <p>
4   Background
13   activities
1   are,
1307   in
3088   a
1   sense,
1   detached:
19   typing

1604   <p>
1   Several

650   are
