522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="VariablesAndThreads"></a>Variables
2223   and
33   threads
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
2   User-defined
111   variables
650   are
30   shared
64   between
364   all
5   active
33   threads
42   unless
21   they&rsquo;re
2   declared
857   as
3314   <a
1   href="22-Variables.htm"><tt>local</tt></a>.
468   If
271   one
45   changes
3088   a
2   variable&rsquo;s
20   value,
6605   the
176   other
33   threads
43   see
1061   that
78   change
4   immediately.
13   Because
6605   the
28   individual
33   threads
146   run
2   asynchronously,
320   this
511   can
58   cause
101   some
2   surprising
8   results.
106   In
320   this
101   example,
6605   the
17   foreground
79   thread
3   spawns
257   new
65   background
33   threads
2223   and
2   increments
6605   the
243   variable
9   <tt>i</tt>
12   faster
171   than
6605   the
12   children
511   can
1   execute.
32   By
6605   the
96   time
439   any
6605   the
12   children
38   actually
1   start,
6605   the
23   loop
289   has
1   finished
2223   and
23   every
79   thread
7   sees
9   <tt>i</tt>
857   as
25   having
6605   the
105   value
11   5.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">562
483   D%
1113   for
109   i
527   =
214   1
3144   to
61   3
176   do
1   563
129   D?
296   echo
26   $i
29   &amp;
1   564
129   D?
412   end
35   4
44   5
17   6
1   565
483   D%
44   5
44   5
44   5
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
15   One
9   solution
1837   is
3144   to
270   use
6605   the
3   <tt>eval</tt>
30   statement.
3   <tt>eval</tt>
2   parses
6605   the
106   text
102   it&rsquo;s
73   passed
277   at
2   run-time,
61   after
439   any
243   variable
34   substitutions
299   have
382   been
11   done.
13   Because
6605   the
5   ampersand
1837   is
97   inside
6605   the
6   quotes,
122   its
94   special
54   meaning
14   isn&rsquo;t
3   detected
42   until
1   run-time.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">565
483   D%
1113   for
109   i
527   =
214   1
3144   to
61   3
176   do
1   566
129   D?
23   eval
2   "echo
26   $i
1   &amp;"
1   567
129   D?
412   end
28   7
20   8
3   9
1   568
483   D%
214   1
102   2
61   3
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
261   A
25   better
9   solution
1837   is
3144   to
53   make
9   <tt>i</tt>
3088   a
6   <tt>local</tt>
39   variable,
30   since
1   locals
650   are
6   snapshotted
2223   and
23   copied
268   when
6605   the
107   child
1837   is
1   spawned:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">568
483   D%
94   local
8   i;
1113   for
109   i
527   =
214   1
3144   to
61   3
176   do
1   569
483   D%
296   echo
26   $i
29   &amp;
1   570
483   D%
412   end
21   10
6   11
19   12
1   571
483   D%
214   1
102   2
61   3
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Reentrancy"></a>Re-entrancy
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
5   Threads
190   also
54   introduce
6605   the
9   possibility
2059   of
1   re-entrancy.
106   In
6605   the
71   next
101   example,
40   we
21   define
3088   a
72   procedure
1113   for
1   summing
364   all
6605   the
6   integers
214   1
3144   to
1   <tt><var>n</var></tt>.
23   Notice
1061   that
879   it
49   works
6   fine
790   if
102   it&rsquo;s
146   run
588   by
9   itself,
241   but
24   gives
6605   the
14   wrong
2   answers
790   if
94   two
33   threads
47   try
3144   to
146   run
879   it
1   simultaneously:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">571
483   D%
110   proc
1   sum(n)
1   572
129   D?
284   @
31   s
527   =
120   0
1   573
129   D?
1113   for
109   i
527   =
214   1
3144   to
49   n
176   do
1   574
129   D?
284   @
31   s
14   +=
109   i
1   575
129   D?
412   end
1   576
129   D?
412   end
1   577
483   D%
19   sum
16   100
1   5050
1   578
483   D%
19   sum
16   100
2   &amp;;
19   sum
16   100
3   13
1   6780
1   579
483   D%
1   7177
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
14   Here
6   also,
6605   the
9   solution
1837   is
44   simply
3144   to
26   include
3088   a
94   statement
4   defining
9   <tt>i</tt>
2223   and
2   <tt>s</tt>
857   as
6   <tt>local</tt>
97   inside
6605   the
9   procedure.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Threads"></a>Threads
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
106   In
3   building
1043   Hamilton
1930   C
980   shell,
3088   a
1   conscious
2223   and
1   fundamental
1   decision
363   was
56   made
3144   to
270   use
33   threads
1307   in
25   many
8   situations
105   where
9   earlier
3   shells
55   might
299   have
33   created
48   separate
11   processes.
983   The
48   result
1837   is
3088   a
5   dramatically
207   more
2   responsive
1   tool
3   albeit
271   one
920   with
101   some
1   subtle
3   semantic
15   differences
640   from
6605   the
2   original.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
283   UNIX
1930   C
1129   shell
35   language
15   definition
26   called
1113   for
28   individual
4   stages
2059   of
3088   a
3   pipeline,
428   command
34   substitutions
2223   and
52   scripts
197   each
3144   to
924   be
146   run
1307   in
3088   a
48   separate
70   process
1   cloned
588   by
1   forking
6605   the
230   main
20   process.
7   Using
1   forking,
6605   the
107   child
37   inherited
364   all
2059   of
122   its
2   parent&rsquo;s
9   state
3   (current
32   directory,
42   open
383   file
1   handles,
90   environmental
2223   and
436   set
22   variables,
9   etc.)
241   but
439   any
45   changes
879   it
56   made
199   only
9   affected
18   itself.
11   On
3088   a
283   UNIX
110   system
920   with
2   paging
8   hardware
2223   and
6605   the
4   fork
27   mechanism
4   built
178   into
6605   the
3   kernel,
102   it&rsquo;s
8   pretty
6   fast.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
58   But
6605   the
841   Windows
21   Win32
1   API&rsquo;s
176   do
471   not
299   have
4   fork
4   ,
2223   and
35   trying
3144   to
3   recreate
4   precisely
320   this
35   language
3   semantic
126   under
841   Windows
161   would
299   have
382   been
1   foolishly
2   expensive,
3   potentially
21   adding
35   several
23   seconds
3144   to
6605   the
18   startup
96   time
197   each
96   time
675   you
21   invoked
3088   a
1129   shell
19   script.
11   On
6605   the
176   other
3   hand,
94   these
4   systems
176   do
2   offer
20   threads.
261   A
70   process
511   can
299   have
8   lots
2059   of
33   threads
2223   and
197   each
271   one
511   can
146   run
15   along
277   at
122   its
51   own
1   pace.
106   When
3088   a
79   thread
8   calls
6605   the
16   kernel
3144   to
176   do
32   something
1061   that
16   takes
3088   a
53   long
96   time
32   (e.g.,
3088   a
83   disk
1   read),
879   it
8   goes
3144   to
11   sleep
2223   and
37   doesn&rsquo;t
3   wake
157   up
42   until
6605   the
1   data&rsquo;s
2   ready.
106   When
271   one
79   thread
8   goes
3144   to
1   sleep,
6605   the
16   kernel
20   looks
45   around
1113   for
55   another
26   that&rsquo;s
5   ready
3144   to
12   run.
32   By
191   using
6   threads,
102   it&rsquo;s
44   possible
3144   to
17   ensure
1061   that
790   if
271   one
1   thing&rsquo;s
9   got
3144   to
1   wait,
1061   that
14   won&rsquo;t
13   hold
157   up
26   everything
5   else.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
5   Threads
28   turn
94   out
3144   to
924   be
115   even
12   faster
171   than
3088   a
4   fork
1   (regardless
2059   of
6605   the
1   hardware),
64   because
6605   the
10   amount
2059   of
9   state
34   information
19   associated
920   with
3088   a
79   thread
1837   is
113   so
20   little
6   compared
3144   to
1061   that
2059   of
3088   a
20   process.
23   As
3   viewed
588   by
6605   the
3   kernel,
3088   a
79   thread
1   &ldquo;owns&rdquo;
199   only
3088   a
4   register
67   set,
3088   a
24   stack
2223   and
590   an
1   instruction
2   pointer.
6   Everything
4   else,
2   memory,
213   current
12   directories,
22   etc.,
1837   is
30   shared
6   among
364   all
6605   the
33   threads
1307   in
3088   a
20   process.
181   This
99   means
14   creating
3088   a
79   thread
1837   is
44   very
1   fast,
857   as
1837   is
2   switching
64   between
20   threads.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
11   On
6605   the
176   other
3   hand,
191   using
33   threads
3144   to
8   best
5   advantage
3   imposed
101   some
7   significant
1   design
1   challenges
1307   in
1043   Hamilton
1930   C
55   shell.
2   Certainly,
1113   for
101   example,
84   few
161   would
9   consider
879   it
4   acceptable
790   if
3088   a
159   script
92   running
1307   in
6605   the
65   background
76   could
1   <kbd>Boom<script
18   type="text/javascript">
790   if
1   (Arrows.haveWingdings
210   )
1   document.write('
28   <span
1   style="font-family:
1   Wingdings">&#x4d;</span>');
56   else
1   document.write('!');
1   </script></kbd>
78   change
252   your
17   foreground
213   current
1   disk!
983   The
33   problem
363   was
3144   to
38   create
3088   a
90   way
1113   for
33   threads
3144   to
1   cooperatively
4   share
6605   the
70   process
7   resources
241   but
63   without
9   giving
7   away
364   all
6605   the
15   performance
5   advantage
1   we&rsquo;d
150   started
920   with
588   by
191   using
20   threads.
139   Also,
101   some
2059   of
6605   the
1   elegance
2059   of
33   threads
1837   is
6605   the
1   idea
675   you
511   can
8   keep
14   creating
257   new
1   ones.
45   Each
1837   is
234   just
90   like
6605   the
3   next:
439   any
91   given
79   thread
511   can
146   run
234   just
857   as
16   complex
3088   a
18   program
857   as
6605   the
71   next
2223   and
197   each
511   can
5   spawn
257   new
20   threads.
159   It
161   would
924   be
3088   a
1   shame
3144   to
5   lose
1061   that
9   recursive
1   characteristic
588   by
1   clumsiness
1307   in
6605   the
35   language
1   design.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
4   Starting
920   with
3088   a
4   clean
1   sheet
2059   of
1   paper,
19   our
9   solution
363   was
3088   a
1   highly
2   multi-threaded
1   architecture.
159   It
9   expects
675   you
3144   to
87   start
8   lots
2059   of
3   threads:
4   stages
1307   in
3088   a
3   pipe,
65   background
1   activities,
38   etc.
103   To
19   our
1   knowledge,
227   no
176   other
428   command
9   processor
883   on
439   any
110   system
1   employs
320   this
2   technology.
2   Certainly,
364   all
6605   the
66   code
1307   in
1043   Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
1837   is
1   re-entrant:
87   there
1837   is
3088   a
6   minimum
2059   of
1   global,
1   statically-allocated
3   data;
6605   the
84   few
111   variables
1061   that
650   are
4   global
2   tend
3144   to
924   be
1   pointers
3144   to
6605   the
1   roots
2059   of
25   various
1   dynamically-allocated
34   information
3   trees
1113   for
1   managing
22   variables,
6   threads,
2   processes,
383   file
5   handles
2223   and
176   other
2   resources.
106   When
6605   the
1129   shell
13   creates
3088   a
257   new
8   thread,
879   it
13   creates
6605   the
11   appropriate
3   records
2223   and
5   links
72   them
7   in.
16   Some
4   characteristics
91   given
6605   the
257   new
79   thread
650   are
37   inherited
640   from
122   its
21   parent
2223   and
101   some
80   always
51   get
436   set
3144   to
19   specific
3   defaults.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
4   Shared
111   variables
2223   and
176   other
7   resources
650   are
1   semaphored:
98   before
191   using
3088   a
1   resource,
3088   a
79   thread
3   requests
4   it;
790   if
35   several
7   resources
650   are
18   needed
1   simultaneously,
21   they&rsquo;re
80   always
4   requested
1307   in
6605   the
122   same
25   order
3144   to
23   avoid
1   deadlocks.
2   Critical
7   resources
650   are
1   held
199   only
1113   for
15   short
3   periods.
3   There&rsquo;s
227   no
4   polling
2   anywhere.
1   &ldquo;Handle&rdquo;
4   mechanisms
650   are
281   used
113   so
7   that,
95   e.g.,
3088   a
79   thread
511   can
7   decide
790   if
122   its
213   current
83   disk
2223   and
103   directories
650   are
436   set
157   up
588   by
44   simply
12   comparing
590   an
12   integer.
7   Path
19   hashing
8   structures
650   are
30   shared
920   with
3088   a
2   &ldquo;copy
883   on
1   write&rdquo;
27   mechanism
1307   in
97   case
104   they
78   change
103   directories
2223   and
44   need
7   slightly
58   different
13   hash
1   structures.
39   Any
79   thread
511   can
176   do
81   what
439   any
176   other
1   can:
2   compile
1041   or
16   execute
590   an
11   arbitrarily
16   complex
1930   C
1129   shell
18   program
1041   or
115   even
5   spawn
1041   or
21   pipe
107   child
20   threads.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
2   Given
6605   the
4   enormous
5   advantage
2   offered
588   by
33   threads
2223   and
6605   the
7   unique
5   technology
6   we&rsquo;ve
2   developed
3144   to
1   exploit
7   them,
40   we
12   expect
1043   Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
131   should
8   easily
1   outperform
439   any
283   UNIX
1129   shell
883   on
1   comparable
2   hardware.
1679   </p>

11931   <li><a
1   href="17-LanguageReference.htm"><b>Basic

446   <h3>
11   Basic
2   statements<br/>

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
12   href="#Syntax">Syntax</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#CommandLineSizeLimit">Command
372   line
24   size
1   limit</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#PathHashing">Path
1   hashing</a><br/>

55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
261   A
11   basic
94   statement
1837   is
3088   a
428   command
152   name
15   plus
439   any
77   argument
80   words
3144   to
924   be
73   passed
3144   to
61   it.
111   For
25   example:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">notepad
1   hello.txt
39   cp
1   hello.*
1   ~Public
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">Wildcarding</a>,
857   as
26   shown
20   here
920   with
6605   the
16   <tt>*</tt>
2223   and
7   <tt>~</tt>
19   characters,
1837   is
58   done
588   by
6605   the
1129   shell
2223   and
6605   the
27   results
73   passed
3144   to
6605   the
428   command
857   as
6605   the
11   expanded
190   list
2059   of
12   arguments.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
7   Individual
73   statements
650   are
15   parsed
178   into
3088   a
29   series
2059   of
80   words
29   separated
588   by
68   white
67   space
2   (spaces
1041   or
2   tabs)
1041   or
94   these
3314   <a
1   href="25-StatementRelationships.htm">special
1   tokens</a>
1061   that
49   allow
9   stdio
3144   to
924   be
2   redirected,
95   e.g.,
920   with
8   <tt>&gt;</tt>
1041   or
3   <tt>&lt;</tt>
2223   and
1113   for
73   statements
3144   to
924   be
7   joined
3   together,
95   e.g.,
2   serially
920   with
4   <tt>;</tt>,
3   conditionally
920   with
5   <tt>&amp;&amp;</tt>
1041   or
1307   in
3088   a
7   pipeline
920   with
1   <tt>|</tt>:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
10   class="codesample
1   langref">&amp;
498   |
30   ;
49   &gt;
49   &lt;
84   (
210   )
32   &amp;&amp;
18   ||
13   &gt;&gt;
16   &lt;&lt;
4   &gt;&amp;
6   &gt;!
3   &gt;&amp;!
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="CommandLineSizeLimit"></a>Command
372   line
24   size
26   limit
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
4   Up
3144   to
3   32K
197   characters
511   can
924   be
73   passed
883   on
6605   the
428   command
372   line
3144   to
3088   a
107   child
20   process.
14   That&rsquo;s
6605   the
26   limit
2059   of
6605   the
841   Windows
3   kernel,
471   not
6605   the
1930   C
5   shell;
87   there
1837   is
227   no
26   limit
883   on
2   overall
428   command
372   line
38   length
1307   in
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
18   itself.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="PathHashing"></a>Path
19   hashing
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1043   Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
3   maintains
3088   a
13   hash
10   structure
201   which
42   allows
879   it
3144   to
11   quickly
76   search
1113   for
3088   a
10   suitable
4   <tt>.csh</tt>,
3   <tt>.exe</tt>,
1   <tt>.com</tt>,
6   <tt>.cmd</tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>.bat</tt>
383   file
1307   in
1061   that
25   order
1307   in
197   each
2059   of
6605   the
281   first
4   256
89   path
55   directories.
1679   </p>

190   also

446   <h3>
790   if
2223   and
2   switch<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="17-LanguageReference.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="19-Iteration.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
12   href="#Syntax">Syntax</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#if">if</a><br/>

1   href="#switch">switch</a><br/>

55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
523   </h4>
1655   <div
10   class="codesample
6   langref">
790   if
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
4   <var>statement</var>
790   if
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
189   then
20   <var>statement_list</var>
412   end
790   if
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
189   then
20   <var>statement_list</var>
56   else
20   <var>statement_list</var>
412   end
790   if
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
189   then
20   <var>statement_list</var>
5   elif
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
4   <var>statement</var>
790   if
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
189   then
20   <var>statement_list</var>
5   elif
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
189   then
20   <var>statement_list</var>
412   end
790   if
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
189   then
20   <var>statement_list</var>
5   elif
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
189   then
20   <var>statement_list</var>
56   else
20   <var>statement_list</var>
412   end
18   switch
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
97   case
2   <var>expr</var>:
20   <var>statement_list</var>
97   case
2   <var>expr</var>:
20   <var>statement_list</var>
9   default:
20   <var>statement_list</var>
412   end
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="if"></a>if
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
15   short
32   form
2059   of
6605   the
11   <tt>if</tt>
11   statement,
201   which
64   must
924   be
49   typed
883   on
271   one
31   line,
1   dispenses
920   with
6605   the
2   <tt>then</tt>
8   keyword
2223   and
22   accepts
3088   a
110   single
94   statement
3144   to
924   be
13   executed
790   if
3   <tt><var>expr</var></tt>
7   evaluates
857   as
4   true.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
53   long
32   form
55   uses
3088   a
2   <tt>then</tt>
8   keyword
2223   and
42   allows
8   optional
2   <tt>else</tt>
2223   and
3   <tt>elif</tt>
1   clauses.
983   The
77   last
11   <tt>if</tt>
1307   in
590   an
3   <tt>elif</tt>
2   chain
193   may
924   be
93   either
3088   a
1   short-
1041   or
3088   a
4   long-form
11   <tt>if</tt>
30   statement.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
3   Where
590   an
63   expression
1837   is
2   expected,
7   conventional
14   high
22   level
35   language
25   syntax
1837   is
2   accepted.
2   Names
20   refer
3144   to
22   variables,
16   <tt>*</tt>
99   means
1   multiply,
471   not
45   wildcard
2223   and
8   <tt>&gt;</tt>
99   means
10   greater
2   than,
471   not
28   i/o
3   redirection.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="switch"></a>switch
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
106   In
3088   a
9   <tt>switch</tt>
11   statement,
25   expressions
650   are
6   compared
588   by
3314   <a
1   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">pattern
1   match</a>,
857   as
790   if
191   using
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="27-ExpressionOperators.htm"><tt>=~</tt></a>
16   comparison
4   operator.
983   The
8   <tt>case</tt>
63   expression
511   can
924   be
3088   a
129   string
920   with
45   wildcard
55   characters.
3   Comparisons
650   are
56   made
27   down
6605   the
190   list
2059   of
2   alternatives
42   until
271   one
20   matches.
113   All
84   following
73   statements
650   are
13   executed
42   until
3088   a
10   <tt>break</tt>
1837   is
2   encountered.
261   A
1   <tt>default</tt>
4   clause
1837   is
8   optional
241   but
1837   is
80   always
2   satisfied
790   if
227   no
176   other
8   <tt>case</tt>
20   matches.
1679   </p>

446   <h3>
9   foreach,
73   for,
95   while
2223   and
2   repeat<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="18-ConditionTesting.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="20-Procedures.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
12   href="#Syntax">Syntax</a><br/>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
523   </h4>
1655   <div
10   class="codesample
6   langref">
33   foreach
7   <var>name</var>
84   (
9   <var>wordlist</var>
210   )
20   <var>statement_list</var>
412   end
1113   for
7   <var>name</var>
527   =
20   <var>expr</var>
13   <var>[</var>
3144   to
20   <var>expr</var>
13   <var>]</var>
13   <var>[</var>
588   by
20   <var>expr</var>
13   <var>]</var>
176   do
20   <var>statement_list</var>
412   end
95   while
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
20   <var>statement_list</var>
412   end
10   repeat
1   <var>number</var>
4   <var>statement</var>
10   repeat
20   <var>statement_list</var>
42   until
84   (
20   <var>expr</var>
210   )
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
3   <tt>foreach</tt>
94   statement
42   allows
9   iteration
53   over
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
25   words,
12   often
152   specified
588   by
8   wildcarding.
45   Each
96   time
109   through
6605   the
5   loop,
6605   the
41   control
243   variable
1   <tt><var>name</var></tt>
1837   is
91   given
6605   the
105   value
2059   of
6605   the
71   next
97   word
1307   in
6605   the
39   list.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
8   <tt>for</tt>
94   statement
223   offers
6605   the
207   more
7   conventional
25   numeric
4   iteration.
6   Multiple
9   iteration
3   ranges,
29   separated
588   by
6   commas,
511   can
924   be
152   specified
883   on
6605   the
8   <tt>for</tt>
30   statement.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
5   <tt>while</tt>
94   statement
3   iterates
113   so
53   long
857   as
3   <tt><var>expr</var></tt>
8   continues
3144   to
13   evaluate
857   as
4   true.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
5   <tt>repeat</tt>
94   statement
289   has
94   two
1   variations.
983   The
281   first
15   provides
1113   for
6605   the
9   iteration
2059   of
3088   a
110   single
94   statement
590   an
33   integer
165   number
2059   of
3   times.
983   The
33   second
32   form
3   iterates
42   until
3   <tt><var>expr</var></tt>
7   evaluates
857   as
4   true.
1679   </p>

446   <h3>
2   Procedures<br/>

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
12   href="#Syntax">Syntax</a><br/>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>

55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
523   </h4>
1655   <div
10   class="codesample
6   langref">
110   proc
7   <var>name</var>
84   (
13   <var>[</var>
3   <var>namelist</var>
13   <var>]</var>
210   )
20   <var>statement_list</var>
159   return
13   <var>[</var>
20   <var>expr</var>
13   <var>]</var>
412   end
110   proc
110   proc
7   <var>name</var>
110   proc
12   <var>pattern</var>
9   unproc
3   <var>namelist</var>
9   unproc
12   <var>pattern</var>
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
8   Procedures
43   defined
588   by
6605   the
4   <tt>proc</tt>
94   statement
511   can
10   recursively
25   call
176   other
5   procedures.
20   They
511   can
924   be
3   referred
3144   to
97   inside
590   an
63   expression
1041   or
857   as
3088   a
257   new
29   command,
1307   in
201   which
97   case
439   any
105   value
15   returned
1837   is
63   written
3144   to
44   stdout.
29   There
1837   is
590   an
1   implicit
159   return
94   statement
277   at
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
23   every
72   procedure
6   definition.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
4   <tt>proc</tt>
94   statement
920   with
227   no
74   arguments
35   prints
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
364   all
6605   the
25   procedures
1061   that
299   have
382   been
1   defined;
790   if
6605   the
77   argument
1837   is
3088   a
12   name,
1061   that
271   one
72   procedure
1837   is
3   listed;
790   if
6605   the
77   argument
1837   is
3088   a
4   pattern,
364   all
25   procedures
15   whose
88   names
65   match
6605   the
46   pattern
650   are
4   listed.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
2   <tt>unproc
1   <var>namelist</var></tt>,
105   where
2   <tt><var>namelist</var></tt>
1837   is
3088   a
29   series
2059   of
88   names
29   separated
588   by
6   commas,
10   discards
6605   the
152   specified
5   procedures.
2   <tt>unproc
3   <var>pattern</var></tt>
10   discards
364   all
25   procedures
15   whose
88   names
65   match
6605   the
19   pattern.
1679   </p>

446   <h3>
2   Aliases<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="20-Procedures.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="22-Variables.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
12   href="#Syntax">Syntax</a><br/>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
523   </h4>
1655   <div
10   class="codesample
6   langref">
164   alias
7   <var>name</var>
13   <var>[</var>
527   =
13   <var>]</var>
84   (
9   <var>wordlist</var>
210   )
164   alias
7   <var>name</var>
13   <var>[</var>
527   =
13   <var>]</var>
9   <var>wordlist</var>
164   alias
164   alias
7   <var>name</var>
164   alias
12   <var>pattern</var>
4   unalias
3   <var>namelist</var>
4   unalias
12   <var>pattern</var>
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
17   Aliases
17   provide
3088   a
90   way
2059   of
1   conveniently
1   recalling
3   frequently
281   used
62   commands
920   with
3088   a
4   user-defined
10   shorthand
32   name.
983   The
5   <tt>alias</tt>
94   statement
1   associates
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
80   words
920   with
590   an
164   alias
32   name.
983   The
4   <tt>=</tt>
1837   is
2   optional.
2   Parentheses
650   are
281   used
45   around
6605   the
5   wordlist
790   if
879   it
35   contains
94   special
197   characters
28   such
857   as
28   i/o
25   redirection
44   operators
1061   that
131   should
924   be
33   part
2059   of
6605   the
164   alias
6   definition.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
8   Inside
6605   the
1   wordlist,
3314   <a
3   href="34-HistoryRecall.htm">history</a>
35   references
511   can
924   be
281   used
3144   to
20   refer
3144   to
6605   the
80   words
883   on
6605   the
428   command
372   line
241   but
6605   the
12   <tt>!</tt>
112   history
2223   and
439   any
45   wildcard
197   characters
299   have
3144   to
924   be
8   escaped
1041   or
17   quoted
3144   to
5   defer
3   processing.
12   Here's
590   an
6   example.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
2   class="codesample">1
64   C%
164   alias
3   word0
296   echo
1   ^!^!:0
102   2
64   C%
164   alias
2   word1
296   echo
1   ^!^!:1
61   3
64   C%
164   alias
2   wordargs
296   echo
1   ^!^!:^*
35   4
64   C%
3   word0
410   now
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
3   word0
44   5
64   C%
2   word1
410   now
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
410   now
17   6
64   C%
2   wordargs
410   now
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
410   now
1837   is
6605   the
96   time
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
3   <tt>alias
1   <var>name</var></tt>
35   prints
6605   the
15   definition
2059   of
1061   that
1   alias;
3   <tt>alias
3   <var>pattern</var></tt>
35   prints
6605   the
9   definitions
2059   of
364   all
6605   the
31   aliases
15   whose
88   names
65   match
6605   the
19   pattern.
5   <tt>alias</tt>
63   without
439   any
74   arguments
35   prints
6605   the
9   definitions
2059   of
364   all
6605   the
6   aliases.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
2   <tt>unalias
1   <var>namelist</var></tt>
10   discards
6605   the
152   specified
1   aliases;
2   <tt>unalias
3   <var>pattern</var></tt>
10   discards
364   all
6605   the
31   aliases
15   whose
88   names
65   match
6605   the
19   pattern.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
55   name="SeeAlso"></a>See
190   also
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
79   href="49-BuiltinProcedures.htm">Builtin
8   procedures</a><br/>
3314   <a
51   href="27-ExpressionOperators.htm">Expression

522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
523   </h4>
1655   <div
10   class="codesample
6   langref">
284   @
20   <var>expr</var>
90   calc
20   <var>expr</var>
436   set
2   <var>variable-or-array-element</var>
13   <var>[</var>
527   =
13   <var>]</var>
84   (
9   <var>wordlist</var>
210   )
436   set
2   <var>variable-or-array-element</var>
13   <var>[</var>
527   =
13   <var>]</var>
9   <var>wordlist</var>
99   setenv
2   <var>environment-variable</var>
13   <var>[</var>
527   =
13   <var>]</var>
84   (
9   <var>wordlist</var>
210   )
99   setenv
2   <var>environment-variable</var>
13   <var>[</var>
527   =
13   <var>]</var>
9   <var>wordlist</var>
6   shift
13   <var>[</var>
3   <var>variable</var>
13   <var>]</var>
436   set
436   set
3   <var>variable</var>
436   set
12   <var>pattern</var>
99   setenv
99   setenv
3   <var>variable</var>
99   setenv
12   <var>pattern</var>
9   unset
3   <var>list-of-variables</var>
9   unset
12   <var>pattern</var>

1   <var>list-of-environment-variables</var>

12   <var>pattern</var>
94   local
3   <var>list-of-variables</var>

94   local
12   <var>pattern</var>
15   unlocal
3   <var>list-of-variables</var>
15   unlocal
12   <var>pattern</var>
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
6   <tt>@</tt>
2223   and
7   <tt>calc</tt>
73   statements
380   will
197   each
3   calculate
6605   the
105   value
2059   of
590   an
2   expression;
6605   the
6   <tt>@</tt>
94   statement
135   does
879   it
3   silently
95   while
6605   the
7   <tt>calc</tt>
94   statement
25   writes
6605   the
48   result
3144   to
44   stdout.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
4   <tt>set</tt>,
13   <tt>setenv</tt>
2223   and
1   <tt>shift</tt>
73   statements
3   manipulate
111   variables
857   as
80   words
46   rather
171   than
13   expressions.
10   <tt>set</tt>
4   defines
3088   a
243   variable
49   that's
30   shared
64   between
364   all
33   threads
1307   in
6605   the
5   shell;
13   <tt>setenv</tt>
7   puts
879   it
178   into
6605   the
76   environment
201   which
1837   is
37   inherited
588   by
107   child
11   processes.
261   A
1   <tt><var>named_ref</var></tt>
511   can
924   be
93   either
3088   a
63   simple
243   variable
152   name
1041   or
590   an
13   indexed
39   variable,
95   e.g.,
1   <tt>files[2]</tt>.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
10   <tt>set</tt>
1041   or
13   <tt>setenv</tt>
920   with
227   no
10   operands
35   prints
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
364   all
43   defined
111   variables
2059   of
1061   that
4   type.
1   <tt>set&nbsp;<var>name</var></tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>setenv&nbsp;<var>name</var></tt>
920   with
227   no
23   additional
74   arguments
35   prints
6605   the
105   value
2059   of
6605   the
10   named
47   variable.
1   <tt>set&nbsp;<var>pattern</var></tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>setenv&nbsp;<var>pattern</var></tt>
35   prints
6605   the
45   values
2059   of
364   all
6605   the
111   variables
15   whose
88   names
65   match
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">pattern</a>.
103   To
4   resolve
6605   the
1   ambiguity
64   between
3088   a
46   pattern
2223   and
590   an
13   indexed
243   variable
8   reference,
46   pattern
74   arguments
3144   to
10   <tt>set</tt>
1041   or
13   <tt>setenv</tt>
29   cannot
270   use
6605   the
1   <tt>[</tt>
857   as
6605   the
281   first
45   wildcard
172   character
1307   in
6605   the
35   string.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
1   <tt>unset&nbsp;<var>namelist</var></tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>unsetenv&nbsp;<var>namelist</var></tt>
16   discard
6605   the
152   specified
12   variables.
1   <tt>unset&nbsp;<var>pattern</var></tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>unsetenv&nbsp;<var>pattern</var></tt>
16   discard
364   all
6605   the
1129   shell
1041   or
76   environment
22   variables,
7   respectively,
1061   that
65   match
6605   the
19   pattern.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
32   By
22   convention
883   on
231   Windows,
76   environment
243   variable
88   names
650   are
2   case-insensitive,
113   so
439   any
16   patterns
281   used
920   with
13   <tt>setenv</tt>
1041   or
2   <tt>unsetenv</tt>
650   are
190   also
66   considered
3   case-insensitive.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="LocalVars"></a>Local
111   variables
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
6   <tt>local</tt>
428   command
30   lets
675   you
21   define
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
243   variable
88   names
1061   that
675   you
38   don't
3144   to
4   share
920   with
176   other
18   routines
1041   or
176   other
30   processes
1041   or
33   threads
7   (except
252   your
51   own
107   child
1   threads).
106   When
675   you
21   define
3088   a
94   local
243   variable
879   it
1   hides
439   any
32   previous
15   definition
640   from
439   any
3   outer
94   statement
39   list.
5   (But
675   you
650   are
471   not
1   permitted
3144   to
6   redefine
439   any
2059   of
6605   the
19   builtin
10   <tt>set</tt>
1041   or
13   <tt>setenv</tt>
243   variable
1   names.)
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
2   <tt><var>namelist</var></tt>
193   may
924   be
49   typed
920   with
1041   or
63   without
8   commas
64   between
6605   the
10   names.
106   When
675   you
38   create
3088   a
257   new
94   local
39   variable,
122   its
20   initial
105   value
1837   is
80   always
3088   a
48   null
35   string.
6   <tt>local</tt>
920   with
227   no
10   operands
17   reports
6605   the
10   currently
43   defined
2223   and
2   accessible
94   local
22   variables,
790   if
5   any.
1   <tt>local&nbsp;<var>pattern</var></tt>
28   lists
364   all
6605   the
94   local
111   variables
15   whose
88   names
65   match
6605   the
19   pattern.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
106   When
675   you
5   spawn
3088   a
107   child
79   thread
93   either
1   implicitly,
95   e.g.,
3144   to
146   run
6605   the
33   second
1041   or
84   following
11   stage
2059   of
3088   a
7   pipeline
1041   or
2   explicitly,
588   by
19   typing
5   <tt>&amp;</tt>
277   at
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
3088   a
428   command
3144   to
146   run
879   it
1307   in
6605   the
65   background
364   all
252   your
213   current
94   local
111   variables
650   are
6   snapshotted
2223   and
23   copied
3144   to
6605   the
14   child.
3   If,
84   following
7   that,
93   either
6605   the
21   parent
1041   or
6605   the
107   child
45   changes
6605   the
105   value
2059   of
439   any
2059   of
94   these
94   local
22   variables,
879   it
4   affects
199   only
122   its
51   own
8   copy.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
3   Local
111   variables
650   are
37   automatically
7   discarded
857   as
4   soon
857   as
21   execution
4   leaves
6605   the
94   statement
8   nesting
22   level
1307   in
201   which
6605   the
243   variable
363   was
8   created.
150   You
511   can
190   also
18   explicitly
16   discard
94   local
111   variables
191   using
6605   the
2   <tt>unlocal</tt>
47   command.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
1   <tt>unlocal&nbsp;<var>namelist</var></tt>
10   discards
6605   the
152   specified
94   local
12   variables.
1   <tt>unlocal&nbsp;<var>pattern</var></tt>
10   discards
364   all
47   those
15   whose
88   names
65   match
6605   the
19   pattern.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
106   In
364   all
176   other
2   respects,
94   local
111   variables
5   act
234   just
90   like
439   any
176   other
22   variables,
13   though
675   you
193   may
38   find
28   they're
7   slightly
12   faster
30   since
6605   the
1129   shell
28   doesn't
44   need
3144   to
3   semaphore
122   its
270   use
2059   of
21   them.
1679   </p>

446   <h3>
9   setkey
1   statement<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="22-Variables.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="24-MiscStatements.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
12   href="#Syntax">Syntax</a><br/>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#UsingTheFunctionKeys">Using
6605   the
29   function
1   keys</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#F1ToOpenTheUserGuide"><kbd>F1</kbd>
3144   to
42   open
6605   the
55   user
1   guide</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
523   </h4>
1655   <div
10   class="codesample
6   langref">
9   setkey
2   <var>fkey</var>
13   <var>[</var>
527   =
13   <var>]</var>
84   (
9   <var>wordlist</var>
210   )
9   setkey
2   <var>fkey</var>
13   <var>[</var>
527   =
13   <var>]</var>
9   <var>wordlist</var>
9   setkey
9   setkey
12   <var>pattern</var>
3   unsetkey
1   <var>fkeylist</var>
3   unsetkey
12   <var>pattern</var>
1652   </div>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
4   <tt>setkey</tt>
428   command
30   lets
675   you
21   define
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
80   words
1061   that
131   should
924   be
3   stuffed
51   back
50   onto
6605   the
230   command-line
5   whenever
675   you
5   press
3088   a
20   particular
29   function
9   key.
983   The
25   syntax
1837   is
21   exactly
6605   the
122   same
857   as
281   used
1307   in
6605   the
4   <tt>set</tt>,
13   <tt>setenv</tt>
2223   and
5   <tt>alias</tt>
228   commands,
105   where
1   <tt><var>fkey</var></tt>
1837   is
439   any
2059   of
6605   the
29   function
17   keys
2   <kbd>F1</kbd>
109   through
1   <kbd>F12</kbd>,
3   case-insensitive.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
4   <tt>setkey</tt>
920   with
227   no
10   operands
17   reports
6605   the
213   current
29   function
38   key
1   bindings,
790   if
5   any.
1   <tt>setkey&nbsp;<var>pattern</var></tt>
28   lists
6605   the
3   bindings
1113   for
439   any
17   keys
15   whose
88   names
65   match
6605   the
19   pattern.
983   The
33   corresponding
1   <tt>unsetkey</tt>
428   command
10   discards
38   key
1   bindings.
983   The
1   <tt><var>fkeylist</var></tt>
511   can
924   be
49   typed
920   with
93   either
42   spaces
1041   or
8   commas
64   between
6605   the
88   names
2059   of
6605   the
8   keys.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="UsingTheFunctionKeys"></a>Using
6605   the
29   function
17   keys
523   </h4>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
1   <kbd>F<i>n</i></kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
6   Clear
6605   the
428   command
31   line,
3   post
6605   the
106   text
5   bound
3144   to
320   this
38   key
2223   and
16   execute
6605   the
47   command.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
1   <kbd>Alt</kbd>-<kbd>F<i>n</i></kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
3   Insert
6605   the
106   text
5   bound
3144   to
320   this
38   key
277   at
6605   the
17   cursor
3   location
241   but
38   don't
16   execute
879   it
2   yet.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
5   id="keystrokes"
5   class="last">
78   <p
47   class="left">
1   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>F<i>n</i></kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
6   Clear
6605   the
428   command
372   line
2223   and
3   post
6605   the
106   text
5   bound
3144   to
320   this
38   key
241   but
38   don't
16   execute
879   it
2   yet.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
12   Since
6605   the
29   function
1   key's
5   bound
106   text
1837   is
63   written
51   back
178   into
6605   the
428   command
372   line
97   inside
428   command
372   line
1   editor,
6605   the
39   substitution
7   happens
10   ahead
2059   of
439   any
13   parsing
2059   of
6605   the
428   command
372   line
178   into
80   words
1041   or
17   expansion
2059   of
12   <tt>!</tt>
1041   or
10   <tt>%</tt>
112   history
35   references
113   so
879   it
1837   is
44   possible
3144   to
2   meaningfully
8   embed
94   these
3   kinds
2059   of
35   references
178   into
6605   the
38   key
1   binding.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="F1ToOpenTheUserGuide"></a><kbd>F1</kbd>
3144   to
42   open
6605   the
55   user
6   guide
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
117   default
3314   <a
2   href="47-StartupCsh.htm"><tt>startup.csh</tt></a>
55   uses
4   <tt>setkey</tt>
3144   to
58   cause
2   <kbd>F1</kbd>
3144   to
42   open
6605   the
55   user
6   guide.
1679   </p>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
993   <td>
58   <pre><tt>#
21   Set
4   f1
3144   to
42   open
6605   the
55   user
6   guide.
9   setkey
4   f1
42   open
2   ^$shell:h:h\UserGuide\index.htm
160   </tt></pre>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>
1604   <p>
3   <tt>$shell</tt>
7   refers
3144   to
6605   the
89   path
3144   to
6605   the
10   currently
92   running
1   <tt>csh.exe</tt>;
7   escaping
6605   the
7   <tt>$</tt>
920   with
12   <tt>^</tt>
1   defers
11   evaluation
3144   to
2   run-time,
44   simply
3144   to
23   avoid
3   dealing
920   with
3088   a
89   path
1061   that
35   contains
7   spaces.
983   The
3314   <a
1   href="39-PathnameEditing.htm"><tt>:h</tt></a>
40   operator
32   returns
6605   the
319   directory
1   containing.
1679   </p>

1604   <p>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
2223   and
7   description
523   </h4>
10   <table
2   >
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
4   150px">
4   Statement
62   </th>
30   <th>
7   Function
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="driveletter"></a>
1   <var>driveletter</var><tt>:</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
27   Change
213   current
26   drive.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
2   name="label"></a>
1   <var>label</var><tt>:</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
4   Define
3088   a
5   label.
103   To
23   avoid
78   being
13   confused
920   with
3088   a
112   drive
3   letter,
3088   a
40   label
29   cannot
924   be
3088   a
110   single
11   alphabetic
37   character.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="parens"></a>
1   <tt>(</tt>
20   <var>statement_list</var>
1   <tt>)</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
2   Group
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
10   statements,
5   saving
2223   and
5   restoring
6605   the
213   current
112   drive
2223   and
213   current
319   directory
13   during
6   execution.
2   (Current
319   directory
18   settings
883   on
176   other
55   drives
650   are
471   not
4   saved
2223   and
1   restored.)
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="break"></a>
1   <tt>break
3   </tt><var>[
152   name
3   ]</var>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
7   Exit
640   from
6605   the
10   named
14   or,
588   by
38   default,
6605   the
3   innermost
4   <tt>switch</tt>,
4   <tt>foreach</tt>,
3   <tt>for</tt>,
5   <tt>while</tt>
1041   or
5   <tt>repeat</tt>
30   statement.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="continue"></a>
1   <tt>continue
3   </tt><var>[
152   name
3   ]</var>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   Continue
920   with
6605   the
71   next
9   iteration
2059   of
6605   the
10   named
1041   or
3   innermost
4   <tt>foreach</tt>,
3   <tt>for</tt>,
5   <tt>while</tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>repeat</tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="exit"></a>
1   <tt>exit
3   </tt><var>[
4   expr
3   ]</var>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
7   Exit
640   from
320   this
79   thread
14   or,
790   if
320   this
1837   is
6605   the
230   main
8   thread,
640   from
6605   the
1930   C
55   shell.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="goto"></a>
2   <tt>goto
1   </tt><var>name</var>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   Continue
277   at
6605   the
1   labeled
30   statement.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="onintr"></a>
2   <tt>onintr
1   </tt><var>statement</var>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
4   Define
6605   the
5   action
3144   to
924   be
25   taken
790   if
590   an
17   interrupt
1837   is
1   signaled.
1   Whatever's
92   running
1837   is
4   interrupted
364   all
6605   the
90   way
51   back
157   up
3144   to
6605   the
35   block
1307   in
201   which
6605   the
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
363   was
11   defined.
39   That
94   statement
1837   is
146   run
1307   in
6605   the
213   current
79   thread
2223   and
21   execution
8   continues
920   with
6605   the
71   next
94   statement
1307   in
6605   the
35   block
105   where
6605   the
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
363   was
11   defined.
106   When
21   execution
4   leaves
3088   a
35   block
1307   in
201   which
590   an
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
1837   is
13   defined,
6605   the
32   previous
15   <tt>onintr</tt>
8   (if
2   any)
25   again
16   takes
2   effect.
103   To
16   ignore
1041   or
5   defer
3   interrupts,
270   use
6605   the
3   <tt>irqmask</tt>
47   variable.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="source"></a>
2   <tt>source
1   </tt><var>wordargs</var>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
24   Read
2223   and
70   process
73   statements
640   from
3088   a
383   file
857   as
790   if
104   they
132   were
49   typed
178   into
320   this
16   thread.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="time"></a>
1   <tt>time</tt>
4   <var>statement</var>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
7   Execute
6605   the
94   statement
2223   and
38   report
91   how
53   long
879   it
2   took.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="comment"></a>
4   <tt>#</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   Comment
106   text
157   up
3144   to
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
6605   the
75   line.
103   To
924   be
34   recognized
857   as
3088   a
11   valid
1   comment,
6605   the
4   <tt>#</tt>
64   must
924   be
42   followed
588   by
277   at
24   least
271   one
67   space
1041   or
2   tab.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="embedded"></a>
1   <tt>##
1   <var>comment</var>
1   ##</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
4   Embedded
6   comment.
103   To
924   be
3   recognized,
6605   the
1   <tt>##</tt>
2   tokens
131   should
924   be
15   preceded
2223   and
42   followed
588   by
68   white
13   space.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>

1604   <p>

2223   and
3   description</a><br/>

1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
2223   and
7   description
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
106   In
25   order
2059   of
7   decreasing
5   precedence:
1679   </p>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
4   180px">
8   Operator
62   </th>
30   <th>
9   Meaning
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <pre><tt>(
2   )</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
3   Grouping
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <pre><tt>&gt;
6   &gt;!
4   &gt;&amp;
3   &gt;&amp;!
13   &gt;&gt;
3   &gt;&gt;!
2   &gt;&gt;&amp;
1   &gt;&gt;&amp;!
49   &lt;
1   &lt;&lt;</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
46   href="26-IORedirection.htm">I/O
1   Redirection</a>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>|
1   |&amp;</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   Piping
1   (stdout
199   only
1041   or
30   stdout
117   +
1   stderr)
64   between
2   concurrent
23   operations
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
5   <tt>&amp;</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
10   At
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
3088   a
11   statement,
16   execute
6605   the
94   statement
857   as
3088   a
65   background
79   thread
1041   or
70   process
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>&amp;&amp;
1   ||</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
2   Conditional
2   execution:
199   only
146   run
6605   the
33   second
94   statement
790   if
6605   the
281   first
4   succeeds
3   (zero
159   return
2   code)
1041   or
199   only
790   if
6605   the
281   first
10   fails
1   (non-zero
159   return
2   code)
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>;</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
4   Serial
21   execution
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>
1604   <p>
983   The
6   grammar
1837   is
231   completely
4   recursive,
113   so
73   statements
2059   of
19   arbitrary
1   complexity
511   can
924   be
1   freely
1   nested,
3   conditionally
3   executed,
4   piped
1041   or
1   redirected.
1679   </p>

1   redirection<br/>

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
3   href="#Syntax">Syntax
2223   and
3   description</a><br/>

55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
2223   and
7   description
523   </h4>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
4   180px">
8   Operator
62   </th>
30   <th>
9   Meaning
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <pre><tt>&gt;
6   &gt;!
4   &gt;&amp;
1   &gt;&amp;!</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
3   Output
3144   to
3088   a
96   file.
12   <tt>!</tt>
42   allows
590   an
31   existing
383   file
3144   to
924   be
3   overwritten
115   even
790   if
2   <tt>noclobber</tt>
1837   is
11   set.
5   <tt>&amp;</tt>
2   redirects
56   both
30   stdout
2223   and
1   stderr.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>&gt;&gt;
3   &gt;&gt;!
2   &gt;&gt;&amp;
1   &gt;&gt;&amp;!</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   Append
3144   to
3088   a
383   file
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
993   <td>
3   <tt>&lt;</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
24   Read
36   stdin
640   from
3088   a
383   file
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>&lt;&lt;
1   <var>string</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
2   Inline
3   data:
6605   the
106   text
883   on
6605   the
84   following
11   lines,
157   up
3144   to
6605   the
372   line
50   containing
199   only
6605   the
152   specified
3   <tt><var>string</var></tt>
380   will
924   be
2   fed
857   as
36   stdin
3144   to
6605   the
30   statement.
39   Command
2223   and
243   variable
39   substitution
1837   is
56   normally
58   done
883   on
6605   the
25   inline
19   text.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
106   In
6605   the
94   special
97   case
105   where
3   <tt><var>string</var></tt>
35   contains
439   any
2059   of
6605   the
3314   <a
2   href="36-Quoting.htm">quoting
1   characters</a>,
12   <tt>^</tt>
2   <tt>'</tt>,
2   <tt>"</tt>
1041   or
1   <tt>`</tt>,
28   they're
7   discarded
63   without
3   processing.
58   But
56   both
6605   the
17   resulting
3   <tt><var>string</var></tt>
2223   and
6605   the
25   inline
106   text
650   are
25   taken
857   as
44   literal
19   text.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
523   </h4>
1   <p>In
25   order
2059   of
7   decreasing
2   precedence.
1679   </p>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
4   180px">
8   Operator
62   </th>
30   <th>
9   Meaning
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <pre><tt>(
2   )</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
3   Grouping
1041   or
72   procedure
25   call
74   arguments
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>{
1   }</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
11   Run
6605   the
5   enclosed
94   statement
190   list
2223   and
159   return
214   1
790   if
879   it
4   succeeds
1041   or
120   0
4   otherwise.
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>[
1   ]</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1   Array
1   indexing.
53   (The
281   first
14   element
1837   is
14   element
2   0.)
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>-A
16   -C
25   -D
9   -H
10   -R
15   -S
39   -d
34   -e
47   -f
15   -o
21   -w
29   -x
10   -z
27   -t
1   -s</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
39   href="28-FileSystemTests.htm">File
110   system
1   tests</a>.
45   Each
16   takes
3088   a
110   single
97   word
201   which
193   may
38   contain
18   wildcards
857   as
590   an
8   operand.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>++
1   --</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1   Prefix
2223   and
2   postfix
1   increment/decrement.
5   Right
3144   to
20   left
4   associativity.
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>~
91   -
15   !
1   +</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1   Bitwise,
3   arithmetic
2223   and
7   logical
1   complements
2223   and
5   unary
1   plus.
5   Right
3144   to
20   left
4   associativity.
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3   <tt>**</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1   Exponentiation.
5   Right
3144   to
20   left
4   associativity.
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>*
23   /
60   %
1   //</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1   Multiplication,
1   division,
1   remainder
2223   and
33   integer
3   division
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>+
1   -</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
2   Addition
2223   and
1   subtraction
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>&lt;&lt;
1   &gt;&gt;</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1   Bit-shifting
1768   </td>
850   </tr>

698   class="langref">

6   &lt;=

2   testing
44   operators
1768   </td>

2223   and
2   pattern-matching

522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1   Precedence
2223   and
1   associativity
1837   is
6605   the
122   same
857   as
1930   C
42   except
1113   for
6605   the
7   addition
2059   of
6605   the
257   new
5   operators.
2   Except
857   as
1   noted,
44   operators
2059   of
11   equal
3   precedence
26   group
20   left
3144   to
37   right
4   so,
95   e.g.,
1   <tt>10/5*2</tt>
1837   is
125   read
857   as
1   <tt>(10/5)*2</tt>
527   =
2   4,
471   not
1   <tt>10/(5*2)</tt>
527   =
35   1.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
8   Expressions
48   result
1307   in
9   sensible
1   types,
1   considering
56   both
6605   the
9   types
1   <var>and</var>
6605   the
45   values
2059   of
6605   the
3   operands.
111   For
101   example,
1   <tt>10/2</tt>
32   returns
6605   the
33   integer
1   <tt>5</tt>
241   but
1   <tt>5/2</tt>
11   produces
6605   the
30   floating
39   point
105   value
1   <tt>2.5</tt>.
139   Also,
6605   the
33   integer
3   <tt>1</tt>,
6605   the
30   floating
39   point
105   value
1   <tt>1.0</tt>
2223   and
6605   the
129   string
1   <tt>"1"</tt>
364   all
24   compare
10   equal.
1679   </p>

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
12   href="#Syntax">Syntax</a><br/>

1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
383   file
110   system
44   operators
197   each
16   take
3088   a
110   single
18   operand
25   word.
181   This
281   first
436   set
364   all
159   return
214   1
1   (true)
1041   or
120   0
1   (false).
1679   </p>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
3   100px">
8   Operator
62   </th>
30   <th>
4   True
790   if
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>-A</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
10   Archive
49   bit
436   set
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>-C</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
25   File
1041   or
319   directory
1837   is
3   compressed
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <pre><tt>-D
1   -d</tt></pre>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
17   Directory
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>-H</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   Hidden
383   file
1041   or
319   directory
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>-R</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
5   Read-only
383   file
1041   or
319   directory
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>-S</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
22   System
383   file
1041   or
319   directory
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>-e</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
25   File
1041   or
319   directory
9   exists
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
6   <tt>-f</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
2   Ordinary
25   File
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>-o</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   Ownership
2   (Same
857   as
2   existence
883   on
3088   a
18   FAT
383   file
3   system)
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3   <tt>-r</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   Readable
2   (Same
857   as
37   ordinary
383   file
883   on
3088   a
18   FAT
383   file
3   system)
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>-w</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   Writable
4   (Not
22   read-only
2223   and
471   not
3088   a
5   directory)
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>-x</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
3   Executable
1   (Has
3088   a
4   <tt>.csh</tt>,
3   <tt>.exe</tt>,
4   <tt>.com</tt>
1041   or
6   <tt>.cmd</tt>
18   extension
13   and,
790   if
102   it's
590   an
7   <tt>.exe</tt>
1041   or
3088   a
4   <tt>.com</tt>
39   file,
19   appears
3144   to
924   be
3088   a
11   valid
72   binary
2   executable.)
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>-z</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
2   Zero-length
383   file
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>
1604   <p>
983   The
3   <tt>-t</tt>
2223   and
4   <tt>-s</tt>
44   operators
159   return
19   timestamps
2223   and
1   sizes.
1679   </p>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
3   100px">
8   Operator
62   </th>
30   <th>
1   Returns
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3   <tt>-t</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   Timestamp
1307   in
6605   the
3   24-hour
94   local
96   time
10   formatted
857   as
3088   a
172   character
129   string
2059   of
6605   the
10   form,
1   <tt><var>YYYY</var>-<var>MM</var>-<var>DD</var>
1   <var>hh</var>:<var>mm</var>:<var>ss</var></tt>,
95   e.g.,
1   <tt>2012-11-25
1   17:35:26</tt>.
468   If
6605   the
18   operand
28   doesn't
18   exist
1041   or
28   doesn't
299   have
3088   a
19   timestamp
12   (as
1837   is
6605   the
97   case
1113   for
1   <tt>C:\</tt>),
3   <tt>-t</tt>
32   returns
3   null;
320   this
1837   is
471   not
590   an
19   error.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
4   <tt>-s</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
3   Size
1307   in
41   bytes
790   if
6605   the
18   operand
9   exists
2223   and
1837   is
3088   a
39   file,
19   otherwise
5   null.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
383   file
110   system
44   operators
650   are
364   all
11   prefix
5   operators.
45   Each
16   takes
3088   a
110   single
2   operand,
201   which
1837   is
3314   <a
1   href="13-Expressions.htm#WordsVersusExpressions">interpreted
857   as
3088   a
1   word</a>,
471   not
590   an
11   expression,
2223   and
193   may
2   involve
3314   <a
3   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">wildcarding</a>.
468   If
51   wildcarding
11   produces
207   more
171   than
271   one
3   match,
6605   the
36   test
1837   is
58   done
883   on
6605   the
281   first
11   one.
111   For
25   example:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">if
3   (-d
1   $a)
189   then
296   echo
10   $a
1837   is
3088   a
319   directory
412   end
1652   </div>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1043   Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
8   recognizes
6605   the
841   Windows
94   special
19   device
88   names
15   regardless
2059   of
57   whether
104   they
650   are
49   typed
1307   in
21   upper
1041   or
32   lower
97   case
2223   and
15   regardless
2059   of
57   whether
87   there
1837   is
3088   a
16   trailing
8   colon.
111   For
101   example,
1   <tt>COM1:</tt>,
1   <tt>COM1</tt>
2223   and
1   <tt>com1</tt>
364   all
20   refer
3144   to
6605   the
122   same
10   device.
7   Not
364   all
8   devices
380   will
924   be
16   installed
883   on
439   any
20   particular
9   machine.
1679   </p>

106   In
320   this
1   table,
2   <kbd>Esc</kbd>
7   refers
3144   to
6605   the
2   0x1B
121   escape
37   character.
1679   </p>

776   <td
698   class="langref">
11   <kbd>Esc</kbd><tt>
99   [
1   </tt><var>g</var><tt>
1   m</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
21   Set
1   graphics
1   rendition
1   (color,
1   etc.).
13   More
171   than
271   one
78   change
511   can
924   be
152   specified
588   by
191   using
6   semicolons
64   between
197   each
1   <tt><var>g</var></tt>
2   value:
1679   </p>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
1930   C
1129   shell
2223   and
364   all
6605   the
297   utilities
1061   that
8   come
920   with
879   it
10   generate
94   these
22   ANSI
121   escape
39   sequences
268   when
56   writing
3144   to
3088   a
383   file
1041   or
7   pipe.
106   When
56   writing
3144   to
6605   the
2   console,
104   they
10   interpret
94   these
1   sequences.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
19   builtin
3314   <a
1   href="49-BuiltinProcedures.htm#ansi"><tt>ansi()</tt></a>
72   procedure
511   can
924   be
281   used
3144   to
10   generate
6605   the
1   SGR
46   color
39   sequences
63   without
25   having
3144   to
22   know
6605   the
16   actual
1   encoding,
95   e.g.,
1   <tt>ansi("red")</tt>.
1679   </p>

446   <h3>
15   Wildcarding
2223   and
46   pattern
1   matching<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="30-AnsiEscapeSequences.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="32-FilenameCompletion.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
12   href="#Syntax">Syntax</a><br/>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
15   name="Syntax"></a>Syntax
523   </h4>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
3   100px">
7   Characters
62   </th>
30   <th>
9   Meaning
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3   <tt>?</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
52   Match
439   any
110   single
15   character,
33   including
5   <tt>.</tt>
241   but
471   not
6   <tt>\</tt>
1041   or
3   <tt>/</tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
16   <tt>*</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
52   Match
439   any
165   number
2059   of
19   characters,
33   including
5   <tt>.</tt>
241   but
471   not
6   <tt>\</tt>
1041   or
3   <tt>/</tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>[<var>a</var>-<var>z</var>]</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
21   An
43   example
4   range:
65   match
439   any
172   character
4   <tt><var>a</var></tt>
109   through
2   <tt><var>z</var></tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>[^<var>a</var>-<var>z</var>]</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
21   An
43   example
4   exclusion
4   range:
65   match
439   any
172   character
471   not
1307   in
6605   the
436   set
4   <tt><var>a</var></tt>
109   through
2   <tt><var>z</var></tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>{<var>a</var>,<var>b</var>}<var>c</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   <i>Alternation:</i>
2   Generate
56   both
1   <tt><var>ac</var></tt>
2223   and
1   <tt><var>bc</var></tt>,
105   where
1   <tt><var>a</var></tt>,
2   <tt><var>b</var></tt>
2223   and
3   <tt><var>c</var></tt>
650   are
5   themselves
11   arbitrarily
16   complex
45   wildcard
3   patterns.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3   <tt>...</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   <i>Indefinite
1   directory:</i>
52   Match
439   any
165   number
2059   of
319   directory
13   levels
11   &ndash;
29   zero
1041   or
207   more
11   &ndash;
34   whatever
879   it
16   takes
3144   to
53   make
6605   the
16   rest
2059   of
6605   the
46   pattern
19   match.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
2   Patterns
650   are
281   used
56   both
1113   for
6   traditional
320   filename
51   wildcarding
883   on
6605   the
428   command
31   line,
95   e.g.,
3144   to
28   pass
3088   a
190   list
2059   of
74   arguments
3144   to
3088   a
29   command,
2223   and
1113   for
4   examining
56   strings
920   with
13   expressions.
2   Patterns
650   are
1   nestable
11   arbitrarily
2223   and
3088   a
9   recursive
16   comparison
8   algorithm
1837   is
281   used
3144   to
2   guarantee
3088   a
9   sensible
48   result
227   no
7   matter
91   how
16   complex
6605   the
19   pattern.
111   For
101   example,
1   <tt>*\[a-c]*.[ch]</tt>
2223   and
1   <tt>...\{a,b*\...}\p*.c</tt>
56   both
3   operate
5   sensibly.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
8   Even
112   drive
11   letters
511   can
924   be
1   wildcarded,
95   e.g.,
1   <tt>*:\Program*\Hamilton*</tt>
1   works,
13   though
879   it
511   can
924   be
44   very
4   slow
790   if
675   you
299   have
3088   a
101   some
1   <tt>net
1   use</tt>
55   drives
1061   that
650   are
1   offline
2223   and
675   you
3   haven&rsquo;t
3   restricted
252   your
76   search
920   with
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#DRIVEMASK"><tt>DRIVEMASK</tt></a>
76   environment
47   variable.
468   If
590   an
27   application
90   like
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
18   tries
3144   to
125   read
640   from
590   an
4   unavailable
13   network
12   drive,
841   Windows
380   will
47   try
3144   to
3   reconnect
6605   the
112   drive
1307   in
25   order
3144   to
11   perform
6605   the
17   read.
1   Reconnecting
920   with
3088   a
22   machine
26   that&rsquo;s
157   up
2223   and
92   running
1837   is
1   quick.
58   But
790   if
6605   the
22   machine
1837   is
1   offline,
879   it
16   takes
35   several
23   seconds
1113   for
6605   the
13   network
1   protocols
3144   to
96   time
94   out
2223   and
1113   for
841   Windows
3144   to
38   report
6   that.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
22   Filename
18   wildcards
511   can
924   be
281   used
3314   <a
1   href="13-Expressions.htm#WordsVersusExpressions">wherever
3088   a
97   word
1837   is
1   expected</a>
2223   and
380   will
65   match
439   any
320   filename
42   except
5   <tt>.</tt>
2223   and
1   <tt>..</tt>
42   unless
102   it's
21   marked
1   &ldquo;hidden.&rdquo;
103   To
49   allow
51   wildcarding
3144   to
65   match
17   hidden
8   files:
1655   <div
10   class="codesample
3   langref">set
3314   <a
1   href="42-PerThreadVariables.htm#nonohidden">nonohidden</a>
527   =
120   0
597   #
3   Default:
29   No
17   hidden
294   files
436   set
2   nonohidden
527   =
214   1
597   #
2   Include
17   hidden
1   files</div>
103   To
28   turn
91   off
51   wildcarding
883   on
6605   the
428   command
4   line:
1655   <div
10   class="codesample
3   langref">set
3314   <a
1   href="42-PerThreadVariables.htm#nowild">nowild</a>
527   =
120   0
597   #
3   Default:
15   Wildcarding
5   enabled
436   set
30   nowild
527   =
214   1
597   #
7   Turn
91   off
1   wildcarding</div>
103   To
41   control
81   what
7   happens
790   if
3088   a
45   wildcard
28   doesn't
65   match
3   anything:
1655   <div
10   class="codesample
3   langref">set
3314   <a
1   href="42-PerThreadVariables.htm#nowild">nonomatch</a>
527   =
120   0
597   #
3   Default:
1   Considered
590   an
106   error
436   set
11   nonomatch
527   =
214   1
597   #
1   Pass
879   it
109   through
3144   to
6605   the
27   application
436   set
11   nonomatch
527   =
102   2
597   #
2   Simply
16   discard
6605   the
1   wildcard</div>
3314   <a
1   href="36-Quoting.htm">Quoting</a>
6605   the
97   word
4   prevents
8   wildcarding.
12   Since
52   filenames
650   are
471   not
97   case
1   sensitive,
320   filename
51   wildcarding
22   isn't
2   either.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
261   A
46   pattern
511   can
190   also
924   be
281   used
3144   to
4   examine
3088   a
129   string
1307   in
3088   a
3314   <a
1   href="18-ConditionTesting.htm#switch"><tt>switch</tt></a>
94   statement
1041   or
920   with
6605   the
4   <tt>=~</tt>
2   (pattern
1   matches)
2223   and
4   <tt>!~</tt>
2   (pattern
1   fails)
3314   <a
1   href="27-ExpressionOperators.htm">expression
1   operators</a>.
106   In
320   this
4   context,
6605   the
46   pattern
64   must
924   be
97   inside
3314   <a
1   href="36-Quoting.htm">quotes</a>,
30   since
19   otherwise
879   it
161   would
924   be
15   parsed
857   as
590   an
11   expression,
920   with
16   <tt>*</tt>
78   being
3   viewed
857   as
6605   the
3   multiply
3   operator,
38   etc.
106   When
4   examining
3088   a
129   string
920   with
3088   a
46   pattern
1061   that
55   uses
1   alternation,
6605   the
46   pattern
33   matches
790   if
439   any
2059   of
6605   the
2   alternatives
20   matches.
1   <i>When
26   matching
8   strings,
97   case
135   does
1   matter.</i>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
106   When
191   using
3088   a
46   pattern
3144   to
4   examine
3088   a
129   string
920   with
4   <tt>=~</tt>
1041   or
4   <tt>!~</tt>
1041   or
920   with
3088   a
4   <tt>switch</tt>,
6605   the
129   string
78   being
2   tested
1837   is
6605   the
20   left
18   operand
2223   and
6605   the
46   pattern
1837   is
883   on
6605   the
9   right.
1679   </p>

446   <h3>
22   Filename
3   completion<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="33-CommandLineEditing.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
22   Filename
46   completion
30   lets
675   you
84   type
234   just
6605   the
281   first
33   part
2059   of
3088   a
320   filename
2223   and
299   have
6605   the
1129   shell
10   fill
1307   in
6605   the
4   rest.
29   There
650   are
16   three
2   variations:
191   using
6605   the
9   <kbd>Tab</kbd>
38   key
1113   for
3   walking
3   one-by-one
109   through
6605   the
190   list
2059   of
7   matches,
4   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>F</kbd>
1113   for
11   basic
320   filename
46   completion
2223   and
4   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>D</kbd>
3144   to
26   paste
364   all
6605   the
33   matches
50   onto
6605   the
428   command
75   line.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
9   <kbd>Tab</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
1   <b>Next
2   match.</b>
5   Move
3   one-by-one
109   through
6605   the
190   list
2059   of
26   matching
7   filenames.
11   After
6605   the
4   last,
26   paste
6605   the
253   original
51   back
1307   in
3   place,
18   highlighting
920   with
6605   the
3314   <a
3   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#MATHCHFAIL"><tt>MATCHFAIL</tt></a>
3   color,
189   then
2   continue,
920   with
6605   the
71   next
1   <kbd>Tab</kbd>,
3   cycling
109   through
6605   the
190   list
6   again.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
103   To
84   type
590   an
37   ordinary
28   tab
15   character,
270   use
2   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>Tab</kbd>.
2   Alternately,
790   if
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
1837   is
150   started
920   with
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="Utilities/csh.htm"><tt>-T</tt></a>
18   option,
6605   the
9   <kbd>Tab</kbd>
38   key
6   generates
3088   a
3   plain
28   tab
172   character
2223   and
2   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>Tab</kbd>
1837   is
6605   the
320   filename
46   completion
9   key.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
2   <kbd>Shift</kbd>-<kbd>Tab</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
1   <b>Previous
2   match.</b>
38   Same
857   as
6605   the
9   <kbd>Tab</kbd>
10   key,
241   but
2   rotate
10   backward
109   through
6605   the
190   list
2059   of
20   matches.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
4   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>F</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
1   <b>Filename
1   completion.</b>
1   Appending
6605   the
16   <tt>*</tt>
3314   <a
7   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">wildcard</a>
172   character
50   onto
6605   the
5   end,
270   use
6605   the
32   previous
97   word
857   as
3088   a
45   wildcard
19   pattern.
468   If
879   it
33   matches
3088   a
110   single
39   file,
5   substitute
879   it
1307   in
920   with
3088   a
67   space
8   following.
468   If
675   you
2   <i>don't</i>
84   want
3088   a
67   space
6   following,
270   use
6605   the
3314   <a
2   href="Utilities/csh.htm"><tt>-N</tt></a>
192   option
268   when
675   you
87   start
6605   the
1930   C
55   shell.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
468   If
87   there
132   were
30   multiple
7   matches,
241   but
104   they
364   all
60   had
101   some
19   common
2   front-part
1061   that
6   fully
1   &ldquo;used
1   up&rdquo;
6605   the
4   pattern,
5   substitute
1307   in
234   just
1061   that
19   common
2   front-part
2223   and
32   show
879   it
1307   in
6605   the
46   color
152   specified
588   by
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#DUPLICATES"><tt>DUPLICATES</tt></a>
243   variable
4   (default
1837   is
1   green).
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
468   If
39   substitution
32   wasn't
3   possible,
5   highlight
6605   the
46   pattern
1307   in
6605   the
46   color
152   specified
588   by
6605   the
3314   <a
3   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#MATHCHFAIL"><tt>MATCHFAIL</tt></a>
243   variable
4   (default
1837   is
41   bright
1   red).
39   Any
18   highlighting
46   color
1837   is
29   turned
91   off
268   when
675   you
5   press
6605   the
71   next
3   keystroke.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
5   id="keystrokes"
5   class="last">
78   <p
47   class="left">
4   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>D</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
1   <b>Duplicate
1   completions.</b>
38   Same
9   wildcarding,
241   but
790   if
87   there
650   are
30   multiple
7   matches,
32   show
72   them
364   all
920   with
3088   a
67   space
8   following.
468   If
675   you
2   <i>don't</i>
84   want
3088   a
67   space
6   following,
270   use
1   the<br/>
3314   <a
2   href="Utilities/csh.htm"><tt>-N</tt></a>
192   option
268   when
675   you
87   start
6605   the
1930   C
55   shell.
468   If
87   there
132   were
227   no
7   matches,
5   highlight
6605   the
46   pattern
1307   in
6605   the
46   color
152   specified
588   by
6605   the
3314   <a
3   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#MATHCHFAIL"><tt>MATCHFAIL</tt></a>
3   variable;
117   default
1837   is
41   bright
3   red.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
468   If
675   you
38   don't
299   have
590   an
2   <kbd>Alt</kbd>
10   key,
270   use
2   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>Shift</kbd>
10   instead.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
2   <kbd>Enter</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
2   Accept
6605   the
428   command
857   as
13   typed.
5   Move
3144   to
6605   the
412   end
8   (if
471   not
87   there
2   already)
2223   and
9   carriage
159   return
3144   to
3088   a
257   new
75   line.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
1   <kbd>Home</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
7   Beginning
2059   of
428   command
75   line.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
2   <kbd>End</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
97   End
2059   of
428   command
75   line.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
12   <script
18   type="text/javascript">
5   Arrows.UpArrow(
22   );
12   </script>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
4   Up
271   one
428   command
1307   in
6605   the
112   history
39   list.
45   Each
96   time
102   it's
1   pressed,
879   it
6   displays
6605   the
32   preceding
20   entry
1307   in
6605   the
112   history
39   list.
39   Any
12   <tt>!</tt>
1041   or
10   <tt>%</tt>
112   history
35   references
1307   in
6605   the
253   original
106   text
380   will
299   have
382   been
27   fixed
157   up
42   unless
879   it
363   was
6605   the
34   immediately
32   preceding
428   command
2223   and
879   it
60   had
271   one
2059   of
94   these
35   references
1061   that
1   failed.
468   If
55   already
277   at
6605   the
281   first
2   entry,
6605   the
428   command
372   line
1837   is
8   highlighted
1307   in
41   bright
3   red.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
12   <script
18   type="text/javascript">
4   Arrows.DownArrow(
22   );
4   </script></p>
1604   <p>
2   Down
271   one
428   command
372   line
1307   in
6605   the
112   history
39   list.
468   If
55   already
277   at
6605   the
15   latest
2   entry,
6605   the
428   command
372   line
1837   is
8   highlighted
1307   in
41   bright
3   red.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>

1604   <p>

172   character
1   left.
1679   </p>

12   </script>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
4   Up
271   one
8   row
883   on
6605   the
204   screen
790   if
6605   the
428   command
1837   is
53   long
7   enough
1061   that
879   it

1604   <p>
