71   next
25   word.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
2   <kbd>Insert</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
3   Toggle
1   insert/overstrike
27   mode.
106   When
1   inserting,
6605   the
17   cursor
1837   is
7   slightly
1   thicker.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
2   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>Insert</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
3   Insert
6605   the
71   next
97   word
640   from
6605   the
77   last
9   section
2059   of
16   deleted
19   text.
106   When
879   it
2   reaches
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
6605   the
16   deleted
3   text,
879   it
29   starts
1   over.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
2   <kbd>Alt</kbd>-<kbd>Insert</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
3   Insert
364   all
6605   the
16   rest
2059   of
6605   the
14   previously
16   deleted
19   text.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
3   <kbd>Page
1   Up</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
2   Backup
3144   to
271   one
8   past
6605   the
77   last
112   history
7   reference.
1   (Repeatedly
19   typing
3   <kbd>Page
1   Up</kbd>,
189   then
2   <kbd>Enter</kbd>
1837   is
3088   a
19   convenient
90   way
2059   of
2   picking
157   up
3088   a
50   whole
29   series
2059   of
62   commands
640   from
1   history.)
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
3   <kbd>Page
1   Down</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
2   Forward
3144   to
6605   the
3   newest
20   entry
1307   in
6605   the
112   history
39   list.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
5   id="keystrokes"
5   class="last">
78   <p
47   class="left">
2   <kbd>Esc</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
6   Clear
6605   the
428   command
75   line.
1679   </p>

446   <h3>
9   History
1   recall<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="33-CommandLineEditing.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="35-CommandCompletion.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
9   History
7   recall
42   allows
3088   a
32   previous
94   statement
3144   to
924   be
11   quickly
3   recalled
2223   and
1   re-executed.
25   It's
3088   a
44   very
14   fast
1   shorthand,
7   especially
1307   in
6605   the
1   edit/compile/debug
23   loop
1041   or
3144   to
17   fix
3088   a
2   typo.
111   For
2   convenience,
12   <tt>!</tt>
1837   is
25   taken
857   as
590   an
37   ordinary
172   character
790   if
42   followed
588   by
68   white
7   space,
2   <tt>=</tt>,
7   <tt>~</tt>
1041   or
2   <tt>(</tt>.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
468   If
675   you
4   want,
675   you
511   can
21   choose
58   different
197   characters
3144   to
54   introduce
112   history
35   references
588   by
9   changing
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="41-ProcessWideVariables.htm#histchars">
1   <tt>histchars</tt></a>
47   variable.
1679   </p>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
9   120px">
39   Command
62   </th>
30   <th>
9   Meaning
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
4   <tt>!!</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
6   Last
428   command
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>!^</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
11   First
77   argument
97   word
2059   of
77   last
428   command
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>!$</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   Last
97   word
2059   of
77   last
428   command
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>!*</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
113   All
74   arguments
2059   of
77   last
428   command
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>!<var>n</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
39   Command
7   <tt><var>n</var></tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>!-<var>n</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   <tt><var>n</var></tt>th
428   command
640   from
6605   the
4   last,
13   counting
6605   the
34   immediately
32   preceding
428   command
857   as
1   <tt>!-0</tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>!<var>str</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   Last
428   command
31   starting
920   with
2   <tt><var>str</var></tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>!?<var>str</var>?</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   Last
428   command
50   containing
2   <tt><var>str</var></tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>%<var>str1</var>%<var>str2</var>%</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
5   Substitute
3   <tt><var>str2</var></tt>
1113   for
3   <tt><var>str1</var></tt>
1307   in
77   last
47   command.
1   Recognized
199   only
277   at
6605   the
45   beginning
2059   of
6605   the
428   command
75   line.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>

446   <h3>
39   Command
3   completion<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="34-HistoryRecall.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="36-Quoting.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
39   Command
46   completion
30   lets
675   you
84   type
234   just
33   part
2059   of
3088   a
32   previous
428   command
2223   and
299   have
6605   the
1129   shell
10   fill
1307   in
6605   the
4   rest.
23   As
920   with
320   filename
224   completion,
790   if
227   no
65   match
1837   is
12   found,
46   color
18   highlighting
857   as
43   defined
588   by
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#MATCHFAIL"><tt>MATCHFAIL</tt></a>
243   variable
4   (default
1837   is
41   bright
1   red)
380   will
924   be
31   used.
1   Consecutive
1   depressions
58   cause
6605   the
76   search
3144   to
23   continue
883   on
51   back
109   through
6605   the
112   history
39   list.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
42   id="keystrokes">
78   <p
47   class="left">
2   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>Enter</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
12   Find
6605   the
32   previous
428   command
1061   that
150   started
920   with
6605   the
197   characters
2059   of
6605   the
32   preceding
25   word.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1655   <div
5   id="keystrokes"
5   class="last">
78   <p
47   class="left">
3   <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>-<kbd>Shift</kbd>-<kbd>Enter</kbd>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
12   Find
6605   the
32   previous
428   command
1061   that
24   contained
6605   the
197   characters
2059   of
6605   the
32   preceding
97   word
19   anywhere
883   on
6605   the
75   line.
1679   </p>
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
3   Repeatedly
5   pressing
94   these
17   keys
2   cycles
157   up
109   through
364   all
6605   the
26   matching
62   commands
18   you&rsquo;ve
14   previously
13   typed.
39   Command
46   completion
55   uses
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="08-History.htm">history</a>
27   mechanism
3144   to
7   recall
62   commands
18   you&rsquo;ve
14   previously
1   typed.</p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
55   name="SeeAlso"></a>See
190   also
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a

13   recall</a><br/>
3314   <a
43   href="33-CommandLineEditing.htm">Command
372   line
20   editing</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#MATCHFAIL">MATCHFAIL
11   variable</a><br/>
3314   <a
42   href="32-FilenameCompletion.htm">Filename
19   completion</a><br/>
3314   <a
13   href="08-History.htm"><i>Tutorial:</i>
11   History</a><br/>
3314   <a
8   href="04.1-CommandLineEditing.htm"><i>Tutorial:</i>
39   Command
372   line
20   editing</a><br/>
3314   <a

446   <h3>
2   Quoting<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="35-CommandCompletion.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="37-VariableSubstitution.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
4   180px">
3   String
62   </th>
30   <th>
9   Meaning
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="SingleQuotes"></a><tt>'
2   <var>string</var>
1   '</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   <b>Strong
2   quote.</b>
2   Literal
172   character
35   string.
15   Only
121   escape
197   characters
2223   and
3314   <a
3   href="34-HistoryRecall.htm">history
3   substitutions</a>
650   are
3   recognized.
4   Embedded
2   blanks,
3314   <a
7   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">wildcard</a>
19   characters,
25   double
6   quotes,
2   backquotes
2223   and
3314   <a
1   href="37-VariableSubstitution.htm">dollar
1   signs</a>
650   are
35   treated
857   as
37   ordinary
55   characters.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="DoubleQuotes"></a><tt>"
2   <var>string</var>
1   "</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   <b>Weak
2   quote.</b>
4   Embedded
2   blanks,
3314   <a
7   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">wildcard</a>
197   characters
2223   and
110   single
52   quotes
650   are
35   treated
857   as
37   ordinary
55   characters.
3314   <a
1   href="34-HistoryRecall.htm">History</a>,
428   command
2223   and
3314   <a
3   href="37-VariableSubstitution.htm">variable
3   substitutions</a>
650   are
66   still
11   done.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="CommandSubstitution"></a><tt>`
20   <var>statement_list</var>
1   `</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   <b>Command
2   substitution.</b>
4   Evaluate
6605   the
129   string
857   as
3088   a
48   separate
428   command
2223   and
5   substitute
122   its
64   output
51   back
50   onto
6605   the
428   command
75   line.
1   Newlines
650   are
29   turned
178   into
42   spaces
2223   and
22   ANSI
121   escape
39   sequences
7   (for
1   highlighting,
9   etc.)
650   are
1   filtered
5   out.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="LineAtATimeCommandSubstitution"></a><tt>``
20   <var>statement_list</var>
1   ``</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   <b>Line-at-a-time
428   command
2   substitution.</b>
1   Whole
111   lines
2059   of
64   output
640   from
6605   the
5   enclosed
73   statements
650   are
15   parsed
857   as
25   words,
115   even
790   if
104   they
299   have
11   embedded
42   spaces
1041   or
176   other
94   special
55   characters.
8   Very
33   useful
1113   for
3   dealing
920   with
841   Windows
52   filenames
1061   that
299   have
7   spaces.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="EscapeCharacter"></a><tt>^<var>c</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
78   <p
1   class="multi">
1   <b>Escape
234   just
6605   the
71   next
1   character.</b>
39   Use
3144   to
14   remove
439   any
94   special
54   meaning
640   from
6605   the
71   next
15   character,
3144   to
94   specify
3088   a
172   character
588   by
122   its
72   binary
105   value
1041   or
3144   to
94   specify
271   one
84   following
3   non-printable
55   characters.
468   If
6605   the
15   NewLine
172   character
277   at
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
3088   a
372   line
1837   is
17   quoted
320   this
8   way,
102   it&rsquo;s
35   treated
857   as
37   ordinary
68   white
13   space.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
117   default
121   escape
172   character
1837   is
6605   the
5   circumflex
1   <kbd>^</kbd>,
1   Windows-style.
150   You
511   can
436   set
879   it
3144   to
924   be
1   <kbd>\</kbd>,
1   Unix-style,
1041   or
439   any
176   other
172   character
2059   of
252   your
7   choice
588   by
9   changing
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="41-ProcessWideVariables.htm#escapesym"><tt>escapesym</tt></a>
47   variable.
1679   </p>
6   <h5>
12   Escape
39   sequences
6   </h5>
10   <table
6   class="plain">
851   <tr>
776   <td
36   style="width:
1   50px"
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>^a</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
7   Audible
1   alert
1   (bell)
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>^b</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
3   Backspace
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>^f</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
7   Form
9   Feed
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>^n</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
16   New
3   Line
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>^r</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
11   Carriage
13   Return
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>^t</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
30   Tab
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>^v</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
7   Vertical
30   Tab
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
5   <tt>^^</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
11   Single
15   escapesym
172   character
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>^<var>octal</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
983   The
72   binary
172   character
105   value
857   as
3088   a
2   3-digit
15   octal
16   number.
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>^x<var>hex</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
983   The
72   binary
172   character
105   value
857   as
3088   a
3   2-digit
2   hexadecimal
16   number.
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>

446   <h3>
7   Variable
1   substitution<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="36-Quoting.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="38-SubstitutionModifiers.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
7   Variable
39   substitution
1837   is
6   typically
281   used
3144   to
28   pass
6605   the
105   value
2059   of
3088   a
243   variable
857   as
590   an
77   argument
3144   to
3088   a
47   command.
111   For
25   example:
2   <tt>echo
1   $message</tt>
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
1   <tt>${<var>...</var>}</tt>
1   variations
650   are
281   used
3144   to
2   isolate
6605   the
243   variable
39   substitution
640   from
34   whatever
106   text
7   (including
439   any
1   colons)
193   may
1   follow.
1679   </p>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
4   150px">
3   Reference
62   </th>
30   <th>
9   Meaning
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3   <tt>$<var>var</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
2   Value
2059   of
243   variable
3   <tt><var>var</var></tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>${<var>var</var>}</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
38   Same
857   as
3   <tt>$<var>var</var></tt>
42   except
29   separated
640   from
41   anything
8   following.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>$<var>var</var>[
20   <var>expr</var>
1   ]</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
2   Value
2059   of
1   <tt><var>var</var></tt>,
13   indexed
588   by
590   an
11   arbitrarily
16   complex
15   expression.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>${<var>var</var>[
20   <var>expr</var>
1   ]}</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
38   Same
857   as
1   <tt>$<var>var</var>[<var>expr</var>]</tt>
42   except
29   separated
640   from
41   anything
8   following.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>$#<var>var</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
13   Number
2059   of
80   words
1307   in
1   <tt><var>var</var></tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>${#<var>var</var>}</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
38   Same
857   as
2   <tt>$#<var>var</var></tt>
42   except
4   isolated
640   from
41   anything
8   following.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3   <tt>$?<var>var</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
214   1
790   if
3   <tt><var>var</var></tt>
2   exists;
120   0
4   otherwise.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>${?<var>var</var>}</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
38   Same
857   as
3   <tt>$?<var>var</var></tt>
42   except
4   isolated
640   from
41   anything
8   following.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>$<var>proc</var>(
1   <var>arglist</var>
2   )</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   Procedure
8   reference,
281   used
857   as
3088   a
243   variable
14   substitution.
983   The
74   arguments
650   are
9   expressions,
29   separated
588   by
2   commas.
39   Any
105   value
15   returned
588   by
6605   the
72   procedure
380   will
924   be
6   substituted
1307   in
2   place.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>$&lt;</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
3   Pseudo-variable
48   result
2059   of
46   reading
271   one
372   line
640   from
36   stdin
197   each
96   time
102   it&rsquo;s
2   evaluated.
38   Same
857   as
1   <tt>$getline</tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>$*</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
38   Same
857   as
3   <tt>$argv</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>$0</tt><span
1   style="font-size:0.9em">
109   through
1   </span><tt>$9</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
38   Same
857   as
3   <tt>$argv[0]</tt>
109   through
1   <tt>$argv[9]</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>

1930   C

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a

55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
4   Substitution
10   modifiers
511   can
924   be
8   applied
3144   to
439   any
3314   <a
2   href="36-Quoting.htm#CommandSubstitution">command</a>,
3314   <a
2   href="37-VariableSubstitution.htm">variable</a>
1041   or
3314   <a
3   href="34-HistoryRecall.htm">history</a>
14   substitution.
39   Any
165   number
1307   in
3088   a
8   row
511   can
924   be
2   applied.
1679   </p>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
9   120px">
8   Operator
62   </th>
30   <th>
9   Meaning
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>:<var>n</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   <tt><var>n</var></tt>th
97   word
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>:#</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
10   Count
6605   the
165   number
2059   of
80   words
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>:^</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
9   Word
165   number
32   1,
13   counting
640   from
120   0
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>:$</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   Last
97   word
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:%</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
9   Word
16   matched
588   by
3088   a
2   <tt>!?<var>str</var>?</tt>
112   history
76   search
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:<var>n</var>-<var>m</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   <tt><var>n</var></tt>th
109   through
1   <tt><var>m</var></tt>th
80   words
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:-<var>n</var></tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
120   0
109   through
6   <tt><var>n</var></tt>th
80   words
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:<var>n</var>-</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   <tt><var>n</var></tt>th
109   through
1   next-to-last
80   words
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:<var>n</var>*</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   <tt><var>n</var></tt>th
109   through
77   last
97   word
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:*</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
214   1
109   through
77   last
97   word
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>:q</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   Single-quote
197   each
97   word
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:s/<var>str1</var>/<var>str2</var>/</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
5   Substitute
3   <tt><var>str2</var></tt>
1113   for
3   <tt><var>str1</var></tt>
2223   and
189   then
2   reparse
178   into
27   words.
52   Match
5   failures
650   are
66   considered
3144   to
924   be
18   errors
42   unless
2   <tt>ignoreerrors
69   ==
1   2</tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:S/<var>str1</var>/<var>str2</var>/</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
5   Substitute
3   <tt><var>str2</var></tt>
1113   for
3   <tt><var>str1</var></tt>
241   but
2   leave
879   it
857   as
3088   a
110   single
35   string.
139   Also,
8   failure
3144   to
65   match
1837   is
471   not
66   considered
590   an
19   error.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:&amp;</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   Repeat
77   last
39   substitution
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:g</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   Global
1   editing:
857   as
3088   a
11   prefix
172   character
3144   to
439   any
2059   of
6605   the
176   other
57   editing
7   operators,
879   it
99   means
6   apply
6605   the
29   edit
18   operation
3   everywhere
879   it
7   matches,
471   not
234   just
6605   the
281   first
1   occurrence.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>:x</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   Treat
197   each
97   word
857   as
3088   a
13   string,
38   break
879   it
157   up
178   into
25   words,
189   then
1   single-quote
197   each
25   word.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>:p</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
27   Print
6605   the
39   substitution
241   but
38   don't
16   execute
6605   the
30   statement.
4   (Ignored
42   except
1307   in
112   history
1   substitutions.)
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:h&nbsp;&nbsp;:r&nbsp;&nbsp;:t<br/>
1   :e&nbsp;&nbsp;:f&nbsp;&nbsp;:m<br/>
1   :M&nbsp;&nbsp;:A&nbsp;&nbsp;:L</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
39   href="39-PathnameEditing.htm">Pathname
4   editing</a>
1   operators:
8   head,
2   root,
5   tail,
7   extension,
1   fullpath,
1   mixedpath,
1   fullmixedpath,
8   shortname
2223   and
1   longname.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>

446   <h3>
5   Pathname
57   editing
883   on
1   x\y.z<br/>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
5   Pathname
57   editing
511   can
924   be
8   applied
3144   to
439   any
3314   <a
2   href="36-Quoting.htm#CommandSubstitution">command</a>,
3314   <a
2   href="37-VariableSubstitution.htm">variable</a>
1041   or
3314   <a
3   href="34-HistoryRecall.htm">history</a>
14   substitution.
39   Any
165   number
1307   in
3088   a
8   row
511   can
924   be
2   applied.
1679   </p>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
5   style="padding-right:
3   7px">
8   Operator
62   </th>
30   <th>
22   Name
62   </th>
30   <th>
1   Description
62   </th>
30   <th>
1   Result
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
4   <tt>:h</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
16   head
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
17   Directory
50   containing
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
2   <tt>x</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:r</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
23   root
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
7   Path
63   without
3   <tt>.ext</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   <tt>x\y</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:t</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
18   tail
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
3   Simple
320   filename
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
1   <tt>y.z</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>:b</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
6   base
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
22   Filename
63   without
3   <tt>.ext</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
2   <tt>y</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>

1768   </td>

1768   </td>

1604   <p>
3   <tt>.ext</tt>
63   without
6605   the
5   <tt>.</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>

1604   <p>
1   <tt>z</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>

776   <td
698   class="langref">
1   <tt>:f</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
13   fullpath
1768   </td>

1604   <p>
1   Fully-qualified
152   name
1679   </p>
1768   </td>

1604   <p>
1   <tt>c:\Users\Public\x\y.z</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>

1604   <p>
2   Mixed-case
37   pathname
1679   </p>
1768   </td>

1604   <p>
1   <tt>x\Y.c</tt>
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>

1768   </td>

1604   <p>

37   pathname
1679   </p>

5   8.3
320   filename

2   <tt>:L</tt>
1768   </td>

2   longname
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
9   Long
320   filename
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>
1604   <p>
983   The
8   shortname
29   function
6   depends
883   on
54   support
640   from
6605   the
8   filesystem.
9   Long
52   filenames
125   read
53   over
6605   the
13   network
640   from
590   an
10   HPFS
6   partition
176   do
471   not
299   have
1   shortnames,
1113   for
6   example.
1679   </p>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
5   Environmental
111   variables
650   are
73   passed
3144   to
439   any
107   child
30   processes
1041   or
20   windows
675   you
38   create
588   by
9   invoking
590   an
13   external
69   utility
1041   or
13   application.
106   When
1043   Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
29   starts
157   up
879   it
20   looks
1113   for
6605   the
4   ones
26   shown
20   here
3144   to
924   be
43   defined
1307   in
6605   the
76   environment
879   it
2   inherits.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
30   These
111   variables
650   are
1   special:
468   If
21   they&rsquo;re
471   not
55   already
43   defined
1307   in
6605   the
76   environment
6605   the
1129   shell
20   inherits
268   when
879   it
2   starts,
879   it
13   creates
21   them.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">COLORS
4   COMSPEC
2   CSHTITLE
3   DUPLICATES
12   HIGHLIGHT
4   HOME
3   MATCHFAIL
12   PATH
6   PROMPT1
2   PROMPT2
9   SHELL
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
5   Environmental
243   variable
88   names
650   are
471   not
4   case-sensitive.
1   <tt>Path</tt>
2223   and
7   <tt>PATH</tt>
20   refer
3144   to
6605   the
122   same
3   thing.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>

1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
13   Normal
204   screen
14   colors.
468   If
102   it's
471   not
67   set,
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
20   inherits
6605   the
46   color
18   settings
2059   of
6605   the
43   console
66   window
268   when
879   it
4   starts.
1679   </p>
78   <p
6   style="margin-top:12px">
983   The
197   colors
16   available
1307   in
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
650   are
3   <tt>black</tt>,
3   <tt>red</tt>,
3   <tt>green</tt>,
3   <tt>yellow</tt>,
3   <tt>blue</tt>,
3   <tt>magenta</tt>
42   (or
6   <tt>blue
3   red</tt>),
3   <tt>cyan</tt>
42   (or
6   <tt>blue
3   green</tt>)
2223   and
3   <tt>white</tt>.
12   Foreground
197   colors
193   may
190   also
924   be
6   <tt>bright</tt>,
5   <tt>dim</tt>,
2   <tt>blink</tt>
1041   or
3   <tt>reverse</tt>.
1679   </p>
78   <p
6   style="margin-top:12px">
983   The
8   optional
8   keyword
6   <tt>on</tt>
5   introduces
65   background
14   colors.
113   All
6605   the
88   names
2059   of
6605   the
197   colors
15   along
920   with
6605   the
6   keywords
6   <tt>bright</tt>,
5   <tt>dim</tt>,
2   <tt>blink</tt>,
3   <tt>reverse</tt>
2223   and
6   <tt>on</tt>
193   may
924   be
1307   in
3   upper,
32   lower
1041   or
40   mixed
43   case.
1679   </p>
78   <p
6   style="margin-top:12px">
2   <tt>Blink</tt>
39   causes
11   true
3   blinking
199   only
3   full-screen;
1307   in
3088   a
106   text
12   window,
879   it
234   just
19   makes
6605   the
65   background
2   brighter.
1679   </p>

850   </tr>

1679   </p>
1768   </td>

446   <h3>
4   Shared
5   variables<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="42-PerThreadVariables.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#PredefindedSharedVariables">Predefined
30   shared
48   variables</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
30   These
1129   shell
111   variables
650   are
30   shared
17   across
6605   the
33   entire
1930   C
1129   shell
70   process
6   among
364   all
20   threads.
468   If
271   one
79   thread
45   changes
6605   the
105   value
2059   of
439   any
2059   of
94   these
22   variables,
6605   the
78   change
1837   is
1   instantly
6   seen
588   by
364   all
176   other
20   threads.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
30   These
19   specific
1129   shell
111   variables
650   are
10   read-only.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
4   class="codesample"
1   style="font-weight:bolder">NTVersion
2   OperatingSystem
1   processid
1129   shell
2   WinBuild
3   WinVersion
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
106   In
2   contrast
3144   to
3314   <a
1   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#">environment
3   variables</a>,
364   all
1129   shell
111   variables
650   are
4   case-sensitive.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="PredefindedSharedVariables"></a>Predefined
30   shared
111   variables
523   </h4>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
9   120px">
22   Name
62   </th>
32   <th
36   style="width:
5   90px">
47   Default
62   </th>
30   <th>
39   Use
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="process">$</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
261   A
13   synonym
1113   for
6605   the
123   <tt
4   class="process">processid</tt>
243   variable
268   when
49   typed
857   as
2   <tt>$$</tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="bsdhistory"></a><tt
2   class="process">bsdhistory</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
120   0
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
32   By
38   default,
4   <tt>!!</tt>
1837   is
6605   the
34   immediately
32   preceding
428   command
2223   and
4   <tt>!-1</tt>
1837   is
6605   the
271   one
98   before
6   that.
13   Setting
123   <tt
2   class="process">bsdhistory
527   =
2   1</tt>
19   makes
72   them
6605   the
6   same.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="cdpath"></a><tt
2   class="process">cdpath</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
48   null
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
38   Same
857   as
6605   the
3314   <a
2   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#CDPATH"><tt>CDPATH</tt></a>
90   environmental
39   variable,
23   broken
178   into
27   words.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="cshtitle"></a><tt
2   class="process">cshtitle</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
38   Same
857   as
6605   the
3314   <a
2   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#CSHTITLE"><tt>CSHTITLE</tt></a>
90   environmental
47   variable.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="escapesym"></a><tt
2   class="process">escapesym</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
12   <tt>^</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
6   Character
3144   to
924   be
18   interpreted
857   as
3088   a
44   literal
121   escape
37   character.
38   Same
857   as
6605   the
3314   <a
2   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#ESCAPESYM"><tt>ESCAPESYM</tt></a>
90   environmental
47   variable.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="histchars"></a><tt
2   class="process">histchars</tt>
1768   </td>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
2   <tt>!%</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
7   Characters
201   which
54   introduce
4   long-form
2223   and
3   short-form
112   history
3   references,
8   respectively.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a
1   name="home"></a><tt
2   class="process">home</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
38   Same
857   as
6605   the
3314   <a
4   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#HOME"><tt>HOME</tt></a>
90   environmental
47   variable.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="process">NTVersion</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>

1604   <p>
3   Obsolete
152   name
1113   for
6605   the
123   <tt
4   class="process">WinBuild</tt>

1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td

2   class="process">OperatingSystem</tt>
1768   </td>

1768   </td>

1604   <p>
22   Name
2059   of
6605   the
11   operating
110   system
883   on
201   which
6605   the
1129   shell
1837   is
8   running.
2   Possible
45   values
650   are
1   <tt>Windows&nbsp;NT</tt>
2223   and
1   <tt>Windows&nbsp;9x</tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>

776   <td
698   class="langref">
3314   <a

857   as
6605   the
3314   <a

39   variable,

178   into
27   words.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>

2059   of

446   <h3>
3   Inherited
5   variables<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="41-ProcessWideVariables.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="43-PerThreadVariables.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#PredefindedInheritedVariables">Predefined
37   inherited
48   variables</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
45   Each
79   thread
19   gets
122   its
51   own
30   copies
2059   of
6605   the
84   following
22   variables,
241   but
6605   the
20   initial
105   value
1837   is
37   inherited
640   from
122   its
21   parent
16   thread.
983   The
9   defaults
650   are
6605   the
20   initial
45   values
268   when
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
4   starts.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="PredefindedInheritedVariables"></a>Predefined
37   inherited
111   variables
523   </h4>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
9   120px">
22   Name
62   </th>
32   <th
36   style="width:
5   90px">
47   Default
62   </th>
30   <th>
39   Use
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
41   *
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
261   A
13   synonym
1113   for
6605   the
123   <tt
4   class="inherited">argv</tt>
243   variable
268   when
49   typed
857   as
2   <tt>$*</tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
4   class="inherited">argv</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
39   Any
77   argument
80   words
73   passed
3144   to
6605   the
1129   shell
1041   or
3144   to
3088   a
10   <tt>.csh</tt>
159   script
96   file.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="inherited">bsdargv</tt>
1768   </td>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
57   <tt>0</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
468   If
67   set,
4   <tt>$<span
4   class="inherited">argv</span>[0]</tt>
35   contains
6605   the
152   name
2059   of
6605   the
24   script,
234   just
857   as
879   it
161   would
126   under
6605   the
253   original
67   Berkeley
1930   C
5   shell;
588   by
38   default,
4   <tt>$<span
4   class="inherited">argv</span>[0]</tt>
1837   is
6605   the
281   first
77   argument
25   word.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="inherited">cdhome</tt>
1768   </td>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
57   <tt>0</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
468   If
67   set,
6605   the
10   <tt>cd</tt>
428   command
920   with
227   no
77   argument
1837   is
6605   the
122   same
857   as
4   <tt>cd
2   $home</tt>.
47   Default
1837   is
3144   to
44   simply
31   print
6605   the
213   current
319   directory
32   name.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="inherited">cdisk</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
18   Current
14   disk,
471   not
33   including
6605   the
8   colon.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="inherited">CDISK</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
38   Same
857   as
123   <tt
2   class="inherited">cdisk</tt>,
241   but
1307   in
21   upper
43   case.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="inherited">chgdisk</tt>
1768   </td>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
57   <tt>0</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
468   If
67   set,
10   <tt>cd</tt>
37   automatically
45   changes
6605   the
213   current
83   disk
790   if
6605   the
89   path
1837   is
883   on
55   another
24   disk.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="inherited">cwd</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
7   Full
37   pathname
2059   of
6605   the
213   current
92   directory.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
4   class="inherited">echoallinput</tt>
1768   </td>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
57   <tt>0</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
18   Copy
6605   the
58   input
3144   to
30   stdout
857   as
102   it&rsquo;s
17   read.
2   Similar
3144   to
123   <tt
2   class="initialized">echoinput</tt>,
241   but
37   inherited
640   from
21   parent
3144   to

1679   </p>

6605   the

446   <h3>
3   Initialized
5   variables<br/>
436   <small><a
2   href="42-PerThreadVariables.htm">Previous</a>
498   |
3314   <a
2   href="44-VariablesSortedByName.htm">Next</a></small>
446   </h3>
57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#PredefindedInitializedVariables">Predefined
11   initialized
48   variables</a><br/>
3314   <a
55   href="#SeeAlso">See
55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
45   Each
79   thread
19   gets
122   its
51   own
30   copies
2059   of
6605   the
84   following
12   variables.
45   Each
1837   is
80   always
11   initialized
3144   to
6605   the
38   default,
471   not
1   inherited.
106   In
5   addition,
197   each
257   new
79   thread
1837   is
11   initialized
920   with
117   default
1   on-interrupt
13   processing
11   (a
3   forced
1   exit),
2223   and
48   null
76   search
2223   and
12   replace
7   strings.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="PredefindedInitializedVariables"></a>Predefined
11   initialized
111   variables
523   </h4>
182   <table>
851   <tr>
32   <th
36   style="width:
9   120px">
22   Name
62   </th>
32   <th
36   style="width:
5   90px">
47   Default
62   </th>
30   <th>
39   Use
62   </th>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="initialized">&lt;</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
261   A
13   synonym
1113   for
6605   the
123   <tt
5   class="initialized">getline</tt>
243   variable
268   when
49   typed
857   as
2   <tt>$&lt;</tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="initialized">@</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
261   A
13   synonym
1113   for
6605   the
123   <tt
4   class="initialized">stmtnumber</tt>
243   variable
268   when
49   typed
857   as
2   <tt>$@</tt>.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="initialized">child</tt>
1768   </td>

698   class="langref">
57   <tt>0</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
2   Identification
165   number
2059   of
6605   the
77   last
107   child
70   process
4   spawned.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>

776   <td
698   class="langref">

2   class="initialized">echoinput</tt>

57   <tt>0</tt>
1768   </td>

1604   <p>
18   Copy
6605   the
58   input
3144   to
30   stdout
857   as
102   it&rsquo;s
17   read.
2   (Similar
3144   to
123   <tt
4   class="inherited">echoallinput</tt>
241   but
471   not
37   inherited
3144   to
3088   a
107   child
2   thread.)
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">

2   class="initialized">eofgetline</tt>

1768   </td>

1604   <p>
3   Pseudo-variable
3144   to
14   indicate
790   if
6605   the
77   last
30   reference
3144   to
123   <tt
5   class="initialized">getline</tt>
18   encountered
590   an
11   end-of-file
3   condition.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
2   class="initialized">getchar</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
24   Read
271   one
172   character
640   from
36   stdin
63   without
2   echoing.
468   If
36   stdin
1837   is
7   tied
3144   to
6605   the
7   keyboard,
2   outboard
17   keys
650   are
15   returned
857   as
2   two-character
7   strings.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
5   class="initialized">getline</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
24   Read
271   one
372   line
640   from
36   stdin
2   pseudo-variable.
468   If
36   stdin
1837   is
7   tied
3144   to
6605   the
7   keyboard,
4   keystrokes
650   are
6   echoed
857   as
21   they&rsquo;re
13   typed.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>

776   <td
698   class="langref">

2   class="initialized">history</tt>

1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
13   Number
2059   of
73   statements
3144   to
17   remember
883   on
6605   the
112   history
2   list;
57   <tt>0</tt>
20   turns
91   off
6605   the
112   history
4   mechanism.
11   (If
6605   the
79   thread
1837   is
3   interactive,
112   history
1837   is
37   automatically
436   set
3144   to
1   <tt>100</tt>.)
1679   </p>
1768   </td>

1604   <p>
468   If
8   True,
30   don&rsquo;t
44   exit
277   at
3   EOF
883   on
2   stdin;
7   insist
883   on
590   an
44   exit
47   command.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>

698   class="langref">

2   class="initialized">ignoreerrors</tt>

57   <tt>0</tt>
1768   </td>

1604   <p>
13   Determine
57   whether
21   execution
131   should
23   continue
790   if
590   an
106   error
2   occurs:
57   <tt>0</tt>
99   means
6605   the
79   thread
3   exits;
21   <tt>1</tt>
13   (the
117   default
1113   for
590   an
12   interactive
3   thread)
99   means
44   exit
640   from
7   loops
1041   or
25   procedures
2223   and
47   try
3144   to
125   read
3088   a
257   new
6   command;
6   <tt>2</tt>
99   means
16   ignore
364   all
6   errors.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="#Legend">Legend</a><br/>
3314   <a
1   href="#CombinedList">Combined
1   list</a><br/>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Legend"></a>Legend
523   </h4>
10   <table
1   class="white">
851   <tr>
776   <td
36   style="width:
9   120px">
1   <tt>ENVIRONMENT</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
21   An
90   environmental
47   variable.
5   Environmental
111   variables
650   are
73   passed
3144   to
439   any
107   child
30   processes
1041   or
20   windows
675   you
38   create
588   by
9   invoking
590   an
13   external
69   utility
1041   or
13   application.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
1   class="process">shared</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
261   A
1129   shell
243   variable
30   shared
588   by
364   all
20   threads.
468   If
271   one
79   thread
19   makes
3088   a
3   change,
364   all
380   will
43   see
61   it.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
1   class="inherited">inherited</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
45   Each
79   thread
19   gets
122   its
51   own
60   copy
241   but
6605   the
20   initial
105   value
1837   is
37   inherited
640   from
122   its
6   parent.
1679   </p>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
851   <tr>
776   <td
698   class="langref">
123   <tt
1   class="initialized">initialized</tt>
1768   </td>
993   <td>
1604   <p>
45   Each
79   thread
19   gets
122   its
51   own
60   copy
241   but
6605   the
3   initialization
1837   is
80   always
3144   to
3088   a
43   defined
21   value.

36   shell</a></li>
448   </ul>
1652   </div>

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="#TwoPhases">Broken
178   into
6   compiling
2223   and
2   execution</a><br/>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="TwoPhases"></a>Broken
178   into
6   compiling
2223   and
21   execution
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
30   Here&rsquo;s
3088   a
1   rough
3   summary
2059   of
6605   the
72   procedure
588   by
201   which
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
1   reads,
2   parses
2223   and
7   evaluates
252   your
71   commands.
25   It's
23   broken
178   into
94   two
1   phases:
6   compiling
2223   and
6   execution.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Compiling"></a>Compiling
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
428   command
1837   is
125   read
640   from
6605   the
7   keyboard,
3088   a
159   script
1041   or
176   other
51   source
2223   and
1   transformed
178   into
590   an
30   internal
10   form,
5   ready
1113   for
6   execution.
1679   </p>
14   <ol>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
983   The
428   command
1837   is
17   read.
468   If
36   stdin
19   appears
3144   to
924   be
3088   a
7   keyboard,
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="33-CommandLineEditing.htm">command
372   line
4   editing</a>
18   routines
650   are
281   used
3144   to
125   read
3088   a
3   keystroke
277   at
3088   a
8   time,
1   entering
72   them
178   into
6605   the
428   command
45   buffer
2223   and
21   doing
34   whatever
57   editing
1837   is
2   indicated.
12   Otherwise,
6605   the
1129   shell
44   simply
55   uses
6605   the
841   Windows
1   kernel&rsquo;s
3314   <a
1   href="http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa365467(v=vs.85).aspxhttp://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa365467(v=vs.85).aspx">Win32
1   ReadFile</a>
29   function
3144   to
125   read
2   small
1   chunks
42   until
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
6605   the
94   statement
289   has
382   been
8   found.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
50   href="34-HistoryRecall.htm">History
3   substitution</a>
1837   is
11   done.
39   Any
12   <tt>!</tt>
1041   or
10   <tt>%</tt>
112   history
35   references
650   are
2   expanded.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
983   The
106   text
1837   is
3314   <a
1   href="17-LanguageReference.htm">broken
157   up
178   into
48   separate
1   words</a>.
2   Unless
102   it&rsquo;s
33   part
2059   of
3088   a
3314   <a
2   href="36-Quoting.htm">quoted
1   string</a>,
68   white
67   space
1   (tabs
2223   and
1   spaces)
1   separates
27   words.
139   Also,
94   these
94   special
56   strings
650   are
18   interpreted
857   as
48   separate
80   words
115   even
790   if
21   they&rsquo;re
146   run
13   together
920   with
176   other
2   text:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
3   class="codesample">&amp;
498   |
30   ;
49   &gt;
49   &lt;
84   (
210   )
32   &amp;&amp;
18   ||
13   &gt;&gt;
16   &lt;&lt;
4   &gt;&amp;
6   &gt;!
3   &gt;&amp;!
1652   </div>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
983   The
428   command
1837   is
104   added
3144   to
6605   the
3314   <a
3   href="08-History.htm">history
1   list</a>.
13   Because
320   this
1837   is
58   done
61   after
6605   the
106   text
289   has
382   been
23   broken
157   up
178   into
48   separate
25   words,
6605   the
62   commands
1307   in
6605   the
112   history
190   list
380   will
43   look
3088   a
49   bit
58   different
171   than
6605   the
90   way
675   you
49   typed
21   them.
12   It&rsquo;s
58   done
320   this
90   way
3144   to
53   make
879   it
1   clearer
91   how
3144   to
20   refer
3144   to
28   individual
80   words
15   number,
95   e.g.,
1   <tt>!!:3</tt>
3144   to
20   refer
3144   to
97   word
61   3
1307   in
6605   the
32   previous
47   command.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
983   The
428   command
1837   is
15   compiled
178   into
590   an
30   internal
32   form
191   using
3088   a
9   recursive
1   descent
1   parser,
2   recognizing
6605   the
35   language
9   constructs
2223   and
57   whether
3088   a
91   given
1   portion
2059   of
3088   a
428   command
1837   is
31   really
590   an
3314   <a
1   href="13-Expressions.htm">expression</a>
1041   or
234   just
3088   a
29   series
2059   of
27   words.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
1   Compilation
277   at
320   this
11   stage
1837   is
277   at
6605   the
22   level
2059   of
3088   a
50   whole
3   construct,
95   e.g.,
3088   a
50   whole
3314   <a
1   href="19-Iteration.htm"><tt>foreach</tt></a>
94   statement
1041   or
3314   <a
1   href="20-Procedures.htm"><tt>proc</tt></a>
15   definition
2223   and
26   everything
97   inside
61   it.
14   That&rsquo;s
113   so
1061   that
23   every
96   time
109   through
3088   a
23   loop
1041   or
23   every
96   time
3088   a
72   procedure
1837   is
7   run,
6605   the
1129   shell
14   won&rsquo;t
5   waste
96   time
1   recompiling
73   statements
1061   that
76   could
299   have
382   been
15   compiled
6605   the
281   first
16   time.
139   Also,
3314   <a
2   href="21-Aliases.htm">aliases</a>
650   are
11   expanded
277   at
320   this
11   stage
2223   and
101   some
20   minor
2   optimizations
650   are
8   done,
95   e.g.,
1   pre-compiling
5   static
16   patterns
3   appearing
1307   in
3314   <a
1   href="31-Wildcarding.htm#Usage">pattern-matching
1   expressions</a>,
38   etc.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
14   </ol>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="Execution"></a>Execution
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
30   internal
32   form
1837   is
5   executed.
983   The
25   various
9   quoting
2223   and
176   other
39   substitution
13   activities
650   are
8   done,
1307   in
3   effect,
1307   in
320   this
3   order:
1679   </p>
14   <ol>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="16-Scheduling.htm">Threads</a>
650   are
8   spawned
1113   for
48   separate
4   stages
2059   of
3088   a
3314   <a
1   href="07-IORedirection.htm#Pipes">pipeline</a>
1041   or
1113   for
3314   <a
1   href="16-Scheduling.htm#BackgroundActivities">background</a>
6   execution.
14   That&rsquo;s
3144   to
23   avoid
2   serializing
439   any
6   blocking
4   events
1   as,
1113   for
101   example,
6605   the
1129   shell
2   hits
6605   the
14   disk,
25   looking
109   through
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#PATH">search
1   path</a>
1113   for
40   executable
39   files,
38   etc.
32   By
7   spawning
48   separate
6   threads,
47   those
6   blocking
4   events
511   can
924   be
1   overlapped.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
46   href="26-IORedirection.htm">I/O
2   redirection</a>
1837   is
1   performed.
468   If
6605   the
320   filename
78   being
6   redirected
3   to/from
1837   is
38   actually
3088   a
3314   <a
7   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">wildcard</a>
1041   or
3088   a
3314   <a
2   href="36-Quoting.htm#CommandSubstitution">command</a>
1041   or
3314   <a
3   href="37-VariableSubstitution.htm">variable
1   substitution</a>,
1061   that
97   word
380   will
924   be
2   expanded.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
11   Single
2223   and
25   double
3314   <a
2   href="36-Quoting.htm">quoted
1   strings</a>
650   are
5   processed.
468   If
6605   the
17   quoted
129   string
35   contains
439   any
3314   <a
7   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">wildcard</a>
19   characters,
21   they&rsquo;re
8   escaped
113   so
1061   that
4   they&rsquo;ll
21   appear
857   as
44   literal
197   characters
268   when
51   wildcarding
1837   is
58   done
241   but
66   still
924   be
2   unescaped
37   right
61   after
6   that.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
106   In
6605   the
15   compiled
30   internal
10   form,
4   double-quoted
56   strings
50   containing
3314   <a
2   href="36-Quoting.htm#CommandSubstitution">command</a>
1041   or
3314   <a
3   href="37-VariableSubstitution.htm">variable
3   substitution</a>
650   are
55   already
1   specially
23   broken
157   up
3144   to
1   look,
277   at
320   this
1   stage,
90   like
3088   a
29   series
2059   of
4   double-quoted
56   strings
920   with
439   any
34   substitutions
5   concatenated
6   together.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="37-VariableSubstitution.htm">Variable</a>
2223   and
3314   <a
1   href="36-Quoting.htm#CommandSubstitution">command
3   substitutions</a>
650   are
11   done.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="31-Wildcarding.htm">Wildcarding</a>
1837   is
11   done.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="36-Quoting.htm#EscapeCharacter">Escape
2   characters</a>
650   are
5   processed.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
983   The
29   series
2059   of
80   words
1837   is
73   passed
3144   to
6605   the
428   command
857   as
12   arguments.
2   (It&rsquo;s
277   at
320   this
4   point,
790   if
102   it&rsquo;s
590   an
3314   <a
2   href="Utilities/eval.htm"><tt>eval</tt></a>
29   command,
1061   that
6605   the
77   argument
106   text
1837   is
73   passed
51   back
109   through
6605   the
6   parser
2223   and
189   then
3144   to
6605   the
11   evaluation
1   logic)
1679   </p>
115   </li>
14   </ol>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="SearchOrder"></a>Search
25   order
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
4   Commands
650   are
6   searched
1113   for
1307   in
320   this
3   order:
1679   </p>
14   <ol>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
1   href="20-Procedures.htm">User-defined
2   procedures</a>.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
79   href="49-BuiltinProcedures.htm">Builtin
1   procedures</a>
2223   and
3314   <a
1   href="50-BuiltinUtilities.htm">builtin
1   commands</a>.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
4   External
228   commands,
6   searched
1113   for
1307   in
6605   the
3314   <a
3   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#PATH"><tt>PATH</tt></a>
103   directories
1307   in
320   this
25   order
20   within
197   each
8   directory:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">.csh
7   .exe
5   .com
12   .cmd
7   .bat
1652   </div>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
468   If
227   no
40   executable
383   file
920   with
271   one
2059   of
94   these
3   extensions
1837   is
12   found,
364   all
294   files
201   which
65   match
6605   the
428   command
380   will
924   be
1   examined.
468   If
6605   the
383   file
19   appears
3144   to
924   be
3088   a
24   script,
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
380   will
43   look
1113   for
3088   a
1   <tt>#!</tt>
1   directive
1307   in
6605   the
281   first
31   line,
95   e.g.,
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">#!/usr/bin/perl
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
13   and,
790   if
879   it
13   finds
4   one,
47   try
3144   to
38   find
6605   the
152   specified
35   language
2   processor,
25   looking
281   first
1307   in
6605   the
3   location
152   specified
13   and,
790   if
471   not
28   found
2   there,
1307   in
364   all
6605   the
25   various
89   path
55   directories.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
983   The
30   internal
32   form
2059   of
197   each
15   compiled
94   statement
1837   is
7   discarded
10   once
102   it&rsquo;s
227   no
68   longer
5   needed,
11   i.e.,
790   if
15   there&rsquo;s
227   no
90   way
675   you
55   might
14   invoke
1061   that
66   code
640   from
3088   a
11   later
30   statement.
1679   </p>
115   </li>
115   <li>
1604   <p>
111   For
101   example,
10   once
675   you
21   define
3088   a
7   procedure,
102   it&rsquo;s
80   always
1   accessible;
675   you
511   can
25   call
879   it
277   at
439   any
8   time,
113   so
1061   that
15   compiled
66   code
1837   is
18   never
7   discarded
42   unless
675   you
6   redefine
6605   the
72   procedure
1041   or
18   explicitly
3314   <a
1   href="20-Procedures.htm"><tt>unproc</tt></a>
61   it.
58   But
590   an
37   ordinary
94   statement
49   typed
277   at
6605   the
428   command
372   line
76   could
924   be
2   re-run
4   (without
1   re-entering
879   it
191   using
112   history
1041   or
588   by
1   retyping
3   it)
199   only
790   if
879   it
363   was
33   part
2059   of
3088   a
12   larger
41   control
10   structure
1041   or
790   if
87   there
363   was
3088   a
90   way
3144   to
3314   <a
1   href="24-MiscStatements.htm#goto"><tt>goto</tt></a>
22   it,
54   meaning
87   there
161   would
299   have
3144   to
299   have
382   been
3088   a
40   label
32   preceding
61   it.
1679   </p>
115   </li>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
1930   C
1129   shell
20   looks
1113   for
3088   a
23   <tt>login.csh</tt>
383   file
790   if
102   it's
150   started
920   with
6605   the
5   <tt>-L</tt>
192   option
5   indicating
1061   that
102   it&rsquo;s
3088   a
11   login
55   shell.
983   The
76   search
25   order
1837   is
3144   to
43   look
281   first
1307   in
6605   the
2   user&rsquo;s
7   <tt>~</tt>
40   home
32   directory,
189   then
1307   in
6605   the
1930   C
13   shell&rsquo;s
13   distribution
319   directory
1113   for
6605   the
7   default.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
13   Because
23   <tt>login.csh</tt>
1837   is
33   useful
1113   for
35   setting
157   up
3314   <a
1   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm">
76   environment
3   variables</a>,
23   <tt>login.csh</tt>
1837   is
125   read
98   before
3314   <a
2   href="47-StartupCsh.htm">
2   <tt>startup.csh</tt></a>.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
2   name="Default"></a>Default
17   login.csh
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
181   This
1837   is
6605   the
117   default
23   <tt>login.csh</tt>
383   file
1307   in
6605   the
13   distribution
92   directory.
1679   </p>

1043   Hamilton
1930   C

13   Release
2   5.1.a

1837   is
6605   the

1043   Hamilton

1113   for
597   #

2223   and

522   <h4>
3314   <a
2   name="OverridingTheDefault"></a>Overriding
6605   the
117   default
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
1930   C
1129   shell
20   runs
6605   the
117   default
23   <tt>login.csh</tt>
199   only
790   if
675   you
38   don't
299   have
271   one
1307   in
252   your
3314   <a
4   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#HOME"><tt>HOME</tt></a>
92   directory.
8   So
6605   the
6   easiest
90   way
3144   to
6   easiest
90   way
3144   to
14   override
6605   the
117   default
1837   is
3144   to
38   create
3088   a
23   <tt>login.csh</tt>
1307   in
1061   that
319   directory
2223   and
20   put
34   whatever
675   you
90   like
1307   in
22   it,
33   including
9   copying
2223   and
9   pasting
199   only
234   just
47   those
4   parts
2059   of
6605   the
117   default
23   <tt>login.csh</tt>
675   you
10   like.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
468   If
675   you
5   mostly
90   like
6605   the
117   default
23   <tt>login.csh</tt>
241   but
161   would
20   add
1041   or
78   change
199   only
3088   a
84   few
4   things,
3314   <a
2   href="24-MiscStatements.htm#source"><tt>source</tt></a>
6605   the
117   default
117   default
23   <tt>login.csh</tt>
241   but
189   then
14   override
4   parts
2059   of
61   it.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
12   Here's
91   how
3144   to
51   source
6605   the
117   default
23   <tt>login.csh</tt>
63   without
25   having
3144   to
22   know
105   where
879   it
4   is.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
3   class="codesample">source
3   $shell:h:h\login.csh
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
3   <tt>$shell</tt>
243   variable
32   returns
6605   the
320   filename
2059   of
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
40   executable
49   that's
8   running,
95   e.g.,
4   <tt>C:\Program
14   Files\Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
174   2012
2   x64\Bin\csh.exe</tt>.
983   The
4   <tt>:h</tt>
57   editing
40   operator
32   returns
6605   the
21   parent
92   directory.
2   <tt>$shell:h:h</tt>
1837   is
6605   the
23   root
2059   of
1930   C
21   shell's
21   install
32   directory,
4   <tt>C:\Program
14   Files\Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
174   2012
2   x64</tt>.
1679   </p>

57   <h4>Topics</h4>
1604   <p>
3314   <a
24   href="#Usage">Usage</a><br/>
3314   <a
2   href="#Default">Default
1   startup.csh</a><br/>
3314   <a

6605   the
2   default</a><br/>

55   also</a><br/>
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
24   name="Usage"></a>Usage
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
1930   C
1129   shell
80   always
20   looks
1113   for
3088   a
26   <tt>startup.csh</tt>
383   file
42   unless
102   it's
150   started
920   with
6   <tt>-f</tt>
1041   or
2   <tt>-F</tt>
5   indicating
14   fast
12   startup.
983   The
76   search
25   order
1837   is
3144   to
43   look
281   first
1307   in
6605   the
2   user&rsquo;s
7   <tt>~</tt>
40   home
32   directory,
189   then
1307   in
6605   the
1930   C
13   shell&rsquo;s
13   distribution
319   directory
1113   for
6605   the
7   default.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
13   Because
3314   <a
3   href="46-LoginCsh.htm"><tt>login.csh</tt></a>
1837   is
33   useful
1113   for
35   setting
157   up
3314   <a
1   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm">environment
3   variables</a>,
23   <tt>login.csh</tt>
1837   is
125   read
98   before
2   <tt>startup.csh</tt>.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
26   <tt>startup.csh</tt>
1837   is
33   useful
1113   for
4   defining
18   settings
1061   that
6   aren't
37   inherited
640   from
21   parent
3144   to
107   child
70   process
30   copies
2059   of
6605   the
1930   C
980   shell,
33   including
9   definitions
1113   for
33   useful
3314   <a
2   href="21-Aliases.htm">aliases</a>
2223   and
3314   <a
2   href="20-Procedures.htm">procedures</a>.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
2   name="Default"></a>Default
26   startup.csh
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
181   This
1837   is
6605   the
117   default
26   <tt>startup.csh</tt>
383   file
1307   in
6605   the
13   distribution
92   directory.
1679   </p>

1   csh.exe
597   #
2223   and
20   put
879   it
178   into
6605   the
52   prompt
2059   of
13   nested
1   invocations.
790   if
1   ($?LAYER)
189   then
284   @
1   LAYER++
436   set
5   prompt1
527   =
2   '[$LAYER]
4   $@
2   $CDISK%
12   '
436   set
3   prompt2
527   =
2   '[$LAYER]
4   $@
2   $CDISK?
12   '
56   else
99   setenv
4   LAYER
527   =
214   1
412   end
597   #
3   Ensure
1061   that
197   each
22   level
12   sets
122   its
51   own
3   title.
18   unsetenv
2   CshTitle
436   set
112   history
2   2000
597   #
1   Bump
157   up
6605   the
24   size
2059   of
6605   the
112   history
39   list.
160   </tt></pre>
1768   </td>
850   </tr>
192   </table>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
2   name="OverridingTheDefault"></a>Overriding
6605   the
117   default
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
983   The
1930   C
1129   shell
20   runs
6605   the
117   default
26   <tt>startup.csh</tt>
199   only
790   if
675   you
38   don't
299   have
271   one
1307   in
252   your
3314   <a
4   href="40-EnvironmentVariables.htm#HOME"><tt>HOME</tt></a>
92   directory.
8   So
6605   the
6   easiest
90   way
3144   to
6   easiest
90   way
3144   to
14   override
6605   the
117   default
1837   is
3144   to
38   create
3088   a
26   <tt>startup.csh</tt>
1307   in
1061   that
319   directory
2223   and
20   put
34   whatever
675   you
90   like
1307   in
22   it,
33   including
9   copying
2223   and
9   pasting
199   only
234   just
47   those
4   parts
2059   of
6605   the
117   default
26   <tt>startup.csh</tt>
675   you
10   like.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
468   If
675   you
5   mostly
90   like
6605   the
117   default
26   <tt>startup.csh</tt>
241   but
161   would
20   add
1041   or
78   change
199   only
3088   a
84   few
4   things,
3314   <a
2   href="24-MiscStatements.htm#source"><tt>source</tt></a>
6605   the
117   default
1   <tt>startup.csh</tt>,
189   then
20   add
252   your
3   changes.
111   For
101   example,
790   if
675   you
90   like
101   some
241   but
471   not
364   all
2059   of
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="52-PredefinedAliases.htm">predefined
1   aliases</a>
2223   and
25   procedures
879   it
1   contains,
675   you
76   could
3314   <a
1   href="21-Aliases.htm"><tt>unalias</tt></a>
1041   or
2   <tt>unproc</tt>
6605   the
4   ones
675   you
38   don't
10   like.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
12   Here's
91   how
3144   to
51   source
6605   the
117   default
26   <tt>startup.csh</tt>
383   file
63   without
25   having
3144   to
22   know
105   where
879   it
4   is.
1679   </p>
1655   <div
3   class="codesample">source
3   $shell:h:h\startup.csh
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
3   <tt>$shell</tt>
243   variable
32   returns
6605   the
320   filename
2059   of
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
40   executable
49   that's
8   running,
95   e.g.,
4   <tt>C:\Program
14   Files\Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
174   2012
2   x64\Bin\csh.exe</tt>.
983   The
4   <tt>:h</tt>
57   editing
40   operator
32   returns
6605   the
21   parent
92   directory.
2   <tt>$shell:h:h</tt>
1837   is
6605   the
23   root
2059   of
1930   C
21   shell's
21   install
32   directory,
4   <tt>C:\Program
14   Files\Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
174   2012
2   x64</tt>.
1679   </p>

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="StartMenu"></a>Start
7   menu
2223   and
5   shortcuts
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
4   During
2   installation,
22   you&rsquo;ll
924   be
9   asked
57   whether
102   it&rsquo;s
1113   for
5   everyone
1041   or
234   just
1113   for
3   yourself.
468   If
675   you
21   choose
3   everyone,
6605   the
1043   Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
26   group
380   will
924   be
33   created
1307   in
6605   the
1   everyone's
22   Start
3   menu.
468   If
675   you
21   choose
234   just
2   yourself,
879   it
380   will
199   only
21   appear
1307   in
252   your
51   own
22   Start
3   menu.
11   Another
16   shortcut
3144   to
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
1837   is
33   created
883   on
93   either
252   your
18   desktop
1041   or
6605   the
18   desktop
30   shared
588   by
364   all
9   users.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
5   shortcuts
42   open
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
1307   in
3088   a
4   25
372   line
38   x
9   80
172   character
66   window
2059   of
68   white
197   characters
883   on
3088   a
19   blue
65   background
857   as
3088   a
2   "login"
980   shell,
25   causing
879   it
3144   to
43   look
1113   for
3088   a

522   <h4>

1837   is

1679   </p>

14   </ol>
1604   <p>

243   variable
34   substitutions

21   evaluated
2223   and
34   whatever
27   results
1837   is
6   printed.
2   Wildcards

1837   is
6605   the

12   It&rsquo;s
11   quite
1   literally

6605   the
1129   shell

4   pastes

1679   </p>
1604   <p>

1655   <div
1   class="codesample">579

1   "Hello

3   CSH!

1   Hello

34   _
1652   </div>

1604   <p>

19   builtin
1   <tt>upper</tt>

1129   shell

8   parentheses

14   That&rsquo;s

2   cwd

1679   </p>
1604   <p>
3   There&rsquo;s
31   really
227   no
26   limit
3144   to

52   prompt

159   It
511   can
115   even
4   stretch
53   over
30   multiple
111   lines
790   if
675   you
20   put
1307   in
9   carriage
2   return/newline
172   character
1   combinations:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">[C:\]
436   set
6   PROMPT1
527   =
1   '`date`^r^n$cwd
12   '
3   Fri
7   Jul
8   22
3   2011
1   8:57:22.03
2   c:\
34   _
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
983   The
22   title
16   bar
90   environmental
39   variable,
2   <tt>CSHTITLE</tt>,
2223   and
122   its
1129   shell
243   variable
11   alias,
2   <tt>cshtitle</tt>,
102   work
8   pretty
30   much
6605   the
122   same
90   way
857   as
6605   the
52   prompt
12   variables.
983   The
22   title
16   bar
1837   is
1   recomputed
23   every
96   time
6605   the
1129   shell
7   prompts
1113   for
3088   a
257   new
47   command.
468   If
5   <tt>CSHTITLE</tt>
1837   is
13   null,
3   &ldquo;Hamilton
1930   C
3   shell&rdquo;
1837   is
7   displayed.
468   If
5   <tt>CSHTITLE</tt>
1837   is
18   explicitly
2   unset,
6605   the
22   title
16   bar
106   text
37   inherited
277   at
18   startup
1837   is
7   displayed.
3   Otherwise
6605   the
5   <tt>CSHTITLE</tt>
129   string
1837   is
21   evaluated
857   as
790   if
879   it
132   were
3088   a
4   double-quoted
35   string.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
1   tradeoff
3144   to
17   remember
1307   in
14   creating
3088   a
52   prompt
1041   or
22   title
129   string
1837   is
1061   that
34   whatever
675   you
20   put
87   there
1837   is
17   going
3144   to
924   be
146   run
23   every
96   time
675   you
44   need
3088   a
257   new
9   prompt.
468   If
675   you
53   make
879   it
13   too
4   complex,
5   it&rsquo;ll
66   still
7   run,
241   but
879   it
76   could
924   be
1   annoyingly
1   slow.
1   Remember
1061   that
879   it
16   takes
68   longer
3144   to
146   run
13   external
12   programs
171   than
3144   to
270   use
1129   shell
111   variables
1041   or
5   procedures.
468   If
675   you
84   want
32   something
31   really
1   unusual,
47   try
56   writing
3088   a
72   procedure
1061   that
4   calculates
2223   and
32   returns
6605   the
129   string
675   you
7   want.

1604   <p>

511   can
21   choose

46   color

6605   the
84   following
2   set:
3   <tt>black</tt>,
3   <tt>red</tt>,
3   <tt>green</tt>,
3   <tt>yellow</tt>,
3   <tt>blue</tt>,
3   <tt>magenta</tt>

6   <tt>blue
3   red</tt>),
3   <tt>cyan</tt>
42   (or
6   <tt>blue
3   green</tt>)
2223   and
3   <tt>white</tt>.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
12   Foreground
1041   or
65   background
197   colors
193   may
190   also
924   be
6   <tt>bright</tt>,
1   <tt>dim</tt>
3   (meaning
1   simply,
2   &ldquo;not
1   bright&rdquo;)
1041   or
3   <tt>reverse</tt>.
983   The
8   keyword
6   <tt>on</tt>
5   introduces
65   background
14   colors.
1   <tt>Yellow</tt>
1837   is
3088   a
11   true
8   yellow
199   only
790   if
102   it&rsquo;s
1   <tt>bright</tt>.
84   (This
1837   is
3088   a
110   system
4   limitation
471   not
10   related
3144   to
6605   the
1930   C
2   shell.)
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
983   The
88   names
2059   of
6605   the
197   colors
2223   and
6605   the
6   keywords

5   <tt>dim</tt>,
3   <tt>reverse</tt>
2223   and

471   not

3   sensitive
2223   and
193   may
924   be
49   typed
1307   in
439   any
16   combination
2059   of
21   upper
1041   or
32   lower

55   characters.
983   The
88   names
2059   of
6605   the
90   environmental
111   variables
5   themselves

190   also
924   be
40   mixed
43   case.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
468   If
3088   a
17   foreground
1041   or
65   background
46   color
1837   is
20   left
2   unspecified,
1061   that
2   plane
1837   is

9   transparent
2223   and

6605   the

10   underneath

468   If

1837   is

6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
2223   and
6605   the

6605   the
204   screen

12   startup.

2059   of
197   colors

1307   in
2   <tt>diff</tt>
2223   and
2   <tt>more</tt>,

2   modes
1061   that

1679   </p>
1604   <p>

511   can
436   set
6605   the

1837   is

1655   <div
2   class="codesample">proc

77   last
13   working
319   directory

522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="BerkelyHistoryAndEscapes"></a>Berkeley-style

1604   <p>

2   fingers

1   <tt>!-n</tt>

1   die-hard

4   perhaps
1   daring)
1   former

1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="BerkeleyCompatibilityMode"></a>Berkeley
29   compatibility
44   mode
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
1043   Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
135   does
8   implement
3088   a
1   substantial
165   number
2059   of
7   significant
5   improvements
53   over
6605   the
253   original
67   Berkeley
1930   C
55   shell.
32   By
2223   and
3   large,
40   we
12   expect
35   most
17   users
3144   to
38   find
94   these
45   changes
1   welcome.
58   But
790   if
23   you&rsquo;re
35   trying
3144   to
146   run
3088   a
159   script
2   developed
191   using
6605   the
67   Berkeley
1930   C
1129   shell
1041   or
790   if
675   you
44   simply
84   want
51   get
3088   a
207   more
4   precise
1   &ldquo;Berkeley
1   mode&rdquo;
3   interactively,
675   you
511   can
176   do
6   that.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
2   Following
3088   a
19   common
22   convention
883   on
32   Unix
1061   that
6605   the
281   first
372   line
2059   of
3088   a
159   script
511   can
8   identify
6605   the
35   language
9   processor
3144   to
924   be
281   used
920   with
22   it,
790   if
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
10   encounters
3088   a
159   script
1061   that
29   starts
920   with
93   either
2059   of
6605   the
84   following
1   lines:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
1   class="codesample">#!/bin/csh
1   #!/usr/bin/csh
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
879   it
380   will
6   shift
3144   to
3088   a
7   fairly
4   precise
1   emulation
2059   of
6605   the
253   original
67   Berkeley
1930   C
55   shell.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
103   To
2   enter
320   this
44   mode
1113   for
12   interactive
12   work,
87   start
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
920   with
6605   the
3   <tt>-B</tt>
3   (Berkeley
3   compatibility)
43   option.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
111   For
207   more
6   details
883   on
15   differences
64   between
6605   the
1043   Hamilton
2223   and
67   Berkeley
1930   C
3   shells
2223   and
883   on
67   Berkeley
29   compatibility
23   mode,
3   please
20   refer
3144   to
6605   the
3314   <a
1   href="55-Compatibility.htm">Compatibility</a>
7   section.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="ErrorHandling"></a>Error
3   handling
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
2   <tt>ignoreerrors</tt>,
2   <tt>ignorestatus</tt>,
2   <tt>noclobber</tt>,
3   <tt>nonomatch</tt>
2223   and
6   <tt>nullwords</tt>
20   let
675   you
1   tailor
91   how
6605   the
1129   shell
2   responds
3144   to
25   various
8   exception
2   situations.
20   They
20   let
675   you
19   determine
57   whether
675   you
10   think
28   certain
11   things
650   are
6   errors.
111   For
101   example,
131   should
3088   a
107   child
70   process
1061   that
32   returns
3088   a
17   non-zero
159   return
66   code
241   but
19   otherwise
2   seems
3144   to
146   run
2   okay
924   be
66   considered
590   an
1   error?
468   If
675   you
436   set
1   <tt>ignorestatus</tt>
527   =
18   0,
879   it
380   will
2   be.
8   Similarly,
2   <tt>noclobber</tt>
30   lets
675   you
9   intercept
2   accidental
8   attempts
3144   to
7   overwrite
590   an
31   existing
383   file
920   with
28   i/o
3   redirection.
3   <tt>nonomatch</tt>
21   tells
81   what
131   should
9   happen
790   if
51   wildcarding
37   doesn&rsquo;t
65   match
11   anything.
6   <tt>nullwords</tt>
21   tells
57   whether
675   you
10   think
102   it&rsquo;s
590   an
106   error
3144   to
270   use
3088   a
3   subscript
26   that&rsquo;s
91   off
6605   the
412   end
2059   of
590   an
2   array.
1679   </p>
522   <h4>
3314   <a
1   name="COMSPEC"></a>Calling
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
640   from
176   other
16   applications
523   </h4>
1604   <p>
10   Many
3   applications,
95   e.g.,
2   editors,
53   make
297   utilities
2223   and
113   so
6   on,
7   depend
883   on
78   being
29   able
3144   to
25   call
157   up
6605   the
428   command
4   processor.
111   For
101   example,
53   make
55   uses
16   <tt>cmd.exe</tt>
3144   to
38   actually
70   process
197   each
428   command
1307   in
6605   the
53   make
383   file
1061   that
879   it
1   determines
131   should
924   be
12   run.
11   Most
2   editors
10   (and
25   many
176   other
1   applications)
17   provide
3088   a
90   way
2059   of
5   temporarily
1   suspending
5   themselves
2223   and
9   invoking
16   <tt>cmd.exe</tt>
113   so
675   you
511   can
146   run
3088   a
84   few
62   commands
2223   and
189   then
44   exit
3144   to
159   return
51   back
3144   to
6605   the
4   editor.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
4   Usually,
94   these
16   applications
43   look
277   at
6605   the
4   <tt>COMSPEC</tt>
90   environmental
243   variable
3144   to
19   determine
6605   the
31   full
37   pathname
1113   for
16   <tt>cmd.exe</tt>
42   (or
1   <tt>command.com</tt>
126   under
841   Windows
1   9x).
3   If,
90   like
1   <tt>nmake</tt>,
21   they&rsquo;re
234   just
6   calling
879   it
920   with
3088   a
110   single
428   command
883   on
6605   the
428   command
31   line,
4   they&rsquo;ll
16   probably
270   use
6605   the
1   <tt>cmd.exe&nbsp;/C</tt>
43   option.
1679   </p>
1604   <p>
468   If
13   you&rsquo;d
90   like
3144   to
270   use
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
46   instead
2059   of
16   <tt>cmd.exe</tt>
920   with
94   these
3   applications,
436   set
4   <tt>COMSPEC</tt>
3144   to
39   point
3144   to
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
46   instead
2223   and
270   use
6605   the
2   <tt>CSHOPTIONS</tt>
90   environmental
243   variable
3144   to
30   tell
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
3144   to
10   interpret
6605   the
1   <tt>/C</tt>
192   option
4   flag
1307   in
3088   a
90   way
26   that&rsquo;s
7   compatible
920   with
6605   the
54   meaning
16   <tt>cmd.exe</tt>
161   would
2   attach
3144   to
3   it:
1679   </p>
1655   <div
3   class="codesample">setenv
4   COMSPEC
527   =
4   D:\Program
14   Files\Hamilton
1930   C
1129   shell
174   2012
2   x64\Bin\csh.exe
99   setenv
3   CSHOPTIONS
527   =
7   -X
1652   </div>
1604   <p>
106   When
6605   the
1930   C
1129   shell
29   starts
6   up,
790   if
879   it
2   discovers
1061   that
4   <tt>COMSPEC</tt>
4   points
3144   to
9   itself,
879   it
380   will
43   look
109   through
6605   the
76   search
89   path
3144   to
38   find
6605   the
3   real
10   <tt>cmd.exe</tt>.
181   This
1837   is
3144   to
53   make
10   sure
879   it
380   will
66   still
924   be
29   able
3144   to
146   run
6   <tt>.cmd</tt>
52   files.
12   Since
6605   the
1   <tt>-X</tt>
192   option
1837   is
3088   a
1   toggling
18   option,
675   you
511   can
66   still
51   get
277   at
6605   the
253   original
54   meaning
2059   of
6605   the
2   <tt>-C</tt>
192   option
588   by
19   typing
1   <tt>-XC</tt>
3144   to
2   toggle
4   back.
1679   </p>

511   can

1930   C
1129   shell
